, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MANY HISTORIANS STILL WONDER HOW THE DRUIDS\nWHO HELD ALL THE POWER IN EUROPE SUDDENLY VANISHED FROM THE FACE OF THE EARTH\nWITHOUT A TRACE<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">READ ON.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Today is St. Patrick\u2019s Day, a yearly holiday\ncelebrating Ireland\u2019s favorite patron saint.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">He is the man who did GENOCIDE of pagan druids\nwho were Indian hindus with tattoos of Shiva Lingam with a snake on their arms.&nbsp; St Patrick &nbsp;got his orders from the Pope Leo the great (\nLeo 1 ). <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">St Patrick &nbsp;did not banish the snakes because Ireland\nnever had any since start of time.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">St Patrick was used by POPE LEO THE GREAT &nbsp;as a mass murderer and a torturer.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Emperor\nValentinian III used Pope Leo 1 to bribe Atilla the Hun to cleanse all druids\nin his path. This cleared the way for future Papal authority and Christianity .</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Druids ( Dryuhus ) were Hindu sages who\nbelieved in immortality of the soul , the theory of re-incarnation , laws of\nKarma and the law of cosmic change PRALAYA - breathing in and out by brahma dissolving\nthe cosmos and rebuilding it all over &nbsp;again..</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;The Druids built the Stonehenge.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Druids were polytheistic and had female\nTRINITY multi armed gods . They were excellent is astronomy and astrology. &nbsp; The\nchief of the druids wore golden robes .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Their fire sacrifices ( no blood letting\n)involved uttering Sanskrit Hindu mantras.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">It is a WHITE LIE that druids did\nhuman and animal sacrifices. &nbsp;Ancient\nCelts engaged in ritual killing but druids were vegetarians and did NOT kill\neven animals.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This WHITE LIE will not stick anymore. ( Satya Vachchan Date : 17<sup>th</sup>\nMarch 2016, Time : 0630 IST ) My revelations now jump to 16.4%.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Druids may have preceded the Celts in\nEngland- never mind the lies of the Rothschild hisorians and Papal lies. Only\nDruids ( Hindus ) built Stonehenges.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Druids worshipped a pantheon of Gods and\nGoddesses, all know this.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Druids did everything orally . Data compiled\nabout them is heavily loaded against them and in favour of civilized Christianity.\n.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Many Pagan Gods and Goddesses have been converted to Christian saints.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Almost\nall Shiva lingam temples are now covered over by ancient Cathedrals..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I have visited druid sites in Estonia, Latvia\nand Lithuania.&nbsp; Many officers sailed\nunder my command.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Julius Caesar\u2019s description of Druids he\nencountered while serving as Governor of the Roman province of Gaul is\navailable:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\"The\nDruids are in charge of all religious matters, superin\u00adtending public and\nprivate fire sacrifices ( yajna ), and explaining superstitions. A large crowd\nof young men, who flock to them for schooling, hold the Druids in great\nrespect. For they have opinions to give on almost all disputes involving tribes\nor individuals, and if any crime is committed, any murder done, or if there is\ncontention about a will or the boundaries of some property, they are the people\nwho investigate the matter and establish rewards and punishments. Any\nindividual or community that refuses to abide by their decision is excluded\nfrom the sacrifices, which is held to be the most serious punishment possible. There\nis one arch-druid of supreme power. On his death, he is succeeded either by\nsomeone outstanding among his fellows, or, if there are several of equal\ncaliber, the decision is reached by a vote of all the Druids. At a fixed time\nof year they assemble at a holy place in the territory of the Carnutes, which\nis thought to be the center of Gaul. Anyone with a grievance attends and obeys\nthe decisions and judgments which the Druids give\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; Tacitus, the\nadventurer Roman historian had written in ancient days the druids conducted\nmarriages and the couple went around the holy fire 7 times clockwise.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/thor-zeus-marduk-brihaspati-and-jupiter.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/05/thor-zeus-marduk-brihaspati-and-jupiter.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: A 3000 year old Druid amphora</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5mCaL8j81kQ/Vu5HT3faKvI/AAAAAAABGW0/11FbQiwnNLwrf00fAzRj0ko37ebXh_M2Q/s1600/potnia%2Bvgboetian%2Bpithos-amphora.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-5mCaL8j81kQ/Vu5HT3faKvI/AAAAAAABGW0/11FbQiwnNLwrf00fAzRj0ko37ebXh_M2Q/s1600/potnia%2Bvgboetian%2Bpithos-amphora.JPG\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The mythical Norse King Konr, is Karna ( Suryaputra ) of the\nMahabharata.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-RgO8tENMbbA/VuoN0cZ0RXI/AAAAAAABGJk/KoF-sJReQ0s6mi2uM7iE48GeUAndB_BGg/s1600/M_Id_181018_Mddahabharata.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-RgO8tENMbbA/VuoN0cZ0RXI/AAAAAAABGJk/KoF-sJReQ0s6mi2uM7iE48GeUAndB_BGg/s400/M_Id_181018_Mddahabharata.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Let me quote Wikipedia <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">Konr the young, whose magical abilities are so emphasized, is as much a\nmagician as a warrior: a magician king, perhaps a sacred king. Dum\u00e9zil pointed\nout that Kon alone represents the supernatural function, represented by the\nBrahmin caste in India, the flamen function in Rome, the druids in some Celtic\ncultures, and the clergy in the three estates of medieval Europe. Instead of\nthe three estates of clergy/priest, warrior, and commoner, with serfs outside\nthe system, the R\u00edgs\u00feula presents three estates or castes in which the\nclergy/priest class has been subsumed within the warrior class and identified\nwith royalty.[9] Also, although in Rome and India the color white is assigned to\nthe sacred and to priests and red to warriors, here the noble warrior is white\nin color while the red coloration is ascribed instead to the commoner in place\nof the green, blue, or yellow color assigned to the lower classes in other\ncultures associated with Proto-Indo-European society. Dum\u00e9zil saw this as a\nGermanic adaptation of the Indo-European heritage.[10]:</span>UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/QPKaxycRlAQ/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/QPKaxycRlAQ?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Before 7000 BC India ruled the while world.\nAfter 7000 BC India ruled from Palestine to Urals to Vietnam.&nbsp; India only GAVE, we never TOOK ( stole )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">700 years of Roman warfare enmeshed with Holy\nRoman Church hegemony (including Ireland) virtually extinguished the flames of\nthe Pagan Hindusim.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They destroyed every vestige of Druids.&nbsp; Druids were given a bad name that they sacrificed\nhumans and animals , when all they did was to put cows ghee into the fire..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Celtic\nGods are still called deuos ( devas ).&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The celtic sun god&nbsp; is Surios ( surya ).&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">27 Revati (</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0930\u0947\u0935\u0924\u0940</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\nDo </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u091a</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\nCha </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u091a\u0940</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\nChi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There\nis a divine ratio of 108 , between earth, moon and sun.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This\nwas NOT accidental and Lord Vishnu took the Varaha ( boar ) avatar for this, to\nset things in the proper place, so that the earth continued as a rotating a\ndevolving self excited dynamo using the divine number 108 and the golden ratio\n1.618.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Sun's\ndiameter is 108 times that of the earth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\ndistance between earth and moon is 108 times the diameter of the moon..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The\ndistance between the Earth and Sun is 108 times the diameter of the Sun .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Distance\nbetween earth and sun is 149 900 000 kms<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Diameter\nof sun 1390 000 kms<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Distance\nfrom earth to moon 381 000 kms<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Diameter\nof moon 3499 kms<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Diameter\nof earth 12798 kms<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">DESPITE\nALL THIS THE IMMORAL WHITE MAN RIDICULED INDIANS OF BELIEVING THE EARTH IS\nFLAT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These\nvulgar invaders robbed us blind in 250 years , converting India from the\nrichest on the planet to the poorest -- and now want to make fun of our\npoverty.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They\ncall us savages after stealing and patenting our intellectual rights.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Hindu divine geometry of Sri Yantra has 3\nlines intersect at 54 points (number of Sanskrit / Malayalam alphabets ) with\nshiva and shakti qualities making the magic number 108.. . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">&nbsp;54 devas and asuras had churned for the\namrit or holy nectar for Samudra Manthan .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">All mantras are repeated 108 times. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">108 is the numerical equivalent of OM , in\nsync with the rhythms of time and space and represents perfect totality. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; Nataraja's cosmic\ndance has 108 Bharatanatyam poses. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ireland surrounded by stormy seas was one of\nthe few areas of the Celtic world that was not conquered by Rome and therefore\nnot influenced by Latin culture until the time of its Christianization in the\n5th century AD.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Ailill mac M\u00e1ta is the king of the Connachta Ireland\nhad a circular palace constructed with twenty-seven windows ( 27 Nakshatras ) through\nwhich he could gaze on his twenty-seven \u201cstar wives.\u201d &nbsp;The king named his 7 sons after consulting a\nDruid.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_17.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_17.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: This is a SRIVATSA mark on Vishnu's right side chest.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-E3CzaSK6Z2w/VuoVJfdqddI/AAAAAAABGKE/h8N_xIlZ-JsGrvUcyAqy-ZDUIZwZP81sA/s1600/ffcpage_1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-E3CzaSK6Z2w/VuoVJfdqddI/AAAAAAABGKE/h8N_xIlZ-JsGrvUcyAqy-ZDUIZwZP81sA/s400/ffcpage_1.jpg\" width=\"308\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>\u015ar\u012bmad Bh\u0101gavatam&nbsp; 5.3.3</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i>atha ha tam \u0101vi\u1e63k\u1e5bta-bhuja-yugala-dvaya\u1e3f hira\u1e47maya\u1e3f\npuru\u1e63a-vi\u015be\u1e63a\u1e3f kapi\u015ba-kau\u015bey\u0101mbara-dharam urasi vilasac-chr\u012bvatsa-lal\u0101ma\u1e3f\ndaravara-vanaruha-vana-m\u0101l\u0101cch\u016bry-am\u1e5bta-ma\u1e47i-gad\u0101dibhir upalak\u1e63ita\u1e3f sphu\u1e6da-kira\u1e47a-pravara-muku\u1e6da-ku\u1e47\u1e0dala-ka\u1e6daka-ka\u1e6di-s\u016btra-h\u0101ra-key\u016bra-n\u016bpur\u0101dy-a\u0144ga-bh\u016b\u1e63a\u1e47a-vibh\u016b\u1e63itam\n\u1e5btvik-sadasya-g\u1e5bha-patayo 'dhan\u0101 ivottama-dhanam upalabhya sabahu-m\u0101nam arha\u1e47en\u0101vanata-\u015b\u012br\u1e63\u0101\u1e47a\nupatasthu\u1e25</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Lord Vi\u1e63\u1e47u appeared before King N\u0101bhi with\nfour arms. He was very bright, and He appeared to be the best of all\npersonalities. Around the lower portion of His body, He wore a yellow silken\ngarment. On His chest was the mark of <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\u015ar\u012bvatsa,</b> which always displays beauty.\nHe carried a conchshell, lotus flower, disc and club, and He wore a garland of\nforest flowers and the Kaustubha gem. He was beautifully decorated with a\nhelmet, earrings, bangles, belt, pearl necklace, armlets, ankle bells and other\nbodily ornaments bedecked with radiant jewels. Seeing the Lord present before\nthem, King N\u0101bhi and his priests and associates felt just like poor people who\nhave suddenly attained great riches. They received the Lord and respectfully\nbent their heads and offered Him things in worship.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: This 3100 year old Druid calendar is a straight lift off a Hindu calendar.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By ancient tradition,\nthe Council of Druids made the final decision on the crowning of the king-they\ndid this for 6000 years. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In 432 AD,\nthe Druid grand council met at Stonehenge and this is recorded.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Saint Patrick made all\nthe Irish become Catholic by ethnic cleansing of Druids. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was a temple on\ntop of &nbsp;a pyramid shaped mountain ( equivalent\nto mount Kailash ) Croagh Patrick &nbsp;,\nIreland &nbsp;today known at the REEK. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">St Patrick caused it to\nbe razed down. This holy mountain is quartzite with seams of gold throughout,\nit sits on the western seaboard overlooking the Atlantic Ocean and the setting\nSun.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The gold is long gone.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8HXZdvDynYg/Vuo1KULy5FI/AAAAAAABGMc/F0_0X4H_m-ce5MpamOgwheWs5MCRQplAQ/s1600/histonhry2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"358\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-8HXZdvDynYg/Vuo1KULy5FI/AAAAAAABGMc/F0_0X4H_m-ce5MpamOgwheWs5MCRQplAQ/s640/histonhry2.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Irish have NOT\nforgotten their ancient culture. It is still a pilgrimage centre.</span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Q6CEr2_Ljg0/Vuo0oL0qqCI/AAAAAAABGMU/ydIICb0bNPMVyqoZ_TjUCopfzXSPD1Dyg/s1600/2ss4.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: large;\"><b>POOR IRISH- THEY HAVE NO IDEA HOW THE JEWS SCREWED THEM !</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-VoaBZIgP_V8/Vuo1d04cmII/AAAAAAABGMg/xqBFxYbyOLoQbwEJtr6zQ02WruCTJnlPw/s1600/reekbavvvse.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"354\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-VoaBZIgP_V8/Vuo1d04cmII/AAAAAAABGMg/xqBFxYbyOLoQbwEJtr6zQ02WruCTJnlPw/s640/reekbavvvse.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Here is the BIGGEST WHITE CHRISTIAN LIE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">\u201cIt was on this holy mountain that St Patrick\nsupposedly did his greatest magic \u2013 when he summoned a great host of loathsome\nand venomous creatures and then commanded them to cast themselves over the edge\nof the mountain, thus freeing the Irish countryside from all kinds of reptiles.\nThis included dragons, snakes and all types of reptiles, none of which ever\nexisted in Ireland. We are told that St Patrick did this by verbal command\u201d</span></i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-UQswmmNW740/Vuo4xU-TKGI/AAAAAAABGM0/8ZShenU5lFQ6uDCrmlcSgXkyKvruSormQ/s1600/790px-Detail_of_antlerssed_figure_on_the_Gundestrup_Cauldron-300x227.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"484\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-UQswmmNW740/Vuo4xU-TKGI/AAAAAAABGM0/8ZShenU5lFQ6uDCrmlcSgXkyKvruSormQ/s640/790px-Detail_of_antlerssed_figure_on_the_Gundestrup_Cauldron-300x227.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The naked truth is that there have never ever\nbeen any snakes in Ireland<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Irish still celebrate\nthe festival of Lughnasadh. This Pagan god pilgrimage is converted into a Christian\npilgrimage<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XgJMiu9XFpU/VuzgXUsukdI/AAAAAAABGTE/Uo8hLS18yRM3As3Ou5tTSY0hcxq65IZCg/s1600/06d334d687cc64bd9270ed76583f5e9fe5.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XgJMiu9XFpU/VuzgXUsukdI/AAAAAAABGTE/Uo8hLS18yRM3As3Ou5tTSY0hcxq65IZCg/s400/06d334d687cc64bd9270ed76583f5e9fe5.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Let me quote THE WHITE\nLIE Wikipedia:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; <i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Reek Sunday (Irish: Domhnach na Cruaiche) or\nGarland Sunday is an annual day of pilgrimage in Ireland. On the last Sunday in\nJuly, pilgrims climb Ireland's \"holiest mountain\", Croagh Patrick\n(764 metres) in County Mayo, some in their bare feet. The pilgrimage has been\nheld yearly for about 1,500 years. It is held in honour of Saint Patrick who,\naccording to tradition, spent 40 days fasting on the mountain in the year 441.</span></i>UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The God Lugh on top of\nthis mountain was the TRINITY OF BRAHMA/ VISHNU/ SHIVA<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-l4T83vf11hk/Vuo9s3eE8PI/AAAAAAABGNU/FRPI35aAjw4lDDkXi_jabGYYjksPybHDQ/s1600/imagge.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; Adam is Adama and Eve is Hayyawati , characters from our Hindu Puranas.</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">Adama was the son of Vishnu Kardama. Kardama was the father of Kapila of our Sankhya Philosophy.&nbsp;</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">The bilblical serpent that tempted the couple to eat the apple of the garden of Eden (of the Papa Vriksha- tree of sin ) was Kali Purusha.&nbsp;</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">If all these connections are accurate that would make Adam a younger brother of Kapila.&nbsp;</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">This forest of Eden was on the eastern side of Pradan city 16 square yojanas in size. The Mlecchas are descendants of Adama.</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">Noah is Nyuhah , a descendant of Adama</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">Kali purusha who is the presiding demonic angel of this immoral age of darkness (kali yuga) is verily the Satan mentioned in Abrahamic religions , as per our Bhavishya Purana stolen by Rothschild.&nbsp;</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">The Stone of Jacob appears in the Book of Genesis as the stone used as a pillow at Bet-El. As Jacob had a vision in his sleep, he then consecrated the stone to God.&nbsp;</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">Th Templar Knights found a black Shiva Lingam ( meteorite stone ) which was called the Stone of Scone .&nbsp;</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">In 1296 the original black Shiva lingam stone was captured by Edward I as spoils of war and taken to Westminster Abbey, where it was fitted into a wooden chair, known as King Edward's Chair, on which almost all English sovereigns have been crowned.</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">Over the years the original black stone has disappeared and a duplicate red sand stone put in its place.&nbsp;</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">The stone of Scone is none other than the Shiva Lingam black meteorite stone used by Jacob as a pillow..&nbsp;</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">Jacob performing a bath to the stone, decorating it, applying sandal paste to it, a Vedic ritual named Maha-Rudrabhishekam</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">The Stone, was mentioned in Macbeth: \"... [we shall travel to be] crowned at Scone ..\u201d</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">The duplicate Stone of Scone was last used in 1953 for the coronation of Elizabeth II of the United Kingdom. The original is in the vaults of Rothschild.</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">King Robert the Bruce, the hero of Scotland who led Scotland during the Wars of Scottish Independence against England. Was crowned while sitting on the original black shiva lingam or stone of scone.</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">On Christmas Day 1950, a group of four Scottish students (Ian Hamilton, Gavin Vernon, Kay Matheson, and Alan Stuart) tried to steal this duplicate stone of Scone from Westminster Abbey for return to Scotland. In the process of removing it from the Abbey the duplicate red stone stone broke into two pieces.&nbsp;</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">The original black meterorite Stone of Scone ( from a Kerala Shiva temple in India ) has become a HOLY GRAIL in its own right. Men and women have fought to possess it or to obscure it from those unworthy to lay claim to the Stone.</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">Punch into Google search-</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">SECRET EXCAVATIONS AT JERUSALEM BY TEMPLAR KNIGHTS VADAKAYIL</span><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><br style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\" /><span style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; text-align: justify;\">Well well, what do they know ! , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is WHITE PADDY BULL\n- The story of Tara , in the Catholic Encyclopedia:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\">Returning to Saul, St.\nPatrick learned from Dichu that the chieftains of Erin had been summoned to\ncelebrate a special feast at Tara by Leoghaire, who was the Ard-Righ, that is,\nthe Supreme Monarch of Ireland. This was an opportunity which Patrick would not\nforego; he would present himself before the assembly, to strike a decisive blow\nagainst the Druidism that held the nation captive, and to secure freedom for\nthe glad tidings of Redemption of which he was the herald. As he journeyed on\nhe rested for some days at the house of a chieftain named Secsnen, who with his\nhousehold joyfully embraced the Faith. The youthful Benen, or Benignus, son of\nthe chief, was in a special way captivated by the Gospel doctrines and the\nmeekness of Patrick. Whilst the saint slumbered he would gather sweet-scented\nflowers and scatter them over his bosom, and when Patrick was setting out,\ncontinuing his journey towards Tara, Benen clung to his feet declaring that\nnothing would sever him from him. \u201cAllow him to have his way\u201d, said St. Patrick\nto the chieftain, \u201che shall be heir to my sacred mission.\u201d Thenceforth Benen\nwas the inseparable companion of the saint, and the prophecy was fulfilled, for\nBenen is named among the \u201ccomhards\u201d or sucessors of St. Patrick in Armagh.<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><i><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></i></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THERE IS A GROWING \u201cMODERN PAGAN \u201c MOVEMENT\nIN IRELAND AND USA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They wear black arm bands on March 17th in\nhonor of the dead holocaust victims, to denounce St Patrick with vehement\nhatred is only carrying on the immoral &nbsp;PAPAL\nBULL that has been associated with his gruesome life and &nbsp;evil deeds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Every single Pope had propped up St Patrick\u2019s\nday.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp;<i><span style=\"color: blue;\"> The entire Roman army loses it's morale to\nfight on and flee, killing Honoria on the way back. On the eve of victory,\nAttila takes his son Bleda, (who was named after Atilla's brother) to the\nbattlefield to witness their helpless situation. Aetius, badly injured, fires\nan arrow at Attila, but misses, and kills Bleda. This traumatizes Attila.\nAetius regrets his failed shot, and dies seconds later. Finally on their way to\nRome, the Huns face a sacred procession of priests, led by Pope Leo I. Attila\nis about to kill the Pope, but he says to him calmly, \"You can kill\neverybody...old people, women, children. But remember, Attila, innocent blood\nwon't be washed away. It will come back to you.\" Attila turns back towards\nthe Alps, leaving Rome untouched.</span></i> \u201cUNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Jesus Christ was unknown till the convention\nat Nicea in 325AD. Emperor Constantine exhumed the memory of Jesus Christ and\ndeleted Apollonius of Tyana.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Constantine the Great WAS THE 57TH Emperor of\nthe Roman Empire. The medieval church upheld him as a paragon of virtue and\nboosted Jesus Christ as the messiah.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE VATICAN POPE- ROMAN EMEPROR NEXUS STARTED\nDURING CONSTANTINE THE GREATs TIME.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The first anti-Pagan laws by the Christian\nstate started with Constantine and then driven further by his son Constantius\nII<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">All Hindus temples were burnt down , Druids\nand Hindu priests killed .. Anybody conducting a Yajna was tortured and then\nkilled. Ordinary Christians were rewarded with gold if they gave proof of\nburning down Hindu ( pagan&nbsp; temples ) &nbsp;and monuments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Theodosius the Great, was Roman Emperor from\nAD 379 to AD 395. Theodosius was the last emperor to rule over both the eastern\nand the western halves of the Roman Empire. Theodosius issued the infamous 391\n\"Theodosian decrees,\" a declaration of war on paganism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The \"Theodosian decrees\" banned all\nHindu holidays.&nbsp; The sacred Yagna fire\nwhich burnt continuously for milliniums in the Temple of Vesta in the Roman\nForum was extinguished.&nbsp; &nbsp;All temples to Vesta were round, and had\nentrances facing east.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">There was great gloom in Rome , as the Sacred\nfire of Vesta was closely tied to the fortunes of the city and viewed its\nextinction as a portent of disaster.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 1549, the building was completely\ndemolished and its marble reused in churches and papal palaces.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot;
