, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">May Vishnu construct\nthe womb, may Twashtri fabricate the member, may Prajapati sprinkle the seed,\nmay Dhatri cherish thy embryo;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Sustain the embryo\nSinivali, sustain the embryo Saraswati, may the divine Aswins, garlanded with\nlotuses, sustain thy embryo;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">We invoke thy embryo\nwhich the Aswins have churned with the golden pieces of Arani (firewood), that\nthou mayest bring it forth in the tenth month.</span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2014\u2009<b>Rig Veda 10.184.1 - 10.184.3- 5000 BC<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Garbha Sanskar means --\nmoulding the mind and personality of the unborn .&nbsp; -- \u201c Sanskaro hi gunaantaradhanam \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As per our Vedas a\nchild's mental&nbsp; development starts as\nsoon as he is conceived.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 6000 year\nold Mahabharata,&nbsp; Arjuna\u2019s son Abhimanyu\nlearnt how to enter the Chakravyuha while in the womb.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Modern science has just woken up to the\nsecrets of the 7000 year old Garbha Upanishad. \u201cSupraja janan\u201d,&nbsp; of Ayurveda, involves detoxification of mind\nand body of a would be mother and father&nbsp;&nbsp;\nthree months prior to conception.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the male it increases the quality of his sperm The woman must have a\nsense of gratitude to the father of the baby.&nbsp;\nTimeless rituals like Karva Chaut aid in this.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There have been calls to eliminate the Karva\nChauth festival by Western human rights commentators who hold it to be\n\"anti-women\" and to \"perpetuate the notion of women's slavery to\nmen.\"&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">How wrong they are.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grateful wives\nexperience very deepest&nbsp; levels of\nhappiness.&nbsp; She is nurturing her\nhusband\u2019s sperm. Stress and negativity releases Cortisol which&nbsp; warps the child\u2019s DNA.&nbsp; Warped DNA can even cause gay children\n,retarded children or children with NO empathy.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sound of mother\u2019s heartbeats is the first and nearest sound heard by the\nfetus and hence when the mother takes her crying child close to her the child\nstops crying and becomes calm.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanskrit Mantras&nbsp;\nhave precise golden ratio (1.618) sound harmonics ( Sri Yantra )&nbsp; with mathematical and geometrical precision\nfor resonance..&nbsp; Mantras are scalar\nenergy based longitudinal waves . They are&nbsp;\ncarrier waves with potent information within it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We Hindus have a Gotra\nsystem.&nbsp; That is why in India we have the\nleast homosexuals on this planet by PERCENTAGE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/gotra-system-khap-rules-y-chromosome.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/11/gotra-system-khap-rules-y-chromosome.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatana Dharma\nconception is a holy and planned affair. There is NO bust condom baby syndrome I\nIndia.&nbsp; The FIRST rite of passage marks\nthe milestone where both husband and wife mutually agree to have a child and\nraise a family together as parents.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Atharva Veda, secret\ntantric mantras existed to have a male or female baby and to prevent\nmiscarriages.&nbsp; These VASHIKARAN mantras were\nnever committed on paper to prevent misuse and went on the oral route. &nbsp;&nbsp;The Vedas after 30 millenniums on oral route\nwas committed on paper/ palm leaves in 5000 BC. This<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"> second rite of passage Pumsavana</b>,\nin the first trimester &nbsp;is private.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: lime;\">Srimantham</b> is a family\naffair with close well wishers seeking safe birth of the child. This is the\n<b style=\"background-color: lime;\">third of 16 samskaras.</b> People check out the baby bump, a time for mirth. It is\nobserved in the last trimester of pregnancy .&nbsp;\nThe husband brushed her third eye area with three bunches of darbha\ngrass &nbsp;uttering Bhur, Bhuvah and Svah.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the Srimantham ( Simantonnayana) &nbsp;ritual and until the birth, the woman is\nexpected to not overexert herself, her husband is expected to be by her , keep\nher happy, and not to travel to distant lands.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Soshyantee-madhbhir-abhyukshati\n| Yathaa vaayuh pushkaraneem-samingayati sarvatah Evaa te garbha ejatu\nsahaavaitu jaraayunaa|| Indrasyaayam vrajah kritah saargalah saparisrayah |\nTamindranirjahi garbhena saavaraa(m) saheti ||(6-4-23)</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cJust as the wind\ncauses vibration intensely in the lotus pond on all sides, let your fetus also\ngrow and shine! Let it develop with the outer cover! This abode of Indra has\nbeen made with the door bolted and fenced all round. O Indra! Dispel the\nrestriction as well as the offence caused by the fully developed child in the\nwomb\u201d\u2014so chanting the husband sprinkles the consecrated water on his wife who\nis about to deliver the child.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Jatakarmam&nbsp; is the fourth samskara </b>or rite of passage\nthat celebrates the birth of the baby. It signifies the baby's birth, as well\nas the bonding of the father with the baby.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The father must be there for all to\nwitness that the child is his. There are many places on the planet where NO one\nknows who the baby\u2019s father is.&nbsp; In India\nwe know for sure by a simple ritual .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The father takes\nownership of his child by touching the baby's lips with honey and ghee\n(clarified butter of humped cow ), as Vedic hymns to Goddess Saraswati are\nrecited.&nbsp; He symbolically writes OM on\nhis child\u2019s tongue with a tiny golden spike.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/om-aum-sound-of-zpf-cymatics-sound-of.html\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/07/om-aum-sound-of-zpf-cymatics-sound-of.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Upanishad includes\nprayer to deity Saraswati during this rite of passage, the goddess of knowledge\nand wisdom in Hindu tradition. The father of the child whispers in his ears\n-<span style=\"color: red;\">\u2018Vedosi\u2019, - you shall be a blessed child..</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;At the end of the ritual pronouncements by the\nfather, he gives the baby to the mother's breast for feeding and then all are\nmerry. The main objective of birth ceremony and writing OM is to seek divine\nhelp in arousing all the sensory organs.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Jaate\nagnim-upasamaadhaayaangka aadhaaya ka(m)se prishadaajyam samneeya\nprishadaajyas-yoshaghaatam&nbsp; juhoti-asmin\nsahasram pushyaasamedhamaanah sve grihe asyopasadyaam maacchetseet-prajayaa cha\npasubhischa swaahaa | Mayi praanaa(m)s-tvayi manasaa juhomi swaahaa |&nbsp; Yat-karmanaat-yareericham yadvaa\nnyoonam-ihaakaram | agnishtat-svishtakrid-vidvaansvishta(m) suhutam&nbsp; karotu nah swaahaa-iti (6-4-24)</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the son is born he\nbrings in the fire, by his side, takes the infant on his lap. He mixes\nclarified butter with curds in a cup and then offers oblations again and again\nin the fire reciting the following mantra: \u201cBecoming great in this house of\nmine may I maintain a thousand people in the company of this child! May I be in\nthe company of this child always! May I never depart with children and\nanimals\u2014Swaahaa! The vital force that is in me, I offer by my mind unto\nyou\u2014Swaahaa!\u201d If I have done anything too much or too little in this ceremony,\nmay the all-&nbsp; knowing beneficent Agni\nmake it just right for me, neither&nbsp; too\nmuch nor too little, Swaahaa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Athaasya dakshinam\nkarnam-abhinidhaaya vaag-vaag-iti triratha dadhimadhu ghrita (m)\nsamniyaananatar-hitena jaataroopena praasayati | bhootaste-dadhaami bhuvaste\ndadhaami swaste dadhaami bhoor-bhuvas-suvah sarvam tvayi dadhamiti&nbsp;&nbsp; ||&nbsp;&nbsp;\n(6-4-25)</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then putting his mouth\nnear the right ear of the child he says thrice, \u201cSpeech; Speech; Speech\u201d. Next,\nmixing curd, honey, clarified butter, he feeds the child with a spoon of gold\nsaying, \u201cI put the earth into you. I put the sky into you, I put heaven into\nyou. I put the whole of the earth, heaven and sky into you\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><i>Athainaam maatre pradaaya stanam prayacchati \u2013 yaste stanah sasayo yoe mayobhooryo &nbsp;ratnadhaa &nbsp;vasuvidyah sudatrah &nbsp;| Yena viswaa pushyasi &nbsp;vaaryaani sarswati tamihaa dhaatave kariti || (6-4-27)</i></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">Then he hands him over to his mother to be breast feed saying: \u201cOh Saraswati! That breast of yours which is inexhaustible which &nbsp;is the source of satisfaction, which is full of milk &nbsp;and which &nbsp;is the obtainer of wealth &nbsp;and which is generous &nbsp; and by which you &nbsp;nourish all who are worthy of it \u2013 &nbsp;May you transfer all this to my wife to suckle her baby!\u201d</span></span><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Namakarana is the fifth\nSamskara. </b>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In India we do NOT give bullshit\nnames like Lenin or Stalin or for the matter Dick or Prick \u2013 naming the child\nis a most profound matter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanskrit and Malayalam have\n54 letters which correspond to 54 triple intersections on the Sri Yantra which\nin Shiva-Shakti format forms divine &nbsp;number 108.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/03/theory-of-everything-consciousness-and.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/03/theory-of-everything-consciousness-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Same way there are 27\nnakshatras with 4 padas which makes the number 108.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a Hindus child is\nnamed , the MIDDLE name has to start with one of the 108 sounds.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is pathetic that\nMuslims still claim that the Islamic invaders built the Qutab minar.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/qutab-minar-was-dhruv-stambh-vishnu.html\" style=\"background-color: cyan;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/09/qutab-minar-was-dhruv-stambh-vishnu.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first name of the\nchild can be what the parents choose , and they feel good while calling their child.&nbsp; The child when he grows up in turn must feel\nproud of his name and his chest must swell with pride , if someone calls out\nhis name. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So do NOT name him\nJUDAS or AURANGAZEB or CHOOTIYA.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to the Grhya\nSutras, Namakaranam samskara must be be performed on the tenth or the twelfth\nday after birth.&nbsp;&nbsp; The parents themselves\nperform this ritual. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The father gets the privilege\nof whispering the name into the child\u2019s right ear by deflecting the sound off a\nbetel leaf. &nbsp;&nbsp;The witness audience knows that\nthis man is the father of the child.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A priest in involved in\ndoing a simple puja with fire at witness \u2013and after the father names the child\nthe priest hands over the child\u2019s horoscope to the father with the same name on\nit.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatana Dharma\nculture the names indicates the sex of the child.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This ceremony ends with\na lavish feast<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Athaasya naama karoti\nVedo aseeti | tadasya tadguhyameva naama bhavati </span>|| (6-4-26)</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And then the father\ngives a name: \u201cYou are Veda\u201d. This is&nbsp;&nbsp;\nyour exclusive&nbsp; secret name.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Nishkraman</b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>a&nbsp;</b> is the<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b> 6<sup>th</sup> of the 16\nsamskaras.&nbsp;</b></span> The child is taken for an\nouting after the 4<sup>th</sup> month of birth\u2014by the parents accompanied by\nsiblings.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The child is shown the\nsun for a couple of seconds.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A conch is\nblown immediately after this.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/secrets-of-shankh-or-conch-product-of.html\" style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/secrets-of-shankh-or-conch-product-of.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before the child is\nbrought back to the house he is made to see a humped vedic cow.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If a temple is close by\nthe child is taken during NON-rush hours.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sive te staam\ndyaavaaprithivee asamtaape abhisriyau |</span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>sam te soorya aa tapatu\nsam vaato vaatu te hride | <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>sivaa abhi ksharantu\ntvaapo divyaah payasvateeh || </i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">O Child!&nbsp; At the Nishkramana ceremony may the earth and\nthe whole world shower welfare and benevolence upon you! May the Sun shine\nbrightly upon you!&nbsp; May your chest be filled\nwith fresh life-giving air!&nbsp; May the\ndivine waters quench your thirst! &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Atharva Veda 8/2/14-\n5000 BC</b><br />\n<b style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The <b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">seventh samskara is\nAnnaprashana.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the day the baby\ngets it first solid food .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Ayurveda and\nSanatana Dharma breast deeding is compulsory for 6 months , with nothing else given to the child. This increases the child\u2019s IQ<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Western children a dumb\nbecause their mothers do NOT breast feed them\u2014as their breasts ( and upper lips\n) are filled with plastic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is an occasion to\ncelebrate\u2014family and well wishers are invited.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Kerala we call this\nritual CHORUNNU \u2013 a small ball of &nbsp;cooked\nboiled rice mixed with humped cow ghee is what the child eats \u2013while placed on\na kusha grass mat..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"<i>Twam Annapatihi Annavo Vardhamano Bhooyaaha</i>\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"O child, May you\nbe endowed by God\u00b4s grace with Anna ( food). May you grow in strength and may\nyou live a long life.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After this ceremony it\nis compulsory to feed some poor people with good food.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The last deadline for\nthe ceremony is one year since birth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sivo te staam vreehi\n\u2013yaava-balaa-saavadomadhau | etau yakshmam vi baadheteau munchato&nbsp; aham sah ||</span> </i>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Atharva Veda 8/2/8 5000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;O Child!&nbsp;\nMay barley and rice give you the strength and nourishment! Both destroy\nserious diseases. Being divine both destroy sin.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Chudakarana is the\neighth of the sixteen Hindu sa\u1e43skaras</b> (sacraments), in which a child receives\nhis/her first haircut.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/09/sikha-kudumi-choti-open-flag-of.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/09/sikha-kudumi-choti-open-flag-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>In Sanatana Dharma ,\nthe hair from birth is associated with undesirable traits from past lives.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>Thus\nat the time of the mundana, the child is freshly shaven to signify freedom from\nthe past .&nbsp;</b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>The child must now forge the hinges of his destiny ( in this current birth ) on his own terms ,\nfree will and free choice.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chudakarana is also a\nsymbolic release of the child from his mother.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the time the child must compulsorily stop breastfeeding.&nbsp; He must no longer be physically dependent on\nthe mother.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>A child before Chudkarana is buried&nbsp;\n( has NOT developed individual ego ) , while after Chudakarana is\ncremated.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Kerala we do it&nbsp; before the start of the 28th month.&nbsp; According to the Grhya Sutras, this samskara\nshould take place at the end of first year or before the expiry of the third\nyear.&nbsp;&nbsp; The child\u2019s hair is shorn,\nfrequently leaving only the sikha or kudumi,&nbsp;\na tuft at the crown of the head.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The rite is performed\nas a special ceremony with chanting of Vedic Sanskrit mantras by priests. .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The child's head is\nshaven and a single strand of hair is then symbolically offered to a holy\nriver.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This ceremony is believed to mark\nthe point in the child's life when the mother's influence is reduced, and the\ninfluence of the father becomes dominant.&nbsp;\nWith the father's influence, the child's education is also believed to\nbegin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">LET THE PARENTING BEGIN\n!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Sanatana Dharma the\nbiological father has a HUGE responsibility in parenting unlike black\ncommunities where the child does NOT even know who the father is.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/01/effective-parenting-indian-way-capt.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/01/effective-parenting-indian-way-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/02/effective-parenting-indian-way-part-2.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/02/effective-parenting-indian-way-part-2.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/02/effective-parenting-indian-way-part-3.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/02/effective-parenting-indian-way-part-3.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A muhurta and a\nsuitable location (the temple, the home, or the banks of a river) are\nselected..&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the appointed day, the child is bathed and dressed in new\nclothes. The mother sits with the child to the west of the Agni homam.&nbsp; The father stands to the right of the mother\nand offers oblations to the fire. The cut hair is placed on a mound of humped vedic\ncow&nbsp; dung. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;After the hair is shaved off, it is collected\nand mixed with cow dung and&nbsp; buried. This\nis done so that no one can use the hair in sorcery to harm the child using\nAtharva Veda vashikaran mantras . &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After the ceremony is over, there is a feast\n.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is compulsory to feed a few poor people with good food.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the mother is\nmenstruating on that day, the ceremony should be postponed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092f\u0946\u0928\u093e\u0935\u092a\u0924\u094d\u0938\u0935\u093f\u0924\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0915\u094d\u0937\u0941\u0930\u0946\u0923</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0938\u094a\u092e\u0938\u094d\u092f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Wetting the head for tonsure is mentioned in the all four Vedas.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">WHY DOES 7000 YEAR OLD VEDAS,\nALL FOUR,&nbsp; &nbsp;INSIST TO WET THE SCALP WITH LIVING WATER (\nPREFERABLY FROM A HOLY RIVER ) BEFORE TONSURE ?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Ignoramuses like BR Ambedkar,\nEVR Periyar, UR Anathamurthy, Mahatma Phule Saab, &nbsp;Pansare, &nbsp;Kalburgi, &nbsp;Dhabholkar, &nbsp;Kancha Ilaiya SQUEAK, Wendy Doniger, Sheldon Pollock , literary fest desh\ndrohis, wolves in sheeps clothing Indophiles, &nbsp;anti-hindu Benami Media , Commie historians like Romila Thapar, Irfan\nHabis, JNU Naxal professors , etc will call this superstition. </span></b><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>THERE IS NIL\nSUPERSTITION IN SANATANA DHARMA</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An untied shikha was a\nsymbol of disgrace, impurity and mourning. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chanakya&nbsp; a Namboodiri astronomy, math, surgery\nprofessor of Taxila , swore a terrible oath on his Shikha and brought down a\nmighty empire.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/08/chanakya-taxila-university-professor.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After shaving off the\nhair the sacred symbol AUM is written on the child\u2019s head with SANDAL paste and\nthen fresh turmeric paste was applied on the full scalp and the child given a\nholy bath.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Nivartta\n\u2013yaamyaause-annaadyaaya prajananaaya | Raays-poshaaya suprajaatvaaya\nsuveeryaaya || </i><b>Yajurveda 3/63&nbsp; 5000 BC</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oh Child! I perform the\nshaving ritual so that you may be blessed with long life!&nbsp; I perform the ritual so that you may be able\nto digest the food you eat!&nbsp; May you be\nproductive in what you do!&nbsp; May you be\nblessed with a happy family and children in your life!&nbsp; May you be meritorious wherever you go!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Karnavedhi </b>means\npiercing the ears.&nbsp; It is the <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">9<sup>th</sup>\nof&nbsp; the sixteen Hindu Samskaras. &nbsp;</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My father had pierced\nears . &nbsp;I do not !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Piercing of ear lobe is\ndone with a silver needle&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Wearing of gold\nearrings by women helps to regulate menstrual periods .&nbsp;&nbsp; Greek Hippocrates, wrote about ear piercing\nand earring wearing around 470 BC as a remedy and treatment for menstrual\nproblems. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pythagoras who studied\nin Kodungallur Univeristy , gave his stolen Ayurveda ( excerpts from treatises\nof Susruta and Charaka ) to the grandfather of Hippocrates.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/fathers-of-surgery-and-medicine-4200-bc.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before ear piercing\nfresh turmeric paste is applied on the earlobes and then washed off.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The child is made to\nface east , at a muhurtham from sunrise to noon , and the ear lobes are pierced\nwith the needle in one SMART stroke.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For a boy child the\nfirst ear pierced is the right ear and for a girl child the first ear pierced\nis the left ear. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Due to the white\ninvader\u2019s influence&nbsp; this ritual has been\nlargely discontinued for males<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indians were the first\non this planet to wear ear rings on ear lobes.&nbsp;\nOn both ears symmetrical of course.&nbsp;\nEar piercing is for stimulation of the pituitary and pineal glands. The\nhuman ear indeed has acupuncture points.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As soon as the ear is\npierces a thin GOLD wire is put in the holes of piercing so that it does not\nfill up. A light drop of neem oil is then applied on the holes so that it gets\ncures fast.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karnavedha for males &nbsp;should start with right ear first and then\nleft ear. For female child it starts with left ear first and then right ear.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only an idiot will wear\na ear ring only on one single ear, for it defeats the science.&nbsp;&nbsp; Some do it on the right hand side to show\nthat they are gay -- and all game for a pickup by their immoral ilk.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The right ear lobe\ncorresponds to the left brain. The left ear lobe corresponds to the right\nbrain. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/dvau-bhuja-karanam-thoppu-karanam-itham.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/dvau-bhuja-karanam-thoppu-karanam-itham.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the same\nceremony, the RIGHT nostril of the girl is also pierced for wearing nose\nring-she becomes docile and this eliminates NAGGING. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">North Indian women have\nbeen fooled by the white invader to pierce their left nostril \u2014you can see the\ndifference in behavior . They have also been fooled into worshipping white\nidols and marrying at night.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/11/nagging-unhappiness-at-home-death-of.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/11/nagging-unhappiness-at-home-death-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do you think any girl\nfrom Kerala will behave like the PNJAAABI KUDIs ( who want to go to KNEDAAA ) &nbsp;in MTV roadies , where they give men MAA BEHEN\ngaalis ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Sankara finally emerged victorious. But Ma\u1e47\u1e0dana's wife, who was the judge, would not accept an ascetic as having complete knowledge since he did not have any knowledge about kama sastras (rules about marital life). Sankara was then given a month to research certain aspects of sex-love sciences and then resume the debate. According to legend, he entered into the body of a king who had just died in order to learn these sciences. Later, after obtaining the necessary knowledge, the debate resumed. --UNQUOTE&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>SHANKARACHARYA MUST HAVE LEARNT ABOUT WESTERN PRACTICES LIKE ANAL SEX, ORAL SEX , ANIMAL SEX , GOLDEN SHOWER AND EATING SHIT ?</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>TEE HEE !</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>DONT MAKE ME SAY ANYTHING MORE.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>SHELDON POLLOCK HAD THANKED UR ANANTHAMURTHY WHO PISSED ON A IDOL WORSHIPPED BY HINDUS ( preface and acknowledgements 3rd from last para &nbsp;).</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>WE ASK PM MODI, TO TAKE NOTE OF THIS SARCASTIC \"PEANUT GALLERY\" COMMENT OF NR NARAYANAMURTHYs SON -- &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>-AND DEAL WITH THIS GRUESOME FATHER /SON TWOSOME ACCORDINGLY.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>WE ARE TALKING ABOUT BHARATMATAs &nbsp;PAST &nbsp;!</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>capt ajit vadakayil</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">From the taxi, Netaji sent an envelope to Lal Bahadur Shastri , who came running to welcome him...Then Lal Bahadurji and Netaji went inside the Teenmurthy Bhawan...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">80 Members of Parliament visited PM Shri Lal bahadur Shastri and proclaimed that the monk was none other than Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose-- without any shadow of doubt...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">Why did Netaji go for Nehru's funeral. Probably he was under delusion that the Indian Govt will repeal its \"Netaji is dead\" declaration to Britain-- and welcome him back like how Julius Caesar was welcomed after a campaign in Rome.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">AFTER SHASTRI\u2019S DEATH THERE WAS ONE MORE SECRET EFFORT TO MAKE NETAJI BOSE PM AGAIN, BUT IT FIZZLED OUT AND INDIRA GANDHI TOOK OVER . .</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">Few minutes PM Lal Bahadur Shastri died he had a meeting with Netaji Subhash Chanda Bose in the guise of a journalist at Tashkent USSR and he called up his family and told them he has something of utmost importance to reveal.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">If LB Shastri had died of a heart attack on 11 Jan 1966, he would NOT have blood inside his nose and his body would not be blue .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">Shastri never had a heart problem or even high blood pressure, as given in writing by his doctor Dr. R. N. Chugh.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">LB Shastri\u2019s wife has revealed that NO postmortem was done on Shastri, despite her telling NOT to cremate the body without a proper postmortem.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">Shastri\u2019s son Sunil had claimed that there were cut marks on the abdomen of his father's body . There was a extreme tussle for PM chair ( secret ) , but CIA sponsored Morarji Desai lost out and Russian sponsored Indira Gandhi prevailed.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose was part of the Russian lobby.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">Dr RN Chugh, was killed while on his way to testify in front of the Raj Narain committee ( hit by a truck ).&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">Shastri\u2019s last conversationwas with his daughter Suman I\u2019m going to have a glass of milk and sleep.\u201d&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">The line got disconnected and Suman tried again. However, when she got through 15 minutes later, she was told her father was dead.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">Shastri\u2019s personal servant Ram Nath was run over by a car, his leg had to be amputated and after he came out of anesthesia he lost his memory--most strange !</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">Ram Nath fed Shastri his last meal of spinach, potatoes and a curry at Tashkent \u2013food was prepared in Ambassador TN Kaul\u2019s house, prepared by his cook, Jan Mohammed.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">TN Kaul was a Indira Gandhi loyalist- rabidly anti-american and passionately pro-Soviet.. Nehru used to call him Tikki.&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">Ram Nath said that the food was NOT tasty and Shastri ate very little.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">After that Ram Nath gave him a glass of milk as usual , the last drink before he sleeps&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">Shastri started feeling uneasy and Ram Nath offered to sleep on the floor of the bedroom in the dacha.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">Then Ram Nath gave him a glass of water from a flask on the table. At 1.20 am (Tashkent time), Jagan Nath who was packing their bags recalled, when they suddenly saw Shastri at the door.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">With great difficulty Shastri asked: \u201cWhere is doctor sahib?\u201d&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">It was in the sitting room that a racking cough convulsed Shastri, and his personal assistants helped him to bed. Jagan Nath gave him water and remarked: \u201cBabuji, now you will be all right.\u201d&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">Shastri only touched his chest and then became unconscious.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; line-height: 22.4px;\">When Lalita Shastri was told by Jagan Nath in Delhi that he had given him water, she said: \u201cYou are a very lucky person because you gave him his last cup of water.\u201d</span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; AND THERE WILL BE LESS OF MONEY MAKING</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTransparency International, in its Global Corruption Report, 2007 released on May 25, 2007 came out with a shocking revelation that the estimated amount paid in bribe to the lower judiciary in India during 2006 was around Rs. <span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>2,630 crore.</b></span><br />\n<br />\nHow can they be so sure?<br />\n<br />\nBecause they know who funds the NGOs!<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_1b+seedh9CGD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_1b+seedh9CGD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>WE THE PEOPLE OFTEN WONDER WHAT OUR \"COLLEGIUM JUDGES\" WANT..</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>BECAUSE THEY SEEM TO BE MORTALLY AFRAID OF JEW NOAM CHOMSKY.</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 16.0pt;
