, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><b>We want the elected legislature to amend the\nconstitution , find an easy way to punish 100% sure TRAITOR TO WATAN JUDGES in\nthis electronic age of video and hidden cams.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our Constitution or any\nother law have proved to be insufficient in punishing higher judiciary. It happened\nin the case of K. Veeraswami, a former judge of the Madras High Court who was\nprosecuted under the Prevention of Corruption Act, 1946 for financial gains.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He\nfought his case 134 in 1991 in the Supreme Court which held that a sanction\nfrom the Chief Justice was needed before a criminal case could be registered\nagainst a judge.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A charge framed under the Prevention of Corruption Act, 1946\nwithout the prior approval of the Chief Justice of India lacked the force to&nbsp; prosecute a judge charged with corruption.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Constitution of India provides for removal of a judge by way of impeachment\non the grounds of proved misbehavior or incapacity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The instance of Justice\nV. Ramaswamy shows that the constitutional mechanism of impeaching a corrupt\njudge may fail in the absence of the support of a two-third majority in the\nParliament.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">V. Ramaswamy, the son-inlaw of V. Veeraswami\n</b>was the first judge to face impeachment for financial irregularities committed\nduring his term as a Punjab and Haryana High Court judge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But he got away with\nimpeachment as the Congress MPs sitting in opposition completely abstained from\nvoting in the Tenth Lok Sabha.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The constitutional provisions of impeaching an\nerrant judge can thus fail by BILDERBERG CLUB controlled political\nmanipulations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The faith of WE THE\nPEOPLE in the judiciary has been eroded because MeLord judges are NOT afraid of\nstigma or punishment.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During the recent\ntimes, corruption in the judiciary is at an all time high as stories of judicial\nmisconduct continue to tumble out of judicial cupboards.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2002, at least\nthirty-four sitting judges from all the three tiers of the Uttar Pradesh judiciary\ncame under scanner for their alleged involvement in the Ghaziabad Court employees\nprovident fund scam. The investigation against the erring judges is on.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Of late, the two\ndevelopments that have embarrassed the country\u2019s higher judiciary are the\ncash-for-judge scam and the misappropriation of money by a High Court judge. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the cash-at-judge door\nscam, Justice Nirmal Yadav, a sitting judge of Punjab and Haryana High Court\nwas relieved from judicial work after her name was involved for a receiving a\nbag of Rs. 15 lakhs.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The bag containing Rs. 15 lakhs was mistakenly delivered\nat the residence of Justice Nirmaljit Kaur, another sitting judge of the Punjab\nand Haryana High Court. Now, Justice Nirmal Yadav had asked the&nbsp; Chief Justice of India to take her back to\nwork \u201cas nothing has been proved\u201d.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">second incident\ninvolves Justice Soumitra Sen of the Calcutta High Court who was held guilty of\ncriminal misappropriation when he was an advocate and appointed receiver in a\nlawsuit. </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">hereafter he became a judge of\nthe Calcutta High Court.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">On receipt of a report from the Chief Justice of the\nCalcutta High Court, the Chief Justice of India had recommended the Prime\nMinister for removing Justice Sen from office. The proposal to impeach Justice\nSen is yet to materialize. The errant judge had rejected the advice to resign\nor seek voluntary retirement after he was found guilty of misconduct. Recently\nJustice Sen resigned before he faced the Lok Sabha proceedings for impeachment.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Corruption, land-grabbing charges and abuse of judicial office are among the sixteen\ncharges framed against Justice P.D. Dinakaran currently facing removal proceedings\nin the Parliament.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Justice Dinakaran as\nChief Justice of the Karnataka High Court was recommended for being appointed a\nSupreme Court judge in August. 2009.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">But after the land grabbing allegations\nwere levelled, he went on leave and his elevation was stopped. Thereafter he\nwas shifted to the Sikkim High Court as Chief Justice.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Read about Tamil dalit Christian\nconvert Paul Daniel Dinakaran Premkumar below-</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/P._D._Dinakaran\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/P._D._Dinakaran</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Read about V Ramaswami\nbelow-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/V._Ramaswami\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/V._Ramaswami</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Read about Saumitra Sen\nbelow-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soumitra_Sen\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soumitra_Sen</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Read about KG\nBalakrishnan below-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/K._G._Balakrishnan\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/K._G._Balakrishnan</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Read about the PF scam\nbelow-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/CBI-court-frames-charges-against-6-retired-judges-in-PF-scam/articleshow/26499940.cms\">http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/CBI-court-frames-charges-against-6-retired-judges-in-PF-scam/articleshow/26499940.cms</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/politics-and-nation/ghaziabad-pf-scam-approvers-allege-forcible-deposition-against-retired-judges/articleshow/49220684.cms\">http://economictimes.indiatimes.com/news/politics-and-nation/ghaziabad-pf-scam-approvers-allege-forcible-deposition-against-retired-judges/articleshow/49220684.cms</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A former Chief Justice\nof India was accused of getting special treatment for his daughter, a\npracticing lawyer in the Supreme Court during his tenure as the Chief Justice\nof India.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another Chief Justice of India was accused of using his position as\nthe CJI to get the subordinate judiciary to rule in favour of his mother-in-law\nin a suit that had been barred by limitation for decades.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Similarly another\nChief justice of India faced allegations of delivering orders against the principles\nof natural justice and also for furthering business interests of his family.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No charges were,\nhowever, proved in any of the above instances.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cWhen the robed\nbrethren break the code of correct conduct or rob the rule of law of its\nefficacy, sanctity and majesty, they too must be subject to severe discipline\nand punitive action in case of delinquency and aberration\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></span></b><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><a href=\"http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/SC-favours-I-T-probe-against-former-CJI-K-G-Balakrishnans-kin/articleshow/48978031.cms\">http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/SC-favours-I-T-probe-against-former-CJI-K-G-Balakrishnans-kin/articleshow/48978031.cms</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">BELOW ASSET DECLARATION ON VOLUNTARY BASIS -</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<a href=\"http://supremecourtofindia.nic.in/assets.htm\">http://supremecourtofindia.nic.in/assets.htm</a><o:p></o:p></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When an attempt was\nmade to bring the judiciary within the purview of the Right to Information Act,\n2002, the judiciary voiced strong oppositions against it.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Former Chief Justice\nof India, K. G. Balakrishnan went to the extent of saying that since the CJI is\nnot a constitutional authority it does not come within the purview of the RTI&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\ncontentions of the CJI was, however, rejected by a parliamentary committee\nheaded by E. M. Sudarsana Natchiappanan on 29 April, 2008. The Committee held\nthat the judiciary comes under the purview of the Right to Information law with\nregard to all activities of administration except \u201cjudicial decision making\u201d.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Interpreting section 2(h) of the RTI Act, the Committee said that from the\ndefinition of \u2018public authority\u2019, it is clear that all the constitutional authorities\ncome under the definition of \u2018public authority\u2019.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">That all the wings of the State\n\u2013 executive, legislature and judiciary are fully covered under this Act since\nall organs of the State are accountable to the citizens of India in a\ndemocratic state. The judiciary cannot immunize itself from judicial\naccountability under the RTI Act.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Judicial Standards and Accountability Bill\nwas brought by UPA govt but had lapsed following dissolution of the 15th Lok\nSabha in 2014.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">If India has to be tis planet\u2019s superpower in\n17 years, we must bring as fresh a bill that seeks to change the present system\nof probing complaints of \u201cmisbehavior, incapacity and <b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">DIS</b><b><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">LOYALTY TO WATAN </span></b>\u201d\nagainst Supreme Court and high court judges.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The flawed procedure\nfor removal of higher court judges has been exposed by the antics of Justice CS\nKarnan of the Madras high court. Transferred to the Calcutta high court as a\ndisciplinary measure, Karnan stayed the transfer order of the Chief Justice of\nIndia TS Thakur.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In his five-year-long tenure as permanent judge, Karnan has\nacted in gross disregard of judicial impropriety several times. He has\nthreatened to invoke the SC/ST Prevention of Atrocities Act against his\ncolleagues on the Madras Bench and even shot off letters alleging\ndiscrimination to the National Commission for SC/ST.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He had also accused the\nchief justice of the Madras HC SK Kaul of caste discrimination in apportioning\njudicial work. Though impeachment is the only provision available for removing\nhigh court and supreme court judges, the difficulty of garnering two-thirds\nmajority of those present and voting, has led to the provision being sparingly\nused.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is despite many judges in high courts facing allegations of corruption,\nsexual harassment, and misbehaviour. &nbsp;&nbsp;It\nis high time we enact the Judicial Standards and Accountability Bill which\nproposes alternate and easier processes for removal of judges.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The judiciary must not\ndepend upon any legislation to enforce discipline among its robed brethren.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An independent\njudiciary is an indispensable requisite of a free society under the&nbsp; rule of law. Such independence implies\nfreedom from interference by the executive or the legislature in the exercise\nof the judicial function but it does not mean that the judge is entitled to act\nin an arbitrary manner.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>We\nmust NEVER forget that the COLLGIUM Supreme Court of India &nbsp;has grabbed power by JUDICIAL ADVENTURISM.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">And to\nremove a COLLEGIUM judge they have made it almost impossible, because our\nUNELECTED Rajya Sabha is still controlled by BIG BROTHER whom we kicked out in\n1947.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/abolish-rajya-sabha-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/abolish-rajya-sabha-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><b>Today\nby methods chosen by BILDERBERG CLUB, &nbsp;the Indian judiciary with the Supreme Court at\nits head and eighteen high courts in the State is THE most powerful judiciary\nin the world.</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: orange; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: orange;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/shrewd-club-within-naive-bilderberg.html\"><span style=\"background-color: orange; color: black;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/shrewd-club-within-naive-bilderberg.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE INDIAN JUDICIARY IS\nGUILTY OF PUSHING FOR TOTAL INDEPENDENCE , TO BE A DICTATOR, WHILE AT THE SAME\nTIME THEY PUSHED FOR NIL ACCOUNTABILITY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IS NONSENSE \u2013 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I SAY THIS AS A LEADER\nOF MEN , A COMMANDER OF SHIPS FOR 3 DECADES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Melords\npushed their Melordship through its decisions in three main cases popularly\nknown as the First, Second and Third Judges cases. ( THREE JUDGES CASE )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Three_Judges_Cases\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Three_Judges_Cases</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Collegium system is\none where the Chief Justice of India and a forum of four senior-most judges of\nthe Supreme Court recommend appointments and transfers of judges. However, it\nhas no place in the Indian Constitution. The CJI / President / ELECTED PM must\nfollow the constitution.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The system was evolved\nthrough Supreme Court judgments in the Three Judges Cases: S.P. Gupta case\n(December 30, 1981) or the First Judges Case: It declared that the \u201cprimacy\u201d of\nthe CJI\u2019s recommendation on judicial appointments and transfers can be refused\nfor \u201ccogent reasons.\u201d The ruling gave the Executive primacy over the Judiciary\nin judicial appointments for the next 12 years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Supreme Court Advocates\non Record Association versus Union of India or the Second Judges Case(October\n6, 1993): The majority verdict gave back CJI\u2019s power over judicial appointments\nand transfers.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It says the CJI only need to consult two senior-most judges.\n\u201cThe role of the CJI is primal in nature because this being a topic within the\njudicial family, the Executive cannot have an equal say in the matter,\u201d the\nverdict reasoned. However, confusion prevails as the CJIs start taking\nunilateral decisions without consulting two colleagues. The President is\nreduced to only an approver.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Special Reference\ncase of 1998 or the Three Judges Case (October 28, 1998): On a reference from\nformer President K.R. Narayanan, the Supreme Court lays down that the CJIs\nshould consult with a plurality of four senior-most Supreme Court judges to\nform his opinion on judicial appointments and transfers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">WHEN A PEDOPHILE\nMOLESTS A SMALL CHILD, &nbsp;HE / SHE WORKS THIS WAY\u2014</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">SLOW AND STEADY ! <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">PEHLA LOLLIPOP . <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">FINALLY SOMETHING &nbsp;ELSE TO SUCK ON .</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-z_iKPB4Qers/VuaYyWzyjJI/AAAAAAABGGY/MuGtu52w7vME732r52wZGsesRwbjHfgWQ/s1600/2b12e9854d58f377bb3d96e42eca9f2363.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-z_iKPB4Qers/VuaYyWzyjJI/AAAAAAABGGY/MuGtu52w7vME732r52wZGsesRwbjHfgWQ/s640/2b12e9854d58f377bb3d96e42eca9f2363.jpg\" width=\"426\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MAJAA HAI !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BILDERBERG CLUB KI JAI\n!<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-decoration: none;\">March 14, 2016 at 4:43 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_66MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi ks,<br />\n<br />\nLOOKS LIKE MODI DOES NOT CARE FOR A NOBEL PRIZE ANYMORE.<br />\n<br />\nINDIA HAS NEVER BEEN A PART OF THE COWBOY RIDING POSSE LED BY YANK SHERIFF USA, TILTING AT EVERY IMAGINARY WINDMILL.<br />\n<br />\nNOR<br />\n<br />\nWILL INDIA BE EVER PART OF IT IN FUTURE.<br />\n<br />\nCHINA IS OUR NEIGHBOUR<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadkayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_67b+seediKmVD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_67b+seediKmVD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c464343799204114274\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'times new roman', times, freeserif, serif; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_348M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2015/12/thermal-coal-power-plants-clean-exhaust.html?showComment=1457956296708#c464343799204114274\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">March 14, 2016 at 5:21 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_348MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nSTOP PRESS:</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe current high global temperatures are due to METHANE LEAKS .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nUS President Obama in his SOTU address , kept quiet of the excessive Methane leaks due to FRACKING in USA.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMethane emissions are currently unregulated by the federal government.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nAll estimates of methane emissions from the US oil and gas sector are foul KOSHER LIES</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe US alone is responsible for 64% of the global growth in human-caused atmospheric methane emissions since past 15 years .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nOn February 20th, 2016, for about 12 hours, the NOAA METOP measure recorded a major atmospheric methane spike in the range of 3,096 parts per billion at 20,000 feet in altitude.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nA polar cap has a purpose in nature, to regulate temperature, ocean currents and atmospheric circulation. To cause its melting is to remove a MASSIVE regulatory mechanism . This is a snowballing thingy causing more methane to be released prematurely.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nPARIS COP21 has fooled he world by ignoring potent greenhouse gas Methane and concentrating on harmless Carbon Dioxide.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMethane is the product of very old decaying matter (plants and trees from long ago) and is trapped predominantly within several meters of the surface in the Arctic Tundra and in the form of frozen methane hydrates on the Arctic sea bed. It is ordinarily locked into permafrost and thus is held in an inert state.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nOnly global warming (or an asteroid striking the sea bed) can release what otherwise would be held safely by nature. There are billions of tonnes of methane stored there</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMethane is more than 86 times stronger than the same mass of carbon dioxide over a 20-year time frame ( 38 times as potent over the span of a century )</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Aliso Canyon leak ( Portland Ranch, California ) leak spewed enough methane into the atmosphere to equal the greenhouse gases emitted by more than 620,000 cars in a year.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nMethane amplifies warming dramatically in the short term.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe methane in the permafrost is already leaking. Huge blowholes appear from time to time, occurring when trapped methane melts and then explodes creating a huge crater. More and more of them are appearing, both on land and in the sea. There is a methane pall in the atmosphere around the North Pole moving ever further south.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe warming has occurred where the methane is and the disappearance of the sea ice (from 2016 onwards) will certainly increase methane melt on the seabed. This is really bad news for humanity for this is indicative of a rapidly destabilizing pole.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nVast amounts of methane could be released at any time. Methane releases in the Arctic Tundra (on land) cause regional warmings and a dispersal of greenhouse gas methane throughout the atmosphere.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThis is already happening and methane emissions are spiking.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThere is enough methane in the melting Tundra permafrost alone to end all life here.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nControlling CO2 emissions then becomes a pointless exercise, for CO2 is tame (with a time lag between emissions and warming). Methane causes almost instant warming and will push the world into a 5-12 degree Celsius temperature increase (with the extinction level threshold reached at around 4 degrees) Even a sudden release of just 1% of the methane in the Tundra would make humanity extinct</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Arctic has remained very cold overall for the past 3 million years of long ice ages and brief interglacials.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">METHANE LEAKS AFFECT INDIAs MONSOONS.</span></b><br />\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nPM MODI MUST NOT WAIT FOR USA TO DECLARE A WORLD EMERGENCY\u2014 WE INDIANS MUST DO THIS.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_348BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Policymaking is best left to the executive. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; I DID THIS FOR 30 YEARS .<br />\n<br />\nThe psychoactive compounds found in the opium plant include morphine and codeine.<br />\n<br />\nMORPHINE INJECTIONS ARE NOW BANNED ON SHIPS .<br />\n<br />\nCodeine does NOT suppress cough .<br />\n<br />\nThere are lakhs of Indian youth addicted to codeine cough syrups.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_14M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A parliamentary\nstanding committee, chaired by E. M. Sudarsana Natchiappan, stated that\n\"to meet the ends of social justice and equity,\" the quota for the\nScheduled Cates, the Scheduled Tribes and Other Backward Classes (OBCs) should\nbe extended to the higher judiciary.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HEY HOW ABOUT ARMY\nGENERALS , BRAIN SURGEONS AND CRICKET TEAM &nbsp;TOO ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CJI MELORD ARE THE\nINDIAN JUDGES HAVING A HIDDEN UNION ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">12 year ago, more than\ntwo dozen judges of the Punjab and Haryana High Court went on a &nbsp;mass leave. 25 judges of the Punjab and\nHaryana High Court took offence when the Chief Justice, B. K. Roy, issued\nnotices to two judges of the high court, questioning them about accepting free\nmembership to a private golf club on the outskirts of Chandigarh.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A public\ninterest litigation (PIL) was pending against the golf club in the high court.\nThe judges found the interference offensive and protested by going on mass\nleave.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">President A.P.J. Kalam\nshot off a sharp and disapproving letter to the Chief Justice of India (CJI).\nOur current President would have continued walking on his lawns eating MISTI\nDOHI.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Striking might be a\nlegitimate weapon of protest in a democracy,but workers going on strike and\njudges going on strike are a different kettle&nbsp;\nof fish.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Strikes as an\ninstrument of protest are only legitimate for those sections of society that\nare either marginalised or trying for a collective bargain.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The judiciary does\nnot fall in either category.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\njudiciary is not a part of the working class. It forms the ruling\nestablishment. It is odd for them to go on strike. Judges have routinely come\ndown on workers and lawyers for using strikes as a mode of protest.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This one-day\nmass leave has eroded the common man\u2019s faith in the judiciary. The judges have\nbehaved like they were in a trade union let my JNU student Kanhaiya Kumar , by\ngoing on an arbitrary mass leave.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT\nGET SURPRISED IF CM OF DELHI KHUJLIWAL GOES ON STRIKE.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS SLIME BALL IS THE MOST DANGEROUS MAN IN INDIA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Melords, in a working democracy\nmany matters and controversies are best resolved in non-judicial setting<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Can you believe this?&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was a Punjab and Haryana High Court\norder directing creation of posts of tractor driver to accommodate two\ngardeners employed on daily wages at a golf club run by the Haryana Tourism\nCorporation and were asked to perform the duties of tractor drivers.</span></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; AND THE\nPOLICE MAY SAY , YOU DO IT YOURSELF . <o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
