text-decoration: none;\">March 12, 2016 at 9:35 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_10MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSTOP PRESS:<br />\n<br />\nTHE BENAMI MEDIA IS GOING OVERBOARD WITH THE INTELLECTUAL AND THINKER BRANDING OF JNU STUDENTS.<br />\n<br />\nIF THERE EVER WAS A \"NIL CLASS\" , CRASS, FOUL MOUTHED, RUSTIC , STUDENT / PROFESSOR BODY IN INDIAN UNIVERSITIES IT IS IN JNU.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nWHENEVER THE COMMIE STUDENTS / PROFESSORS OF JNU WANTED TO FIX A DESH BHAKT PROFESSOR, THEY WOULD SMEAR HUMAN SHIT ON THE DOOR , AS A WARNING .<br />\n<br />\nTHIS HAS NEVER BEEN REPORTED DUE TO THE FEAR FACTOR .<br />\n<br />\nhttp://www.business-standard.com/article/pti-stories/jnu-councillor-alleges-that-door-of-his-room-defaced-116031200749_1.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"article_content clearfix\" itemprop=\"text\" style=\"background-color: white; border: 0px; color: #333333; font-family: proxima-regular1, roboto, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; font-stretch: normal; line-height: 27px; margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"></span><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">#############################################</span>\n</span><span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/Publish-annual-bulletin-of-oldest-cases-to-highlight-pendency-says-PM-Modi/articleshow/51372681.cms</span></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">Publish\nannual bulletin of oldest cases to highlight pendency, says PM Modi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPTI | Mar 12, 2016, 05.38 PM IST<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPM Modi mooted a novel idea of courts coming out with an\nannual bulletin to highlight the oldest cases being tried by them to help\ncreate sensitivity on pendency of cases in the country.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPM also sought suggestions on making the bar, bench and\ncourts tech-savvy by injecting digital technology in their functioning.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPATNA: <span style=\"color: blue;\">Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Saturday mooted a\nnovel idea of courts coming out with an annual bulletin to highlight the oldest\ncases being tried by them to help create sensitivity on pendency of cases in\nthe country.</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nSpeaking at the closing ceremony of centenary celebrations\nof Patna high court,<span style=\"color: blue;\"> he also sought suggestions on making the bar, bench and\ncourts tech-savvy by injecting digital technology in their functioning.</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n\"I have to make a suggestion on an idea I just thought\nabout and that is can o<span style=\"color: blue;\">ur courts every year bring out a bulletin that\nhighlights the oldest cases pending before them. Some may be 40 years or 50\nyears old and that could create sensitivity among people on the pendency of\ncases in the court.</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">\"This would inspire others to do something about the\npendency. It is not wrong to do so. This could help create an atmosphere to\ncome out of the problem of pendency of case,\" he said addressing the\ngathering.</span><o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTalking about advent of technology in all spheres, the Prime\nMinister said that earlier, a lot of time was spent on doing research in legal\nfield whereas now one can google anything in a short time.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n\"<span style=\"color: purple;\">Now we have something that we did not have earlier -\nthe power of technology. How much techno-savvy can we make the bar, the bench\nand the courts by injecting digital technology in their functioning and help\nwork towards improving the quality of judgments and arguments by using\ntechnology actively,\" </span>he said.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nModi shared the stage with Bihar chief minister Nitish\nKumar, with whom he had traded barbs during the assembly polls last year.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nThe PM said the Patna high court has in the last 100 years\nscaled new heights.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n\"I hope the best aspects are carried forward in the\nyears to come. Though it is time to remember the good things of this high court\nin the last century, it is also time to lay a strong foundation for the coming\ncentury.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n\"This is also a time for new resolves and to think of\nnew benchmarks and I hope the Bar and the Bench works towards setting new\nbenchmarks to take this institution forward. Those who have a century of\nheritage can surely give a lot to take the country forward,\" he said.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nWishing the institution on the occasion, the Prime Minister\nhoped the country will get a lot from the high court in the coming time.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nModi also recalled the important role played by legal\nluminaries in the freedom struggle and narrated an incident during his visit to\nLondon where he was \"gifted\" with the return of membership of a noted\nlawyer in the 1930s who was stripped of it by the Bar there for participating\nin the independence movement.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b>#####################################################################</b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Did the COLLEGIUM\nMelords approve of black bagging Sreeshant, which even Islamic terrorists like\nAjmal Kasab were spared of ?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">How come not even one\njudge spoke about it \u2014 considering Sreeshant was part of the Gold medal winning Indian\nteams of Test/ ODI and T20 cricket?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Is it because he was\nnot a Dalit or a Christian or a Muslim or a woman or a chakka ?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PIL in India started\noff as some welcome moves by the COLLEGIUM judges to protect the fundamental\nrights of the oppressed and downtrodden</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It metamorphosed into FOREIGN FUNDED\nTROJAN HORSE NGOs using the judiciary to screw the ELECTED executive.&nbsp; It was clear that a foreign hand was involved\nin several cases.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The SC did some self\nanalysis on public outcry and spAke:&nbsp; <i>\u201cPublic\ninterest litigation is a weapon which has to be used with great care and\ncircumspection and the Judiciary has to be extremely careful to see that behind\nthe beautiful veil of public interest an ugly private malice, vested interest\nand/ or publicity seeking is not lurking. It is to be used as an effective\nweapon in the armoury of law for delivering social justice to the citizens. The\nattractive brand name of public interest litigation should not be used for\nsuspicious products of mischief. It should be aimed at the redress of genuine\npublic wrong or public injury and not publicity oriented or founded on personal\nvendetta</i>\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n<b><br /></b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today judicial activism\nhas reached the line of tyranny and despotism&nbsp;\n.&nbsp; We the people do NOT appreciate\nthe COLLEGIUM melords assuming the mantle of arrogant righteousness.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the internet age and we know what is\nhappening - even in the middle of a FART, it comes out on twitter via a mobile phone..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Judicial activism has\nnow reached the proportions of judicial fundamentalism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\">Justice\nJ.S. Verma spAke - \u201cJudicial activism and judicial restraint are two faces of the same\ncoin. Self-discipline is to be practiced strictly by the members of the\njudiciary and judges must refrain from commenting on policy matters.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Courts are not\nrepresent active bodies. &nbsp;They are not\ndesigned to be a good reflex of a democratic society. &nbsp;They do NOT have the training or the technical\nwherewithal .Their essential quality is detachment, founded on independence of\nthe judiciary is jeopardized when courts become embroiled in the passion of the\nday, and assume primary responsibility in choosing between&nbsp; compelling&nbsp;\npolitical, economic, and&nbsp; social\npressures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; line-height: 22.4px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSTOP PRESS:<br />\n<br />\nONE OF MY READERS ASKED ME , WHY DID THE TELUGU COMMIES TURN COAT IN 1948 AND START KILLING THE RAZAKARS , THEIR COMRADES IN ARMS.<br />\n<br />\nWELL I HAD BRIEFLY MENTIONED THIS IN MY POST BELOW-<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/razakers-of-mim-operation-polo-to-annex.html</span><br />\n<br />\nTHIS SUBJECT DESERVES A FULL POST LATER ON.<br />\n<br />\nMY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"> 16.10 %.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nTHE KERALA NAXAL MOVEMENT OF KUNNIKKAL NARAYANAN , HIS WIFE MANDAKINI AND DAUGHTER AJITHA WAS ALL ABOUT, GRABBING HINDU TEMPLE LANDS AND DESTROYING THE LAND RECORDS ( REGISTRY OFFICES ) AND FIRs ( POLICE STATION ).<br />\n<br />\nAS SOON AS CRYPTO JEW NIZAM OF HYDERABAD ANNOUNCED HIS SURRENDER ON RADIO AFTER OPERATION POLO- IMMEDIATELY THERE WAS A GRUESOME GENOCIDE-NOT REPORTED IN ANY ROTHSCHILDs MAIN STREAM MEDIA OR BY HIS STOOGE HISTORIANS.<br />\n<br />\nThe opportunist Communists had supported Jew Rothschild ( Britain ) in the 1942 Quit India movement.<br />\n<br />\nFrom 1942 to 1948 , the Communists supported the Nizam of Hyderabad and the Razakars.<br />\n<br />\nThey tuned coat and started killing landlords and their entire families.<br />\n<br />\nThe local registry offices were burnt to destroy any vestige of land records.<br />\n<br />\nThe communist leaders usurped the land and gave away some land to their closest commie supporters..<br />\n<br />\nYou can trace back these communist leader peasants who suddenly became rich landowners in 1948.<br />\n<br />\nToday they are all huge landowners, with NO class .<br />\n<br />\nMost of the Muslim landowners who survived escaped to Karanataka . This was just a repeat of what happened in Pakistan to the Hindu landowners.<br />\n<br />\nwell, well what do you know !<br />\n<br />\nwhat does HERO Kanhaiya Kumar ( who wants PHELLOSSSIPP ) and his Commie professors in JNU know !<br />\n<br />\nUTLA CHOR KOTWAAL KO DAANTE ?<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_22M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Roy came all the way to Bombay to meet\nSA Dange.&nbsp; MN Roy and his Jewish honey\npot wife Evelyn Trent founded the \u00e9migr\u00e9 Communist Party of India on 17 October\n1920 in Tashkent. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">On the day India got freedom,&nbsp; in 15 August 1947 , our man SA Dange was in\nMoscow talking to the Soviet leaders\u2014for what?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In 1951 four leaders travelled as stowaways\nfrom Calcutta port on a Russian ship from Calcutta. They were Ajoy Ghosh , S.A.\nDange,&nbsp; C. Rajeswara Rao and M. Basava\nPunnaiah.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These four leaders, two from each centre,\nwere brought to Moscow by&nbsp; political\njournalist Nikhil Chakravartty, the editor of Mainstream who planned the entire\njourney.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These four leaders met with top CPSU leaders at\nMoscow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The first meeting was attended from the\nSoviet side by Comrades Suslov, Malenkov and Molotov.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">On the third day&nbsp; Comrade Stalin made an appearance, and he did\nso for subsequent days too . Stalin only listened rarely sat at the table but\nkept pacing up and down smoking his pipe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Rothschild stooge Stalin told C Rajeshwara\nRao that Nehru was too popular to be brought down by a Chinese model revolution\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Stalin told the gruesome foursome that India\nwas not an independent country , but was still ruled indirectly by proxy by\nBritish colonialists.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">This was in 1951, 4 years after our Indian\nindependence.&nbsp; He said that the\nCommunists could eventually advance only by heading an armed revolution.. ... <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; At the national level, each individual shall have appropriate access to\ninformation concerning the environment that is held by public authorities,\nincluding information on hazardous materials and activities in their communities,\nand the opportunity to participate in decision-making processes. States shall\nfacilitate and encourage public awareness and participation by making\ninformation widely available. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Locus standi is a Latin\nphrase meaning \u201cplace to stand\u201d. It refers to whether or not someone has the\nright to be heard in court. People may use the term \u201cstanding\u201d or \u201clegal\nstanding\u201d to describe this concept.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THIS IDEA CAME FROM\nABROAD , GERMINATED IN THE MINDS OF FOREIGN BLACK MAMBAS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vlEIomyEJw4/VuWZK4-a2vI/AAAAAAABGEQ/Rj__qFr22484VesgUi3uRypZ-py04-1jg/s1600/jursycat.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"277\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-vlEIomyEJw4/VuWZK4-a2vI/AAAAAAABGEQ/Rj__qFr22484VesgUi3uRypZ-py04-1jg/s400/jursycat.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Who has given MElord\njudges the green signal to give priority to PILs ( with NO \u201cimminent\u201d nature &nbsp;qualification ) over &nbsp;regular business?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Former\nChief Justice of India JS Verma drew all round acclaim in the mid-90s for\ntaking up the Jain hawala diary case that revealed pay-offs to politicians and\nbureaucrats.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Early days of the probe\nsent panic waves within the political and bureaucratic establishment. The CBI\nwas on an overdrive filing FIRs and chasing all those who figured in the diary\nas recipients of pay-offs.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many politicians like LK Advani, VC Shukla, Madhav\nRao Scindia and Narain Dutt Tewari were booked. Politics was sent into a\ntailspin. The Congress split and it proved a major factor behind the defeat of\nthe ruling party in the 1996 elections.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And then things began\nto change.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The high court refused to entertain the pages of the diary as a book\nof account. Then curious things began to happen. Justice Verma did a volte face\nand assrted that he was not guiding the investigation, but only making sure\nthat the agencies do their job. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One day he shocked\neveryone by saying that there was an attempt to pressurise the hawala bench of\nthe Supreme Court. Interestingly, he did not refer the matter to the CBI.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another judge in the bench owned up that he had unwittingly landed up at the\nresidence of one of the prime accused to have tea.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Slowly, all the cases\nagainst those in the scam were thrown out, even when three of those in the list\n\u2014 the late Rajesh Pilot, Devi Lal and Sharad Yadav \u2014 owned up that they had\ntaken bribes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The case, after\ninfluencing the national agenda for a couple of years, ended in a whimper.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Handling of the hawala case once again brought to the fore the inadequacy of\nthe PIL to bring erring public servants to book. If there is any substance to\npressure being brought on the hawala bench, can it be argued that the courts\nare not completely immune to pressure from vested interests. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let us remind ourselves YET YANOTHER time -- the traditional understanding of the judicial process is that while\nthe legislature makes laws and the executive implements them, the judiciary\u2019s\nfunction is ONLY to interpret and apply the law to the facts of a particular\ncase.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As an organic document,\na written Constitution chiefly performs two&nbsp;\nmain tasks-&nbsp; firstly, it sets up\nthe organs of governance, and secondly, having set up these institutions, it\nprovides a recourse against the abuse of power by these organs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Public Interest\nLitigation is a good thing when it is used to enforce the rights of the\ndisadvantaged.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;But what we see is that\nPIL system has been hijacked by FOREIGN FUNDED TROJAN HORSE NGO to dilute, to\ninterfere and bush whack the ELECTED government, and &nbsp;to take decisions on a range of policy\nmatters.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I still do not understand how JEW NOAM CHOMSKY gets himself accommodated\nto screw the watan<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Judicial activism in\nloose terms can be defined as \u201cJudiciary taking on the responsibilities of\nLegislature\u201d. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The role of the judiciary\nis interpreting the laws made by the parliament or say interpreting the\nconstitution and not making laws itself--w</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">hich is in exclusive domain and\nprerogative of legislature.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian constitution\nmakers were not in favour of judiciary being a law making institutes and strictly\nconfined its role to an interpreter as it is apparent from Article 21 which\nsays procedure established by the law is an essence of Indian judiciary and not\nthe due process of law which is there in the American constitution. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">OUR CONSTITUTION MAKERS\nKNEW THE ROLE OF JEW ROTHSCHILD IN THE INDIAN JUDICIARY BEFORE 1947.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The use of PIL with an\nulterior motive has put a dampener of the VIBRANCY of Indian democracy.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">We may\nshout and argue like mad in the parliament, but at the end of it all , if you\nsee the BOTTOM LINE , &nbsp;our democracy works\u2014&nbsp;\nwith adequate CHECK AND BALANCES.&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The whole world is jealous of it.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\n\n\n\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">YOU WILL NEVER SEE\nINDIAN DEMOCRACY LIKE THE VIDEO BELOW-&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">CLAPPING LIKE CHOOTS .</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/0KMVhb57RqI/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0KMVhb57RqI?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When there were RACIAL\nattacks on Indian students in Australia, the COLLEGIUM MELORDS asked the\nforeign ministry to enquire/intervene in the situation. &nbsp;&nbsp;This type of a FIAT breaks down the system.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes on my ship,\nmy crew comes to me direct.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unless it is of an\nIMMINENT nature or a matter of secrecy, I tell them to come via proper\nchannels.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We saw how Kapil Sibal\nwent running to Supreme court over the JNU Kanhaiya Kumar incident.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">By the way we know the connections certain HIGH PROFILE\nLAWYERS of the Supreme court have with certain judges.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">Whistle blowers ( retired judges/ lawyers/\nbabus ) are still coming out with juicy details.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 16pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Foreign Affairs is\nexclusive prerogative of the ELECTED executive and the COLLEGIUM&nbsp; Judiciary has no role and so cannot direct\nelected representatives to take or not to take actions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The day is NOT far\nbefore the MELORD collegium judges with use a self inflicted PIL and peruse the\nfinancial budget even before it is read out in the assembly.&nbsp; Things are moving towards this PATHETIC STATE\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b>Article 21 </b>in The Constitution Of India 1949<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n21. Protection of life and personal liberty No person shall\nbe deprived of his life or personal liberty except according to procedure\nestablished by law<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nInnovation in interpretation of article 21 which has been\nmade very organic and with far reaching consequences , has reduced the ELECTED\nlegislature as a moot spectator.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nToday SHAMELESS people who want to KISS SAME GENDER ,&nbsp; MOUTH TO MOUTH on the streets are supported\nby the judges.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nTHE COLLEGIUM MELORDS MUST KNOW A WEAPON FOR DEFENCE AND TO\nSAVE--&nbsp; MUST NOT BE CONVERTED INTO A FOUL\nWEAPON OF ULTERIOR MOTIVE FOR OFFENCE.<o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"color: #990000; font-size: x-large;\">MELORDS -- DO NOT TIE THE LANGOT ON THE HEAD AND BE PROUD OF IT.</span></b><o:p></o:p></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-9AKvBdySRmE/VuW5u7wTcLI/AAAAAAABGEw/3t5-LO5lNGYiCK5bvbSOt0jI1oF9FNUxw/s1600/quote-the-freedom-to-criticize-judges-andjjj-other-public-officials-is-necessary-to-a-vibrant-sandra-day-o-connor-21-72-36.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b>KOSHER\nBIG BROTHER ASKS HIS RAJYA SABHA POLITICIANS IN HIS PAYROLL ,TO DISRUPT THE\nASSEMBLY AND WASH OUT THE FULL SESSION.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; line-height: 115%;\">Judiciary\nfacing crisis of credibility, Chief Justice of India TS Thakur says<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\nPTI | Mar 13, 2016, 07.35 PM IST<o:p></o:p></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<section class=\"highlight clearfix\" style=\"border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px 0px 20px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\"><span class=\"txt1\" style=\"background: rgb(245 , 245 , 245); border: 0px; color: #333333; display: block; float: right; font-family: , &quot;roboto&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-stretch: normal; height: 270px; line-height: 20px; margin: 0px 0px 20px; overflow: hidden; padding: 15px; vertical-align: baseline; width: 235px;\"><h4 class=\"heading4\" style=\"border-bottom-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); border-bottom-style: solid; border-width: 0px 0px 1px; color: black; font-family: proxima-semibold, 'roboto slab', roboto, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-stretch: normal; line-height: 16px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px 0px 5px; text-transform: uppercase; vertical-align: baseline;\">\nHIGHLIGHTS</h4>\n<span class=\"hsummary mCustomScrollbar _mCS_1\" style=\"border: 0px; display: block; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; height: 240px; line-height: inherit; margin: 10px 0px 0px; overflow: hidden; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\"><div class=\"mCustomScrollBox mCS-dark\" id=\"mCSB_1\" style=\"border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; height: 240px; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; max-width: 100%; overflow: hidden; padding: 0px; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n<div class=\"mCSB_container mCS_no_scrollbar\" style=\"border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; overflow: hidden; padding: 0px; position: relative; top: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; width: auto;\">\n<artsummary></artsummary><br />\n<ol style=\"border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; list-style: none; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n<li style=\"border: 0px; font-stretch: normal; line-height: 18px; list-style-type: disc; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 6px 0px 4px; vertical-align: baseline;\">CJI Thakur said judiciary is facing crisis of credibility, which is a challenge for it</li>\n<li style=\"border: 0px; font-stretch: normal; line-height: 18px; list-style-type: disc; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 6px 0px 4px; vertical-align: baseline;\">He asked judges to be conscientious of their duties</li>\n<li style=\"border: 0px; font-stretch: normal; line-height: 18px; list-style-type: disc; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 6px 0px 4px; vertical-align: baseline;\">He said the bar was not very cooperative in disposing of cases</li>\n<li style=\"border: 0px; font-stretch: normal; line-height: 18px; list-style-type: disc; margin: 0px 0px 0px 20px; padding: 6px 0px 4px; vertical-align: baseline;\">He made these remarks at the 150th anniversary function of Allahabad high court</li>\n</ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n</span></span><img alt=\"Justice Tirath Singh Thakur. (TOI file photo by Balish Ahuja)\" data-imgid=\"51383367\" src=\"http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/thumb/msid-51383367,width-400,resizemode-4/51383367.jpg\" kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" style=\"border: 0px; display: block; float: left; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; height: 300px; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; max-width: 100%; padding: 0px; vertical-align: bottom; width: 400px;\" title=\"Justice Tirath Singh Thakur. (TOI file photo by Balish Ahuja)\" /><span class=\"img_cptn\" itemprop=\"caption description\" style=\"border: 0px; color: #666666; display: block; float: left; font-family: , &quot;roboto&quot; , &quot;arial&quot; , sans-serif; font-size: 13px; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: italic; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: 18px; margin: 0px; min-height: 40px; padding: 5px 5px 0px; vertical-align: baseline; width: 390px;\">Justice Tirath Singh Thakur. (TOI file photo by Balish Ahuja)</span></section><br />\n<div class=\"article_content clearfix\" itemprop=\"text\" style=\"border: 0px; color: #333333; font-stretch: normal; line-height: 27px; margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 18px;\">\n<arttextxml></arttextxml></div>\n<div class=\"section1\" style=\"border-image-outset: initial; border-image-repeat: initial; border-image-slice: initial; border-image-source: initial; border-image-width: initial; border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n<div class=\"Normal\" style=\"border-image-outset: initial; border-image-repeat: initial; border-image-slice: initial; border-image-source: initial; border-image-width: initial; border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">ALLAHABAD: Judiciary as an institution is facing crisis of credibility which is a challenge from within, Chief Justice of India Tirath Singh Thakur said here on Sunday as he asked judges to be conscientious of their duties.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: white; content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">With concern being raised over huge pendency of cases, Justice Thakur did not mince any word as he said that bar has \"not been very very cooperative\" in disposal of cases even if judges are ready to put extra hours.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: white; content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">\"At times judges feel that the delay in the disposal of cases is only because the bar does not, at times, cooperate,\" he said at the function to inaugurate 150th anniversary of the Allahabad high court.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: white; content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The CJI said he can assure the lawyers that if bar cooperates, judges will be ready to sit even on Saturdays to finish old matters, especially related to people languishing in jail for years.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: white; content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Underlining the glorious history of Allahabad high court, he said it is a matter of great pride for him that Pandit Motilal Nehru, Pandit Jawaharlal Nehru, Tej Bahadur Sapru, Kailash Nath Katju, who have left indelible marks in history, belong to his home state Jammu &amp; Kashmir.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: white; content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">\"Difficult times have been seen by this court. Difficult challenges have also been seen by this court but judges have risen to the occasion. They have discharged their duties fearlessly ... but we cannot sleep or rejoice over the laurels of the past only.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: white; content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">\"We have great challenges in future and we need to get ready to meet those challenges. Judiciary as an institution, as we all know, is always under public gaze and has challenges not only from within but from outside also. Challenges from outside do not disturb us so much. We all face them well but we need to look after and what need to be aware of are challenges from within,\" he said.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: white; content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The Chief Justice of India said, \"... and when I speak about challenges from within I am referring to the crisis of credibility that we face in the country today. Judges need to be conscientious of in their discharge of duties, punctuality, judicial retribute and effort to do the best is what is the need of the hour.\"</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: white; content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Seeking cooperation from the bar in reducing pendency of cases, Justice Thakur said while judges are doing their best and have, to the satisfaction of the entire nation, upheld the Constitution, protected the rights of the people and ensured that access to justice is a reality, he would also like to also address the need for a similar commitment from bar members.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: white; content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">He said without the bar, administration of the justice is not possible terming it as the mother of the bench.</span><br />\n<br style=\"background-color: white; content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">\"If you have good judges it is because of the bar that you have. ... Over the period of the time we have seen that the bar is not very cooperative in the matter of disposal of cases,\" he said underlining that there are 10 lakh cases pending in Allahabad high court.</span><br />\n<div class=\"last8brdiv\" style=\"background-color: white; border: 0px; display: inline; font-stretch: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; width: auto;\">\n<div class=\"sponsor_block clearfix\" style=\"border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n<ul class=\"colombia\" data-ad-size=\"[0,370]\" data-autoplay=\"false\" data-callback=\"sponsorAdSuccess\" data-cb=\"processCtnAds\" data-desc-len=\"90\" data-expansion-size=\"[0,380]\" data-loop=\"0\" data-native-tmpl=\"ctn_midarticle\" data-native-vid-tmpl=\"ctn_belly_vid\" data-position=\"513832981\" data-skew=\"0\" data-slot=\"129146\" id=\"129146-513832981\" style=\"border: 0px; max-height: 430px !important; overflow: hidden; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\"></ul>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br style=\"background-color: white; content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block;\" />\n<div class=\"last7brdiv\" style=\"background-color: white; border: 0px; font-stretch: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n</div>\n<br style=\"background-color: white; content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Justice Thakur said the cases of people who are languishing in jail can be taken on priority and disposed of but it is not possible without the cooperation of the bar.</span><br />\n<div class=\"last6brdiv\" style=\"background-color: white; border: 0px; font-stretch: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n</div>\n<br style=\"background-color: white; content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block;\" />\n<div class=\"last5brdiv\" style=\"background-color: white; border: 0px; display: inline; font-stretch: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; width: auto;\">\n</div>\n<br style=\"background-color: white; content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block;\" />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">He said he can assure the lawyers that if Bar cooperates, judges will be ready to sit even on Saturdays to finish these old matters.</span><br />\n<div class=\"last4brdiv\" data-topcmt-status=\"true\" style=\"background-color: white; line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">These\nchampion race horses &nbsp;do NOT want to be part\nof the desi QUOTA donkey team\u2014 and most migrate abroad. &nbsp; &nbsp;The EVR Periyar BR Ambedkar student unions are now controlled and funded from abroad.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt; font-weight: inherit;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 18px;\">\n</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The New Doctrine of\nEquality &nbsp;gives the judges the\nuntrammelled power to strike down legislative and executive action at will with\na bald observation that they are not reasonable.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The standard of \u2018reasonability\u2019\nor \u2018unreasonability\u2019 not being subjected to any objective examination lies in\nthe discretion of the COLLEGIUM Court.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The New Doctrine purports to treat arbitrariness as inequality at the\nsame time. In fact, not all arbitrary actions can be termed unequal simply\nbecause some arbitrary actions are both arbitrary and unequal. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The New Doctrine fails\nto distinguish between the violation of equality by legislative action and the\nviolation of equality by executive action.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Justice Bhagwati spAke:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c...<i> Equality is a\ndynamic concept with many aspects and dimensions and it cannot be imprisoned\nwithin traditional and doctrinaire limits. Article 14 strikes at arbitrariness\nin State action and ensures fairness and equality of treatment. The principle\nof reasonableness, which legally as well as philosophically, is an essential\nelement of equality or non\u2013arbitrariness pervades Article 14 like a brooding\nomnipresence.\u201d <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</i></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>&nbsp;\u201c... the doctrine of classification which is\ninvolved by the court is not paraphrase of Article 14 nor is it the objective\nand end of that Article. It is merely a judicial formula for determining\nwhether the legislative or executive action in question is arbitrary and therefore\nconstituting denial of equality. If the classification is not reasonable and\ndoes not satisfy the two conditions referred to above, the impugned legislation\nor executive action would be plainly arbitrary and the guarantee of equality\nunder Article 14 would be breached</i>.\u201d&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nAIYYOO -- THODA PAANI PEEKE AATHA HOON !</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nSOMETIMES I PONDER - NAY- WONDER-- <o:p></o:p></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: 16pt;\">HOW MANY &nbsp;SUPREME COURT JUDGES / LAWYERS COULD HAVE\nSCORED </span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">ONE SINGLE MARK OUT OF 100</span><span style=\"font-size: 16pt;\"> ,&nbsp; IF\nTHEY HAD APPEARED IN THE IIT JEE ENTRANCE EXAMS.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 16pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-size: 16pt;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mLpKT8NXEd0/VuXOArb76PI/AAAAAAABGFA/Nb-q8avfNtQghLjZpF8oGSUsWdvb71AGQ/s1600/1770446911d2FF2852717666dc15271c2b.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/03/foreign-funded-trojan-horse-ngos-pil_12.html?showComment=1457905594715#c21169103861387353\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">March 14, 2016 at 3:16 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_58MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'times new roman', times, freeserif, serif; line-height: 22.4px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttp://deshgujarat.com/2016/03/13/communist-leader-vrinda-karat-had-launched-shahid-ishrat-jahan-ambulance/<br />\n<br />\nMODI HAS ONLY 56 INCH CHEST ?<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>BAAKI SAAMAN HAI KYA ?</b></span><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CHECK OUT HOW THE\nMELORDS MIND WORKS !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Ajay Hasia v. Khalid\nMujib<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ajay Hasia challenged\nthe allocation of 33 1/3 percentage of marks for oral test conducted during the\nEngineering Entrance Test as arbitrary and violative of his right to equality\nunder Article 14 of the Constitution. The Court was able to establish the nexus\nbetween who (candidates) and why (merit assessment) factors. But the Court was\nnot able to justify the nexus between why (merit assessment) and what\n(allocation of 33 1/3 percentage of marks) factors. Consequently, the Court\nstruck down the rule prescribing high percentage of marks (33 1/3 percentage of\nmarks) for oral test as plainly arbitrary, unreasonable and violative of\nArticle 14. But the Court declined to quash the admissions in view of a lapse\nof a reasonable amount of time. The Court held that a mere suspicion that some\ncandidates had obtained high marks in oral interview but very low marks in written\ntest did not establish a malafide intention on the part of the selectors.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\">AIYYOOOOO ! &nbsp; &nbsp; THODA RASAM PEEKE AATHA HOON !!</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Similarly, in Arti\nSapru v. State of J &amp; K, the Supreme Court held that the allocation of 33\n1/3 percentage of marks for the viva\u2013voice test conducted during the Medical\nCollege Entrance Test was excessive. The Court held that there was no nexus\nbetween the \u2018why\u2019 and \u2018what\u2019 factor. \u201cThe nebulous test of arbitrariness has\nagain enabled the Court to reach some undesirable result\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DOUBLE AIYYOOO ! &nbsp;THODA PULIYODHARAI KHAAKHE AATHA HOON !!</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>WHY HAVE OUR MELORDS\nNEVER CONSIDERED THAT RESERVATIONS AND QUOTA ARE VIOLATIVE OF ARTICLE 14 OF OUR\nCONSTITUTION ?&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>BODMAS LAGAANA BHOOL\nGAYA ?&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>DONT MELORDS KNOW THAT QUOTA HAS DRIVE AWAY THE BEST BRAINS AWAY FROM THE WATAN , &nbsp;FOR HORSES WONT RUN WITH DONKEYS ? &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>THIS IS WHAT THE JEALOUS WHITE NATIONS WANT , RIGHT ?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;
