font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WE THE PEOPLE shall ask WHISTLE BLOWERS from\nwithin the system to blow the lid off the Pandora\u2019s box.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">This process has already begin. <o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">&nbsp;We\nknow who the corrupt judges are. We know the EXTREME nepotism and vested\ninterests which rule.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">Today we know how appointments are done on\ngive-and-take basis, not purely on merit.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">A whole host of other considerations-\nreligion, caste, community- has come into play\u2014we know -- the national security agencies know !.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"The appointment\nof the judges is an absolutely opaque process where nepotism plays a big\nrole,\" said Supreme Court counsel D.P. Singh. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In November 2010, SC\njustice Markandey Katju said, \"There is something rotten in the Allahabad\nHigh Court---\u201c Some judges have their kith and kin practising in the same courts\nwho within a few years will become multi-millionaires.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the 2008 case of\njustice Nirmal Yadav, former judge of the Punjab and Haryana High Court, when a\npacket containing Rs 15 lakh for her was <b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">wrongly delivered at another judge's\ndoor</b>, the in-house mechanism under justice KG Balakrishnan absolved her, even\nafter a three-judge panel recommended her removal from office. The CJI instead\ntransferred her to the Uttarakhand High Court.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Every member of the Bar\nwould agree that a corrupt judge can't survive long without the help of a\ncorrupt lawyer. A classic example is that of former telecom minister A. Raja. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 2009 he had\nreportedly threatened justice S. Reghupati of the Madras High Court through a\nlawyer in court. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">His demand? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bail for his\n\"family friends\" involved in mark-sheet forgery. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It backfired, with\nReghupati narrating the incident in open court. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But after a flurry of\nparliamentary delegations, press conferences, angry letters and\nfinger-pointing, the issue died a quiet death. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Judges say they are\nultimately judged by their own conscience. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I AM TOUCHED LIKE\nMADONNA !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">SNIFF !<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b>\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">BOO HOOOOOOO !</span></b><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">V. Ramaswami was the\nJustice of the Supreme Court of India and the first judge against whom\nimpeachment proceedings were initiated in independent India. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The only other judge to\nface impeachment proceedings is Justice \"Soumitra Sen\" of Calcutta\nHigh Court, proceedings against whom were initiated in Rajya Sabha on 17 August\n2011. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Another such motion has\nbeen initiated against Chief Justice Dinakaran of Sikkim High Court. An Inquiry\nCommittee is looking investigating the issue.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;A scandal surfaced in the middle of year 1990\nwhen several media outlets reported about his ostentatious expenditure on his\nofficial residence during his tenure as a Chief Justice of Punjab and Haryana. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a serious turn of\nevents, on 1 February 1991, Supreme Court Bar Association passed a resolution\ncalling for his impeachment and requesting Chief justice not assign him any\nfurther legal work. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bharatiya Janata Party\nand Left parties submitted a notice of motion to the Indian Parliament seeking\nhis removal from office.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Accepting the motion on\n12 March 1991, Speaker Rabi Ray constituted a committee composed of Justice P B\nSawant of the Supreme Court, Chief Justice P D Desai of the Bombay High Court\nand Justice O Chinnappa Reddy, retired judge of the Supreme Court to\ninvestigate the affair. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The committee found\nRamaswami guilty of 11 out of 14 charges.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The impeachment motion\nwas placed in the assembly for debate and voting on 10 May 1993. Well known\nlawyer and a Congress politician Kapil Sibal was his defence lawyer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Of 401 members present in the assembly that\nday, there were 196 votes for impeachment and no votes against and 205\nabstentions by ruling Congress and its allies. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The motion which\nrequired not less than two third majority of the total number of members\npresent in both houses of the Parliament and an absolute majority of its total\nmembership thus failed to pass.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The said decision was\nchallenged before the Supreme Court and they upheld the decision of the\nParliament.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soumitra Sen was a\nformer judge of the Calcutta High Court. He was the first judge in independent\nIndia to be impeached in India's Rajya Sabha for misappropriation of funds <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Justice Sen has been\nbearing the allegation for appropriating Rs 32 lakh as a court-appointed\nreceiver in 1993 in a lawsuit between Steel Authority of India Limited (SAIL)\nand Shipping Corporation of India over supply of fire bricks.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Chief Justice\nrecommendation was made shortly after a three-judge inquiry committee had\nestablished Sen's misconduct in depositing the money in his personal account. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sen retained the money\neven after being appointed as the High Court judge in 2003. It was in 2006\nafter HC order, he returned money.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Justice Sen was held guilty of\nmisappropriation of public funds he received in his capacity as receiver\nappointed by the High Court of Calcutta and misrepresenting facts with regard\nto it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 18 August 2011,\nRajya Sabha passed the impeachment motion by overwhelming majority of 189 votes\nin favour and 17 against.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is the second case\nin the history of the country in which Parliament has initiated proceedings for\nremoval of a judge. The first involved Justice V. Ramaswami.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Paul Daniel Dinakaran\nPremkumar &nbsp;was the Chief Justice of the\nSikkim High Court. He resigned from the post following allegations of\ncorruption and subsequent impeachment proceedings.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In September 2009,\nallegations were made against Dinakaran by several members of the Bar Council\nof India including Former Union Law Minister Ram Jethmalani stating that he had\nhuge assets and land acquisitions in his Hometown Arakkonam more than what was\nfixed by the Tamil Nadu Land reforms.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The lawyers requested Chief Justice of\nIndia Union Law Minister not to appoint Dinakaran as Supreme Court Judge and\ninitiate an enquiry process regarding the allegation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Supreme Court\ncollegium headed by Chief Justice K.G. Balakrishnan had decided to replace\nJustice Dinakaran with Uttarakhand High Court Chief Justice JS Khehar, and\nrecommended transfer of Dinakaran to the Sikkim High Court.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Sikkim Bar\nAssociation president D R Thapa had asked \"How come the person be fit to\nbe discharge judicial duties in one state if he has not been found worthy of\ndoing the same in another state?\"&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Facing impeachment on charges of\ncorruption and judicial misconduct, he resigned from the post of Sikkim high\ncourt Chief Justice on 29 July 2011 expressing \"lack of faith and\nconfidence\" in the three-member inquiry Committee probing charges against\nhim.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Justice Dinakaran, a\nDalit, also said he had a \"sneaking suspicion\" that his\n\"misfortune\" was because of the circumstances of his birth in the\nsocially oppressed and underprivileged section of the society ( so what else is\nnew ?)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The proverbial 'bad\nfish' dirties the whole fuckin' tank. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Former Chief Justice of\nIndia, S.P.Bharucha spoke of '20% tainted judges', and observed that corrupt\njudges 'should be identified and dismissed from service'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The notorious case of\nAhmedabad Metropolitan Magistrate signing/issuing blindfolded bailable warrants\nof arrest on 15.1.2004 against A.P.J. Abdul Kalam (President of India),\nV.N.Khare (CJI), B.P.Singh (Judge Supreme Court) and R.K.Jain (leading lawyer),\nallegedly for a bribe of Rs 40,000/- collected for him by 3 lawyers will ever\nremain fresh in public memory.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It resounded in the Supreme Court in a PIL filed\nby Advocate Vijay Shankar where CJI V.N.Khare is reported to have observed :\n\" By giving Rs 40,000/- you can get a judicial order, and if this is the\nstate of affairs, only God knows what will happen to the Country ..... time has\ncome to take strict action, otherwise nothing will remain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At a later hearing, the\nSC Bench is reported to have remarked that there was a complete nexus&nbsp; between the Metropolitan Magistrate&nbsp; and the lawyers and that such incidents were\nhappening all over the country.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CJI also emphasised the need of finding out\nways to weed out corruption in lower judiciary and evolve a system to keep\nvigil on Judicial Officers<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Justice V.N.Khare, who\nretired as CJI in May 2004, said that every citizen, including Judges are\naccountable and are not above Law<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Lokayukta is an\nanti-corruption ombudsman organization in the Indian states<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7FtYoJlpiAA/VuM5e33PnTI/AAAAAAABF9o/H5hz3GSN4ikCdUlEYjm_SxE1LaSt9Woew/s1600/iFTmage.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"478\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-7FtYoJlpiAA/VuM5e33PnTI/AAAAAAABF9o/H5hz3GSN4ikCdUlEYjm_SxE1LaSt9Woew/s640/iFTmage.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">I suggest we must have\na \u201cNational Ombudsman\u201d who &nbsp;deals with\ncomplaints against improper conduct of Judges and living beyond their month end\nsalaries &nbsp;.&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Lawyers and Judicial clerks are asked to be\nwhistleblowers. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The supervision\nMUST be by an outsider, so that there can be no accusation of Judges\n'protecting their own'.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This NATIONAL &nbsp;JUDICIAL OMBUDSMAN &nbsp;must be competent.&nbsp; He must pass an exam set up by senior judges\nsupervised by CJI. &nbsp;Judiciary cannot\naccuse him &nbsp;not being an expert on proper\njudicial procedure. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An ombudsman is a\nperson who acts as a trusted intermediary between either the state, elements of\nstate or an organization, and some internal or external constituency, while\nrepresenting not only but mostly the broad scope of constituent interests.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ombudsman is etymologically rooted in the Old Norse word umbo\u00f0sma\u00f0r,\nessentially meaning \u201crepresentative\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ombudsman cannot\ninterfere with the independence of Judiciary in making decisions because they\ndo not have power to overturn or alter court decisions. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; They review only procedural matters, and have no power to review\nthe content of judicial decisions.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"> Regarding\nthe behaviour of Judges, the Ombudsman mainly issues only reprimands or\ncriticisms. They can also prosecute for serious misbehaviour. . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He CAN inspect the Courts, and if he finds\nthat the Judge has committed an unquestionable error or negligence in\nperformance of his functions, he may issue a critical warning or even initiate\nprocess in Court against the Judge for abuse of power.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Even so, he does not\ninterfere in judicial processes pending in a Court, nor does it intervene in\ncases in which regular appeal channels remain open. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Ombudsman may act\non its own initiative.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nothing prevents him from investigating why no Court\norder has yet been issued when the stipulated time there for has expired, or\nlooking into the causes of delay like lack of material means, or overload of\ncases, or functional responsibility of its head, or other officials, and making\nrecommendations for correcting the situation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The&nbsp; Ombudsman MUST investigate into lawyers'\nmisconduct, and even the misconduct of State Bar Council, and recommend to State\nBar Council, or to the Bar Council of India, as the case may be, for\nappropriate action in disciplinary jurisdiction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The Ombudsman MUST be given constitutional\nstatus in the name of DEFENDER OF THE WATAN.</span><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">NATIONAL&nbsp; JUDICIAL OMBUDSMAN&nbsp; MUST HAVE THE POWERS TO VETO MATTERS WHERE\nTHE WATANs SECURITY IS INVOLVED.</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">&nbsp;IT IS BETTER TO HAVE THREE NJO s INSTEAD OF\nONE - THEY MUST BE PRO-ACTIVE AND NOT REACTIVE .&nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: purple;\">AND PLEASE SPARE US OF DALIT QUOTA , WOMENs QUOTA AND ASSHOLES QUOTA !</span></b><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THIS POST IS NOW CONTINUED TO PART 6 BELOW-</b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/foreign-funded-trojan-horse-ngos-pil_12.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/foreign-funded-trojan-horse-ngos-pil_12.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/03/foreign-funded-trojan-horse-ngos-pil_8.html?showComment=1457467169286#c2746184378940902584\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">March 9, 2016 at 1:29 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_5MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi hj,<br />\n<br />\nIt is an intraplate earthquake<br />\n<br />\nIt occurs in the interior of a tectonic plate, whereas an interplate earthquake is one that occurs at a plate boundary.<br />\n<br />\nThe reservior of the Terna Dam,(an earthfill dam ) on Terna river puts pressure on fault lines.<br />\n<br />\nthis is why this blogsite has been telling about MULLAPARIYAR dam.<br />\n<br />\nthe BOTTOM OF THE CEREBRAL BARREL LAWYERS TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES think they are experts.<br />\n<br />\nthese MELORDS would have never heard the term SOLITION in their miserable lives--<br />\n<br />\nof course after the 2004 tsunami --they all know this term<br />\n<br />\nIF I CALL MELORDS STUPID-- THEY WILL PUNISH ME FOR \"CONTEMPT \"<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/mullaperiar-dam-biggest-disaster-in.html<br />\n<br />\nthis is why so many dams in upper reaches of ganges if SUICIDE .<br />\n<br />\nThe Himalayas were pushed up when two continents collided . This is why Tibet is elevated and Mount Everest is the tallest mountain peak , which is still rising.<br />\n<br />\nAt an unstable area where two tectonic plates collide , reservoirs increase the risk of earthquakes by adding immense pressure to the earth from the large volumes and weight of the stored water.<br />\n<br />\nRESERVOIR INDUCED EARTH QUAKES ARE TERMED INDUCED SEISMICITY.<br />\n<br />\nArtificial dam reserviors alters in-situ stress along an existing fault or fracture.<br />\n<br />\nIn these reservoirs, the weight of the water column can significantly change the stress on an underlying fault or fracture by increasing the total stress through direct loading, or decreasing the effective stress through the increased pore water pressure.<br />\n<br />\nThis significant change in stress can lead to sudden movement along the fault or fracture, resulting in an earthquake.<br />\n<br />\nThe 6.3 magnitude 1967 Koynanagar earthquake occurred in Maharashtra, India with its epicenter, fore- and aftershocks all located near or under the Koyna Dam reservoir. 180 people died and 1,500 were left injured. The effects of the earthquake were felt 230 km away in Mumbai with tremors and power outages.<br />\n<br />\nLATUR EARTHQUAKE NEAR BHEED MARATHWADA-<br />\n<br />\nLatur earthquake was one of the deadliest earthquakes Maharashtra has seen till date. The earthquake struck at about 3.56 am on September 30, 1993. In the intraplate earthquake about 52 villages were destroyed, over 30,000 were injured and approximately 10,000 were killed. The earthquake left a huge hollow at Killari, which was also the epicentre, remains in place till date.<br />\n<br />\nGOD SAVE THIS WATAN FROM OUR \"COLLEGIUM MELORDS\"<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n.</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_6b+seedHjHWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_6b+seedHjHWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MeLORDS must refrain\nfrom giving FIATS that cannot be enforced, whatever the fundamental right may\nbe and however good the cause. It serves no purpose to issue some high profile\nmandamus or declaration that can remain&nbsp; only\non paper. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is counter\nproductive to have people say \u2018The Supreme Court&nbsp; has not been able to do anything\u2019 .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The DIKTAT of ordering bureaucrats\nto send their children to govt schools is just an example.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">AS A SHIP CAPTAIN I\nALWAYS MADE SURE THAT MY ORDERS WERE OBEYED. &nbsp;&nbsp;OR\nMY POWER OF COMMAND GETS ERODED, TO THE DETRIMENT OF SAFETY OF LIFE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is of cardinal\nimportance to the confidence that people have in the Court that its orders are\nimplicitly and promptly obeyed and is, therefore, paramount that orders that\nare incapable of obedience and enforcement are just not made.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When a PIL is filed ,&nbsp; the COLLEGIUM MeLORDS &nbsp;must satisfy itselfthat the party which has\nbrought the litigation is litigating bona fide for public good as it has some\nIMMINENT value.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The MeLORDS&nbsp; must be careful to weigh conflicting public\ninterest before intervening.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSTOP PRESS:<br />\n<br />\nYESTERDAY ZEE NEWS ANCHOR ASKED JNU PROFESSOR MAKARAND PARANJAPE, A BLUNT QUESTION-<br />\n<br />\n\u201cIF THE STUDENT DO NOT WRITE WHAT THE COMMIE JNU PROFESSORS WANT\u2014 WOULD THEY LOSE MARKS / GRADES ?\u201d<br />\n<br />\nTHE PROFESSOR CHICKENED OUT ( HE HAS TO SURVIVE IN JNU IN FUTURE AMONG THE COMMMIE STUDENTS/ TEACHERS ) AND SAID \u2013 HELL NO!<br />\n<br />\nI AM REMINDED OF THE MENTAL GYMNASTICS WE SAILORS HAD 38 YEARS AGO.<br />\n<br />\nTHE METEOROLOGY PAPERS WERE CORRECTED BY A TAMILAIN EX-CAPTAIN LECTURER ( OF LB SHASTRI NAUTICAL COLLEGE ) WHO HAD WRITTEN A BOOK ON METEROLOGY\u2014LET US CALL HIM CAPT S.<br />\n<br />\nHOWEVER A RIVAL GANG OF PROFESSORS ( A KERALA SYRIAN JEW AND A PUNJABI \u2013 BOTH EX-CAPTAINS LET US CALL THEM CAPT J AND CAPT R ) WOULD NOT SET ANY QUESTION FROM THIS TAMILIANs BOOK\u2014TO SCREW HIS BOOK SALES .<br />\n<br />\nSO THE TAMIL GUY WOULD CHURN OUT SOME PET PHRASES\u2014EXAMPLE: \u201cMONEKY FIST DIAGRAM \u201c ETC DURING HIS COLLEGE LECTURES.<br />\n<br />\nWHOEVER WROTE HIS PET TERM WOULD GET 100% -- AS HE CORRECTED THE PAPERS. --BINDAAS !!<br />\n<br />\nWE SAILOR ONLY WANTED MARKS\u2014 WE DID NOT CARE FOR THE RABID INTERNECINE POLITICS BETWEEN PROFESSORS ( EX-CAPTAINS, WHAT A DISGRACE )<br />\n<br />\nTHE JNU SITUATION IS THE SAME.<br />\n<br />\nTHE JNU STUDENTS WROTE WHAT THE COMMIE PROFESSOR WHO CORRECTED THEIR EXAM PAPER WANTED .<br />\n<br />\nTHEY GOT GOOD GRADES. EXAMPLE: HINDUS ARE MOST VIOLENT RACE/ KASHMIR BELONGS TO PAKISTAN / ARYANS INVADED INDIA AND GAVE US VEDAS/ MANU WAS A BIGOT ETC<br />\n<br />\nAFTER THEY PASSED OUT OF JNU, THEY FLUSHED EVERYTHING DOWN THE MENTAL TOILET\u2014AND HAD A HEARTY LAUGH .<br />\n<br />\nFUCK YOU COMMIE PROFESSORS !<br />\n<br />\nOUR TAMILAIN SHIP CAPTAIN TURNED PROFESSOR WOULD ADD SEVERAL DEGREES TO HIS NAME-<br />\n<br />\nALL FAKE\u2014<br />\n<br />\nYOU PAY 5 BRITISH POUNDS AND THEY MAKE YOU FELLOW OF SOME BULLSHIT NAVIGATION/ METEOROLOGY LIMEY SOCIETY.<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEEEE !<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/dkuJN3eSNik/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/dkuJN3eSNik?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">www.sacw.net | March 24, 2005<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Text of citizens statement re the Indian Prime minister's comments in the Rajya Sabha following refusal of US Visa to Narendra Modi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><b>We express our shock and anger at the stand taken by the Prime Minister Dr. Manmohan Singh in the Rajya Sabha on the issue of refusal of visa to Mr. Narendra Modi by the USA</b></span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">He has said that it is not proper for any agency to form its opinion on the role of Sh. Modi in the 2002 Gujarat genocide based on mere allegations.&nbsp; Sh. Singh needs to be reminded that it was the NHRC which had castigated Mr. Modi and his state government for having aided and abetted the act of genocide of Muslims in Gujarat in 2002, and it was the Supreme Court of India that had opined that the Modi government cannot be relied upon to bring about justice to the victims of the carnage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><b>More than 50 national and international agencies of high credibility with their painstaking investigation had held Mr. Modi directly responsible for the act of genocide.&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The Prime Minister needs to come clean on this issue. Does he hold a considered opinion that the observations made by the NHRC and the Supreme Court of India are to be treated with contempt as shown by him in his Rajya Sabha speech?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Mr. Modi's policies of hatred should not be legitimised even by association. Mr. Modi is no ordinary elected leader. He has become infamous for his active abetment in the most brutal massacre since India became free, of a segment of the citizens of his state.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: medium;\">His notoriety has deepened in the past 3 years because he remains completely unrepentant for these crimes, including the mass slaughter and rape of hundreds of innocent women and children, and instead has openly fought elections from a platform of hate.&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">He has deliberately subverted the process of justice, that have attracted unprecedented structure from the Supreme Court of India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">We continue - to harbour grave disquiet about the militaristic and chauvinistic policies of the current US government itself, most notably in Afghanistan and Iraq. George Bush and his cohorts cannot be the arbiters of human rights.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">We commend the untiring efforts of NRIs and human rights activists in the US and in India who mobilized public opinion and pressurized the US administration which led to the denial of Modi's visa. For those who claim that the international community has no role to play in the Gujarat carnage since it is a matter internal to the Indian nation, we would like to remind them that by the same logic, the entire world should have remained a mute spectator as millions of Jews were imprisoned and executed in concentration camps by the Nazi government.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">For those who claim that any insult to any elected official is an insult to the entire nation, we would like to remind them that Hitler, who is reviled even today, was also an elected official.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">There is nothing more insulting to the Indian nation than the pogroms that took place in Gujarat, and the fact that their main architect, Sh Narendra Modi, still continues to enjoy the powers and privileges of the Chief Minister in that state, while the Prime Minister of the country rushes to his defence.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">It is a matter of great shame that even 10 months after having assumed power the UPA government has done nothing to ensure justice to the victims of Gujarat genocide. It has taken no steps to instill a sense of security and confidence among the displaced, raped, and maimed minorities of Gujarat who have been left to fend for themselves. No financial and legal aid has been arranged by the Central government for them and it is treating the whole Gujarat genocide as a routine state matter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The statement by Dr. Manmohan Singh adds insult to the injury suffered by the Genocide victims of Gujarat, and is an affront to those NRIs and human rights activists in the US whose unflagging pressure on the US administration resulted in the denial of Mr. Modi's visa. That Dr. Singh should feel compelled to come out openly to speak for an organizer of mass murder who feels no remorse for his role shows that Dr. Singh has lost all sense of propriety. The statement also shows that the government wants to remain neutral on the question of communalism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">We, as people who are committed to secularism and human rights in India, feel betrayed and would like to take this opportunity to express our sense of despair that the political formation which is in power at the centre lacks any sense of moral responsibility and moral courage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.4px;\"><span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">On behalf of the dead and living victims of Gujarat genocide and on behalf of the sections of civil society which have worked for the defeat of the communal forces we demand an apology from Dr. Manmohan Singh for having humiliated the wronged citizens of India by issuing a highly insensitive and irresponsible statement defending Mr. Narendra Modi.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">March 21, 2005<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Released by<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Shabnam Hashmi - ANHAD, Delhi &gt;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; clear: both; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; Aamir Khan- Actor, Mumbai</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">2. Aditya-Ceo, Ekgaon Technologies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">3. <span style=\"color: red;\">Admiral &nbsp;Ramdas</span>- Member, National Integration Council<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">4. Aradhana Bhargava- Mahatama Gandhi Sansthan, Madhya Pradesh<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">5. Sail-Pucl, Chattisgarh<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">6. Agnesh Murmu-Gram Sabha Seva Sansthan,Jharkhand<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">7. Ajeet Caur, Writer, Delhi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">8. Ajit Kumar-Arise, Aurangabad<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">9. Akshay Sail -Rcdrc, Raipur<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">10. Alladi Sitaram-Emeritus Professor, Indian Statistical Institute<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">11. Allwyn D' Silva- Documentation Research And Training Centre,Mumbai<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">12. Amal Charles -,Step, Secundrabad<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">13. Amar Farooqui- Reader, History Dept, Delhi University, Delhi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">14. Amar Jyoti- Activist, Chennai<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">15. Wilfred,INSAAF, Ahmedabad<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">203. font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 26.4px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: medium; line-height: 27px;\"><b>##################################</b></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ghJ_qC3X-SA/Vtvl8k2QSNI/AAAAAAABFow/VLnFW3I5OMY/s1600/Sibal-Singh-102xd4x764.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ghJ_qC3X-SA/Vtvl8k2QSNI/AAAAAAABFow/VLnFW3I5OMY/s320/Sibal-Singh-102xd4x764.jpg\" width=\"240\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: medium; line-height: 27px;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<h3 class=\"post-title entry-title\" itemprop=\"name\" style=\"background-color: #fff9ee; color: #222222; font-family: Georgia, Utopia, 'Palatino Linotype', Palatino, serif; font-size: 24px; font-stretch: normal; font-weight: normal; margin: 0.75em 0px 0px; position: relative;\">\n</h3>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-TLoFLiAOvas/VtwSbPu9QGI/AAAAAAABFqc/jdUrHz8KHdo/s1600/2i1clfggggggn.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-TLoFLiAOvas/VtwSbPu9QGI/AAAAAAABFqc/jdUrHz8KHdo/s640/2i1clfggggggn.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<h3 class=\"post-title entry-title\" itemprop=\"name\" style=\"background-color: #fff9ee; color: #222222; font-family: Georgia, Utopia, 'Palatino Linotype', Palatino, serif; font-size: 24px; font-stretch: normal; font-weight: normal; margin: 0.75em 0px 0px; position: relative;\">\n</h3>\n<h3 class=\"post-title entry-title\" itemprop=\"name\" style=\"background-color: #fff9ee; color: #222222; font-family: Georgia, Utopia, 'Palatino Linotype', Palatino, serif; font-size: 24px; font-stretch: normal; font-weight: normal; margin: 0.75em 0px 0px; position: relative;\">\nStudent arrested for Facebook Post</h3>\n<div class=\"post-header\" style=\"background-color: #fff9ee; color: #222222; font-family: Georgia, Utopia, 'Palatino Linotype', Palatino, serif; font-size: 12.6px; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0px 0px 1.5em;\">\n<div class=\"post-header-line-1\">\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"post-body entry-content\" id=\"post-body-1793193723607774100\" itemprop=\"description articleBody\" style=\"background-color: #fff9ee; color: #222222; font-family: Georgia, Utopia, 'Palatino Linotype', Palatino, serif; font-size: 15.4px; line-height: 1.4; position: relative; width: 570px;\">\n<div dir=\"ltr\" trbidi=\"on\">\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\nA class 11 student has been arrested for posting on facebook an alleged statement of Mr. Azam Khan, U.P. Minister.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\nI have perused the post. It is certainly objectionable, and Mr. Azam Kan has denied making such a statement.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\nThe statement says \" Secularism and love of nation is forbidden in Islam \". This is certainly objectionable, and is likely to incite communal feelings. Even if it has only been shared, that makes no difference. In a country with so much diversity as ours we must take care not to hurt the feelings of any community. To say that love of the &nbsp;nation is forbidden in Islam is bound to hurt the feelings of Muslims, the vast majority of whom are as patriotic as the vast majority ofHindus.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n&nbsp;However, in my opinion, instead of arresting the boy the better course of action would have been for Mr. Azam Khan &nbsp;to have denied issuing such a statement, and asked for removal of that post from facebook.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n&nbsp;It may be mentioned that arrest is not a must in every case where an F.I.R. of a cognizable offence is registered with the police. This is obvious from section 157 (1) Criminal Procedure Code. which reads :</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n\" &nbsp;157. Procedure for investigation</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n(1) If, from information received or otherwise, an officer in charge of a police station has reason to suspect the commission of an offence which he is empowered under section 156 to investigate, he shall forthwith send a report of the same to a Magistrate empowered to take cognizance of such offence upon a police report and shall proceed in person, or shall depute one of his subordinate officers not being below such rank as the State Government may, by general or special order, prescribe in this behalf, to proceed, to the spot, to investigate the facts and circumstances of the case, and, if necessary, to take measures for the discovery and arrest of the offender; \"</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\nThe use of the words &nbsp;\"and, if necessary \" &nbsp;in the above provision clearly indicates that it is not incumbent on the police to arrest in every case, rather it is discretionary.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n&nbsp;In Joginder Kumar vs. State of U. P. A.I.R. 1994 S.C. 1349 ( see online ) the Supreme Court observed : \" No arrest can be made because it is lawful for the police officer to do so. The existence of the power to arrest is one thing. The justification for the exercise of it is quite another.The police officer must be able to justify the arrest apart from his power to do so. Arrest and detention in police lock-up of a person can cause incalculable harm to the reputation and self-esteem of a person. No arrest can be made in a routine manner on a mere allegation of commission of an offence made against a person. It would be prudent for a police officer in the interest of protection of the constitutional rights of a citizen and perhaps in his own interest that no arrest should be made without a reasonable satisfaction reached after some investigation as to the genuineness and &nbsp;bona fides of a complaint and a reasonable belief both as to &nbsp;the person's complicity and even so as to the need to effect arrest. &nbsp;Denying a person of his liberty is a serious matter. \"</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n&nbsp;Thus the Supreme Court has held that arrest is not a must in every case. In the same decision the Supreme Court has noted that the National Police Commission in its Third Report has observed that 60% arrests in India are unnecessary or unjustified, and that arrests are a major source of corruption in the police.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n&nbsp;In my opinion arrest was unnecessary in this case, and the boy should have been let off with a warning and told to remove the objectionable post.</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/goog_1784971402\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\"><br /></a></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: justify;\">\n<a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KlbSEwnzajY\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KlbSEwnzajY</a></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"clear: both;\">\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"post-footer\" style=\"background-color: #eee9dd; border-bottom-color: rgb(238, 238, 238); border-bottom-style: solid; border-bottom-width: 1px; color: #666555; font-family: Georgia, Utopia, 'Palatino Linotype', Palatino, serif; font-size: 12.6px; line-height: 1.6; margin: 20px -2px 0px; padding: 5px 10px;\">\n<div class=\"post-footer-line post-footer-line-1\">\n<span class=\"post-author vcard\" style=\"margin-left: 0px; margin-right: 1em;\">Posted by&nbsp;<span class=\"fn\" itemprop=\"author\" itemscope=\"itemscope\" itemtype=\"http://schema.org/Person\"><a class=\"g-profile\" data-gapiattached=\"true\" data-gapiscan=\"true\" data-onload=\"true\" href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/00863856244827322851\" rel=\"author\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"author profile\"><span itemprop=\"name\">Justice Markandey Katju</span>&nbsp;</a></span></span><span class=\"post-timestamp\" style=\"margin-left: -1em; margin-right: 1em;\">at&nbsp;<a class=\"timestamp-link\" href=\"http://justicekatju.blogspot.in/2015/03/facebook-post-class-11-student-has-been.html\" rel=\"bookmark\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"permanent link\"><abbr class=\"published\" itemprop=\"datePublished\" style=\"border: none;\" title=\"2015-03-18T22:52:00+05:30\">Wednesday, March 18, 2015</abbr></a>&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
