text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://justicekatju.blogspot.com/2015/03/facebook-post-class-11-student-has-been.html?showComment=1426723767527#c490821960698905516\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">19 March 2015 at 05:39</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_1MC\" style=\"background-color: #fff9ee; color: #222222; font-family: Georgia, Utopia, 'Palatino Linotype', Palatino, serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 19.6px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nKATJU SAAB,<br />\n<br />\nCELEBRITIES RING UP THEIR FAVOURITE TOP POLICE OFFICERS , TO PUNISH PEOPLE WHO HAVE HURT THEIR EGO . .<br />\n<br />\nSEC 66A , IS ALL ABOUT EGO MASSAGE IN PUBLIC . .<br />\n<br />\nNONE OF THESE POLICE OFFICERS WHO CURRY FAVOUR WITH THESE CELEBRITIES KNOW THE \" MAGISTRATE \" RULE , NOR THE JUDGES OF THE LOWER COURTS WHO GIVE BAIL OR SEND THE ACCUSED TO UNDERTRIAL JAIL .<br />\n<br />\nJUST ONE FIR AND THE POLICE ARREST - WITHOUT THE NEED OF A MAGISTRATE RULING . .<br />\n<br />\nThis is obvious from section 157 (1) Criminal Procedure Code. which reads :<br />\n\" 157. Procedure for investigation<br />\n<br />\n(1) If, from information received or otherwise, an officer in charge of a police station has reason to suspect the commission of an offence which he is empowered under section 156 to investigate, he shall forthwith send a report of the same to a Magistrate empowered to take cognizance of such offence upon a police report and shall proceed in person, or shall depute one of his subordinate officers not being below such rank as the State Government may, by general or special order, prescribe in this behalf, to proceed, to the spot, to investigate the facts and circumstances of the case, and, if necessary, to take measures for the discovery and arrest of the offender; \"<br />\n<br />\nThe use of the words \"and, if necessary \" in the above provision clearly indicates that it is not incumbent on the police to arrest in every case, rather it is discretionary.<br />\n<br />\nIT IS GOOD THAT YOUR BROUGHT THIS GLARING LOOPHOLE, TO THE LIMELIGHT . .<br />\n<br />\nEGO MASSAGE OF CELEBRITIES BY POLICE AND JUDICIARY MUST BE INVESTIGATED . OUR NATION IS GOING TO THE DOGS .<br />\n<br />\nHERE IS A SAMPLE CASE-<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/12/dissent-on-cyber-space-not-offence-modi.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div style=\"background-color: #cccccc; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our constitution is\nabove all institutions in our priceless democracy (except vox populi)- hence &nbsp;&nbsp;its\nspirit should not be tampered .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Judicial Activism,\nrefers to use of judicial powers to analyze&nbsp;\nand enforce what judiciary thinks is right unilaterally .</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is\ndifferent from judicial overreach&nbsp; and\ninvolves direct actions from judiciary, mostly in cases when legislative or executive\nfails to perform as per the values and spirit of our constitution.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before PIL, only the aggravated\nparty could knock the doors of justice. But, after PIL, even a proxy for the\naggravated party (usually a TROJAN HORSE DESH DROHI NGO ) can do that.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 40px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since PIL can be filed\nwith very nominal fees , this has increased the number of court cases due to\nwhich the quality of judiciary has compromised.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We do NOT understand why judges\ndeem these PILs TOP URGENT of the RUSH RUSH RUSH category.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE :&nbsp; Mayawati's assets run into millions of\ndollars, with several properties to her name.[21] In the 2007\u201308 assessment\nyear, Mayawati paid an income tax of \u20b9 26 crore, ranking among the top 20\ntaxpayers in the country. On 3 August 2011 the Delhi High court dismissed the\ncentral government's appeal against Mayawati, stating that \"she has fully\ndischarged her obligations by disclosing the identities of all of her donors,\nthe gifts had been donated by her supporters\".[68] On 4 October 2012 a\nreview petition was filed by Kamlesh Verma, contending that the case had been\ndismissed merely on technical grounds, and that the evidence had not been\nadequately reviewed.[72] On 8 August 2013 the Supreme Court declined a request\nto re-open the case.[73] After seeking legal advice, the CBI finally closed\ntheir file on 8 October 2013.[74] She spent somewhere between \u20b9 25 and 60\nbillion rupees (about US$500 million to US$1.3 billion) on projects in five\nparks and at memorials such as Dr. B.R. Ambedkar Samajik Parivartan Sthal and\nManyavar Kanshiram Smarak Sthal, built in the name of B.R. Ambedkar, Ramabai\nAmbedkar, and Kanshi Ram in Lucknow between 2007 and 2009.[77][78][79]UNQUOTE&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 40px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They have never made an attempt\nto address the humongous backlog of cases. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>Judiciary must stick to old dictum with greater power \u00e7omes\ngreater responsibility and accountability \u2013or they are like the Italian\nwaitress , who has NIL accountability.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Check out her food security program &nbsp;for votes \u2013but it will KILL Bharatmata.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/08/food-security-bill-destroying-mindsets.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/08/food-security-bill-destroying-mindsets.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-attachment: initial; background-clip: initial; background-image: initial; background-origin: initial; background-position: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-size: initial; line-height: 37.5pt; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt;\">\n<b><span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt;\">Foreign-aided NGOs are actively stalling\ndevelopment, IB tells PMO in a&nbsp;report<o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 15.0pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 21.0pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: #3e3e3e; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">As a first step to\nfast-tracking development high on Prime Minister&nbsp;<a href=\"http://indianexpress.com/profile/politician/narendra-modi/\"><span style=\"border: none 1.0pt; color: #346f99; font-family: &quot;inherit&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; padding: 0in;\">Narendra Modi</span></a>\u2019s\nagenda, the Intelligence Bureau (IB) has submitted a classified document\nidentifying several foreign-funded non-governmental organisations (NGOs) that\nare \u201cnegatively impacting economic development\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 21.0pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: #3e3e3e; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">\u201cA significant number\nof Indian NGOs (funded by some donors based in the US, the UK, Germany, The\nNetherlands and Scandinavian countries) have been noticed to be using people\ncentric issues to create an environment which lends itself to stalling\ndevelopment projects,\u201d says the IB report marked to the Prime Minister\u2019s Office\n(PMO).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 21.0pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: #3e3e3e; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">\u201cThe negative impact\non GDP growth is assessed to be 2-3 per cent per annum,\u201d says the June 3\nreport, identifying seven sectors/ projects that got stalled because of\nNGO-created agitations against nuclear power plants, uranium mines, coal-fired\npower plants, farm biotechnology, mega industrial projects, hydroelectric\nplants and extractive industries.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 21.0pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: #3e3e3e; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">While detailing what\nit calls \u201canti-development\u201d activities by the NGOs during 2011-13, the 21-page\nreport&nbsp; highlights their plans for 2014 and the areas that would come\nunder pressure. These include a campaign against palm oil imports from\nIndonesia and disposal of e-waste of Indian IT firms, organising construction\nworkers in urban areas, protests against identified projects such as Gujarat\u2019s\nSpecial Investment Regions, Par Tapi Narmada River Interlinking Project and the\nDelhi-Mumbai Industrial Corridor.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 21.0pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: #3e3e3e; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">The report says that\nwhile caste discrimination, human rights and big dams were earlier chosen by\ninternational organisations to discredit India at global forums, the recent\nshift in the choice of issues was to encourage \u201cgrowth-retarding campaigns\u201d\nfocused on extractive industries, genetically-modified organisms and foods,\nclimate change and anti-nuclear issues.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 21.0pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: #3e3e3e; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">According to the\nreport, the funding for such campaigns came from foreign donors under\ncharitable garb for issues ranging from protection of human rights, violence\nagainst women, caste discrimination, religious freedom etc or to provide a\n\u201cjust deal\u201d to the project-affected displaced persons or for protection of\nlivelihood of indigenous people.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 21.0pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: #3e3e3e; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">The NGOs become the\ncentral players in setting the agenda, drafting documents, writing in the\nmedia, highlighting scholars-turned-activists and lobbying diplomats and\ngovernment, it says. \u201cThese foreign donors lead local NGOs to provide field\nreports which are used to build a record against India and serve as tools for\nthe strategic foreign policy interests of the Western government,\u201d adds the\nreport.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 21.0pt; margin-bottom: .0001pt; margin-bottom: 0in;\">\n<span style=\"color: #3e3e3e; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">\u201cThe strategy serves\nits purpose when the funded Indian NGOs provide reports, which are used to\ninternationalise and publicise the alleged violations in international fora.\nAll the above is used to build a record against a country or an individual in\norder to keep the entity under pressure and under a state of\nunder-development,\u201d says the IB report.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 21.0pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #3e3e3e; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\">Four NGOs were put under the scanner in 2012 for allegedly\nfuelling protests against the Kudankulam nuclear project in Tamil Nadu. The\naccounts of several Indian NGOs were put in the watch list with regard to\nallegations of funds diversion, after a discreet probe by security agencies\nwith the help of Directorate of Revenue Intelligence and Central Economic\nIntelligence Bureau.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 21.0pt;\">\n<span style=\"color: #3e3e3e; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 21.0pt;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: #3e3e3e; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">http://indianexpress.com/article/india/india-others/foreign-aided-ngos-are-actively-stalling-development-ib-tells-pmo-in-a-report/<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Public Interest\nLitigation (Regulation) Bill had proposed that petitioners filing frivolous and vested PIL\ncases should be put behind bars and pay the damages. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, the Bill\u2014which\nraised concerns of interfering with judicial independence\u2014could not receive the\nsupport of all political parties , some in the payroll of JEW Rothschild.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the Bill lapsed,\nthis attempt to control the misuse of PIL failed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">\n\n\n\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Supreme Court had compiled\na set of Guidelines for PIL on December 1, 1988, which were &nbsp;modified on the orders/directions of the Chief\nJustice of India in 1993 and 2003. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Guidelines provide\nthat ordinarily petitions falling under one of the following 10 categories will\nbe entertained as PIL:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">a. Bonded labour\nmatters;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">b. Neglected children;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">c. Non-payment of\nminimum wages;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">d. Petitions from jails\ncomplaining of harassment, death in jail, speedy trial as a fundamental right,\netc.;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">e. Petitions against\npolice for refusing to register a case, harassment by police and death in\npolice custody;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">f. Petitions against\natrocities on women, in particular harassment of bride, bride-burning, rape,\nmurder, kidnapping, etc.; (<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> DOWRY LAW IS 90% &nbsp;MISUSED-- FABRICATED LIES&nbsp;</b> )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">g. Petitions\ncomplaining harassment or torture of persons belonging to scheduled caste and\nscheduled tribes;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">h. Petitions pertaining\nto environmental pollution, disturbance of ecological balance, drugs, food\nadulteration, maintenance of heritage and culture, antiques, forest and\nwildlife and other matters of public importance;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">i. Petitions from\nriot-victims; and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">j. Family pensions.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PIL petitions need not\nfollow the required format; a mere postcard could suffice.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though more than 96% of\nthe PILs are frivolous or vested ( ulterior motives ) , &nbsp;NO penalties have been imposed on obvious\nculprits. &nbsp; In India whoever files a FIR first is considered righteous .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">What the Supreme court\ndoes NOT realize, is that most of the PILs filed are by DOUBLE AGENTS.&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We now see Satinath\nSarangi and his wife still milking foreign money for Bhopal Gas disaster after\n32 long years .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A PIL is now reduced to\nbe an instrument to fulfill private interests, settle political scores , malign\nsomeone or simply gain easy publicity \u2013 sometimes &nbsp;by young lawyers who want their faces on TV to\nget a kick star in their sinking career&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On November 16, 1992,\nthe Supreme Court responded to a PIL filed by lawyer Indira Sawhney and\nintroduced 27% reservation for backward classes in posts and services under the\nGovernment of India.Citing the age old Varna system, the court justified its\nreason for reservation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">31/ Argentina/&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp; 0.3</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">33/ Finland&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;/&nbsp; 0.2</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">34/ Greece &nbsp;/&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;-\n3.0</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">35/<span style=\"color: blue;\"> Brazil &nbsp;</span>/ - 4.0</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">36/ <span style=\"color: blue;\">Russia</span>&nbsp; / &nbsp;&nbsp;- 4.0</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b><span style=\"background: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\">37/ Venezuela /&nbsp; -1</span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\">0.00</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"> &nbsp;%<o:p></o:p></span></span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 115%;\"><b>38/ Ukraine&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;/&nbsp;&nbsp; -13.0</b></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b> %</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<b><br /></b></span></span><br />\n<h2 class=\"media-heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; font-family: lato; font-size: 26px; line-height: 1.1; margin: 5px 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: #2b2b2b; font-weight: 500;\">\nNJAC overturned in judicial overreach:</span><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"> </span><span style=\"background-color: lime;\">Supreme Court\u2019s decision to revive system of judges appointing judges pits judiciary against executive</span></span></h2>\n<div class=\"media-meta\" style=\"background-color: white; box-sizing: border-box; color: #b3b3b1; font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; margin-bottom: 3px;\">\n<span class=\"date\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">October 17, 2015,&nbsp;<span class=\"time\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; text-transform: uppercase;\">12:00 AM</span>&nbsp;IST</span>&nbsp;<a class=\"author\" href=\"http://blogs.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/author/team-toi/\" pg=\"Blog_Article_Author\" rel=\"author\" style=\"background: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6); font-weight: 600; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"Go to the profile of TOI Edit\">TOI Edit</a>&nbsp;in&nbsp;<a class=\"blog\" href=\"http://blogs.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/toi-editorials/\" pg=\"Blog_Article_Blog\" sl-processed=\"1\" style=\"background: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6); font-weight: 600; margin-right: 1px; text-decoration: none;\" title=\"Go to TOI Editorials\">TOI Editorials</a>&nbsp;<b style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">|</b>&nbsp;<span class=\"cat\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin-left: 1px;\"><a href=\"http://blogs.timesofindia.indiatimes.com/edit-page/\" rel=\"category tag\" style=\"background: transparent; box-sizing: border-box; color: #b3b3b1; text-decoration: none;\">Edit Page</a></span>&nbsp;<b style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">|</b>&nbsp;<span class=\"cat\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; margin-left: 1px;\">TOI</span></div>\n<div class=\"content\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box; clear: both; font-family: lato; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px; margin-top: 5px; word-wrap: break-word;\">\n<div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; height: auto !important; margin-top: 20px; max-width: 100%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">The collective order by a five-judge Constitution Bench of the Supreme Court to strike down as \u201cunconstitutional and void\u201d the 99th Constitutional Amendment Act and the National Judicial Appointments Commission (NJAC) Act 2014 legislated to replace the two-decade old collegium system of judges appointing judges, draws a line under arguably the biggest flashpoint between the judiciary and the executive over the past two decades. But given </span><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">the widespread consensus that the collegium system has failed</b><span style=\"background-color: white;\">, this is unlikely to be the end of the matter.</span></div>\n<div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; height: auto !important; margin-top: 20px; max-width: 100%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Ordering the revival of the collegium system which allowed judges to appoint new judges since 1993, the Bench rejected the government\u2019s plea to refer the case to a larger Bench.The apex court has simultaneously invited suggestions to improve the collegium system, fixing November 3 for its hearing on the matter. The broader judicial message is crystal clear. As senior lawyer Harish Salve put it, </span><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\u201cSC is giving a message that the power is with them.\u201d</b></div>\n<div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; height: auto !important; margin-top: 20px; max-width: 100%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">This sets the stage for the most serious face off between judiciary and executive in a generation. While senior lawyer Ram Jethmalani hailed the verdict as a \u201chistoric day for democracy\u201d, Attorney General Mukul Rohatgi scathingly called it \u201ca </span><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">flawed judgment ignoring the unanimous will of the Parliament, half the state legislatures and the will of the people for transparency in judicial appointments</b><span style=\"background-color: white;\">\u201d. </span><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Union law minister Sadanand Gowda too says he was \u201csurprised\u201d because the NJAC \u201chad 100% support of the people\u201d.</b></div>\n<div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; height: auto !important; margin-top: 20px; max-width: 100%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">NJAC was indeed enacted after a broad political consensus which evolved after several commissions and parliamentary committees found flaws in the collegium system over the years. It was ratified by Parliament as well as 20 state legislatures.</b><span style=\"background-color: white;\"> This is why a senior advocate like K T S Tulsi, while expressing disappointment over the judgment, quoted parliamentarians talking of the </span><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">\u201ctyranny of the unelected over the elected\u201d.</b></div>\n<div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; height: auto !important; margin-top: 20px; max-width: 100%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">This paper has argued in favour of NJAC because it promised to end opacity in judicial appointments. </span><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Judges don\u2019t have unbridled power to appoint judges in most other liberal democracies.</b><span style=\"background-color: white;\"> For example, US Supreme Court judges are appointed by the president and ratified by the Senate. For the UK\u2019s apex court, an independent committee makes candidate recommendations to the prime minister who makes a final recommendation to the queen.</span></div>\n<div style=\"background-color: white; box-sizing: border-box; height: auto; margin-top: 20px; max-width: 100%;\">\nThe Constitution envisages separation of powers between legislature, executive and legislature \u2013 which means each branch of government should stay within its own remit. Under NJAC the commission to select judges is composed equally of judges and non-judges, which should prevent power vesting exclusively with either judges or the political class.</div>\n<div style=\"box-sizing: border-box; height: auto !important; margin-top: 20px; max-width: 100%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\">With all due respect, </span><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">rulings cannot be based on institutionalised distrust of the political executive or legislature.</b><span style=\"background-color: white;\"> By calling for further discussion on the collegium system, the apex court itself has accepted that there were flaws in the system. It must now fix them. The judiciary remains a bulwark of Indian democracy and while preserving its independence is crucial, what\u2019s equally incumbent on it is to look within and reform.</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"disclaimer\" style=\"background-color: white; box-sizing: border-box; color: grey; font-family: Lato; font-size: 12px; margin-bottom: 20px; padding: 11.75px 0px;\">\nThis piece appeared as an editorial opinion in the print edition of The Times of India.</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>In USA\nthe objective of the PIL was to increase civic engagement in decision-making.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">USA has Jury system instead of&nbsp; MeLord judges deciding.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Delayed justice is\ndenied justice.. as in 1984 case where the culprits who slaughterered Sikhs are\nstill roaming free.. after 32 years <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The MELORDS must look\nupon itself and try to correct itself before encroaching the powers of the ELECTED\nexecutive. &nbsp;&nbsp;Endless delays and corrupt\njudges are far worse &nbsp;than corrupt\npoliticians..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SUMMER VACATION for\nJudges was started by the British who cooled off in hill stations as they could\nNOT bear the Indian heat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recently we had a\nMeLORD judge slapping SEDITION on Finance minister Arun Jaitley for criticizing\nthe NJAC striking down.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The finance minister,\nwriting in his personal capacity, had held that the SC's verdict striking down\nthe 99th constitutional amendment to turn the appointment of judges into an\nexclusive prerogative of judiciary was tantamount to rewriting the\nConstitution.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Saying that the SC was\nacting like a third chamber of the legislature, Arun Jaitley suggested that the\nverdict was biased against the political class and was a prescription for\n\"tyranny of the unelected\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Criticism of SC is not\neven contempt of court, then how can sedition charges be slapped for\ncriticizing an SC verdict?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Is this what our\nMeLORDS are worth ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All know that in a democracy\n, just and fair criticism of the court's verdict is allowed- as a part and\nparcel of evolution of law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE ABOVE INCIDENT HAS\nSHATTERED THE GLASS \u2013 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MELORDs CAN NEVER BE\nTHE SAME ANY MORE.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THEY HAVE BEEN KNOCKED\nOFF THEIR HIGH PEDESTAL BY THEMSELVES-</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SELF INFLICTED , I MUST SAY.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>UNELECTED Judges must\nknow their limits and must not try to run the ELECTED Government. They must\nhave modesty and humility, and not behave like Emperors.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Or we go the pathetic Pakistan\nway\u2014<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>--- &nbsp;where the COLLEGIUM\nJUDICIARY packed with CRYPTO JEWS controlled by kosher BIG BROTHER ,( &nbsp;with teeth\nprovided by CRYPTO JEW generals and CRYPTO JEW top cops ) ,&nbsp; have hijacked the nation to the KOSHER\nWHOREHOUSE.<o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n<b><br /></b></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In matters &nbsp;pertaining exclusively to the executive or\nlegislative domain and if there was a law under our constitution, the MeLORD judges\ncould certainly enforce it but judges cannot create a law and seek to enforce\nit. &nbsp;Like LIVING TOGETHER is normal in\nUSA so it is normal in India too.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">THIS COMMIE WOMAN NIVEDITA MENON ( JNU PROFESSOR) &nbsp;IS UNFIT TO BE A TEACHER , WHO MOLDS YOUNG MINDS.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">SHE IS FULL OF LIES, HATE AND SPITE .&nbsp; .<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">SACK HER AND LET HER FACE THE LAW&nbsp;&nbsp; .. &nbsp;ALONG WITH OTHER COMMIE PROFESSORS WHO ARE MORE\nRABIDLY ANTI-WATAN.&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">ASK WHISTLE BLOWERS TO GIVE OBJECTIVE EVIDENCE . .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">THIS IS EFFECT OF FOREIGN FUNDS . .<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><a href=\"http://zeenews.india.com/news/india/jnu-professor-spits-venom-against-india-says-kashmir-illegally-occupied_1863531.html\"><span style=\"background-color: lime; He would give it only to those who pleased him. One way to please him was to observe severe penance.<br />\n<br />\nMind you Shiva is a cosmic allegory\u2014personalized via puranas for UNSKILLEL LABOUR who did NOT have access to the Vedas / Upanishads.<br />\n<br />\nShukracharya was determined to please Shiva and get hold of this mantra. He hung humself upside down on a very high tree branch with a bonfire below. If he falls asleep , he would fall down and die-- and be cremated .<br />\n<br />\nWhen you hang upside down, your inner ear spirit level is balanced by gravity.<br />\n<br />\nEverybody was keeping keen vigilance of this gruesome penance as the one year completion date was getting near. The King of the Devas Lord Indra panicked and decided to play a bit dirty. The penance of the sapt rishis were getting disturbed due the extreme bending of space time by a violent scalar field.<br />\n<br />\nIndra sent his daughter Jayanti disguised as a brahmin woman past the sentries.<br />\n<br />\nShe threw some dry red chillies into the fire without anybody noticing. The acrid fumes of the chillies made Shukracharyas eyes bleed- yet he continued hanging.<br />\n<br />\nThe woman was filled with remorse. Lord Shiva unable to tolerate this foul play immediately appeared and gave Shukracharya the mantra as a boon.<br />\n<br />\nYOU MUST KNOW THAT SAPT RISHIS ARE AGAIN NOT MORTALS, THEY ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/polaris-and-great-bear-capt-ajit.html<br />\n<br />\nAfter every PRALAYA there is a fresh set of Sapt Rishis.<br />\n<br />\nThis is why people still argue about Gotra maharishis.<br />\n<br />\nOur Vedas and Upanishads and Puranas were written by Mharishis seers who bent space time and read off the Akaashik records.<br />\n<br />\nThis is why there is CONFUSION about YUGAS and there are some common names.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/09/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html<br />\n<br />\nBR Ambedkar who wrote RIDDLES IN HINDUISM\u2014he just affixed his name. Meanwhile some additional questions have arisen which please, answer when you answer my first questions.<br />\n1. What is the meaning of \u201cpeople\u201d in \u201cpeople\u2019s war\u201d? Does it mean war on behalf of India\u2019s millions, or the Negroes in East, South or West Africa, or the Negroes of America, or all of them? Are the Allies engaged in such a war?<br />\n2. Are the finances of the Communist Party, represented by you, subject to public audit? If they are, may I see them?<br />\n3. It is stated that the Communist Party has actively helped the authorities to arrest leaders and organizers of labour strikes during the last two years.<br />\n4. The Communist Party is said to have adopted the policy of infiltrating the Congress organization with a hostile intent.<br />\n5. Is not the policy of the Communist Party dictated from outside?<br />\nYours sincerely,<br />\nM. K. GANDHI\"<br />\nGandhi further wrote \u201d Many honest Congressmen come to me or write to me from the various provinces that communists have no principles save of keeping their party alive and beating their opponents with any stick that came to their hands.\u201d (Letter no 721, Page no 413)<br />\n<br />\nSA Dange had written that th Commies \u201c had decided to establish a network of underground combat cells all over India during the next two years, to be used in case of need\u201d<br />\n<br />\nWE CALL THIS \u201cSLEEPER CELLS \u201c. MALAYALIS ARE NOT STUPID, THEY HAVE ZERO TOLERANCE FOR ANTI-NATIONALS. . .<br />\n<br />\nKANHAIYA KUMARs FINGER QUIVERING MELODRAMA WILL NOT WORK IN BENGALI \u2013 WHAT HE TOUCHES IN BENGAL WILL TURN TO DUST, AS A SORT OF KING MIDAS IN REVERSE.<br />\n<br />\nFINGER QUIVERING WORKS ONLY WHEN GIVING A SPEECH TO A CROWD OF ILLITERATE GHUTKA CHEWING STREET SWEEPERS IN MUMBAI .. .<br />\n<br />\nIT DOES NOT WORK WITH LITERATE PEOPLE\u2014 JUST SHOWS THE CLASS AND PATHETIC MINDSET OF JNU STUDENTS . ..<br />\n<br />\nI ASK MODI GOVT--<br />\n<br />\nDO NOT INTERRUPT KANHAIYA KUMAR WHILE CAMPAIGNING IN ASSAM . . HE IS BOUND TO OFFER \u201cAAJJJADDI \u201c TO THE SEPARATISTS .<br />\n<br />\nLET IB/ RAW / NIA WATCH HIM . . WATCH D RAJAs DAUGHTER IN JNU . .<br />\n<br />\nARREST HIM AND HIS COMMIE POLITICAL COMMIE MENTORS LIKE SITARAM YECHURY IMMEDIATELY AFTER HE FINISHES HIS ASSAM ELECTION CAMPAIGN.<br />\n<br />\nPUT THEM BEHIND BARS FOR SEDITION AND THROW AWAY THE KEYS.<br />\n<br />\nDISBAR AND BLACKBALL THE COMMUNIST PARTY AFTER THAT . .<br />\n<br />\nWE DO NOT WANT \u201cCOLLEGIUM\u201d MELORDS TO INTERFERE WITH EXTERNAL SECURITY OF THE WATAN . WE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ALLOW IT ..<br />\n<br />\nWE WILL NOT ALLOW JNU TO BE A NEST OF POISONOUS COMMIE VIPERS IN THE HEART OF DELHI. THIS IS MOST DANGEROUS FOR BHARATMATA.<br />\n<br />\nKANHAIYA KUMAR, THE RUSTIC, CRASS , MIDDLE AGED STUDENT LEADER OF JNU FROM A DIRTY HOVEL (HOME ) \u2014<br />\n<br />\nWHAT JOB DOES KANHAIYA KUMAR, EXPECT TO SECURE AFTER HIS \u201dAFRICAN STUDIES\u201d PHD ?<br />\n<br />\nCAN HE EVEN UTTER A DECENT SENTENCE IN ENGLISH ?<br />\n<br />\nHE WANTS PHELLOSSIPP ( fellowship ) , PROMOSSANN ( promotion ) , SORE LEAVE ( shore leave ) , AJJJADI ( azadi ), BHYABBASSTA ( vyavasta) AND WHAT NOT !<br />\n<br />\nTHE JNU COMMIE STUDENTS DESERVE HIM\u2014ALL UNKEMPT, UNWASHED, UNCOUTH , CRASS .<br />\n<br />\nI HAVE SEEN MANIPAL UNIVERSITY FOR 3 YEARS \u2013 I ATTENDED THE ANNUAL CONVOCATIONS--<br />\n<br />\nWHAT A DIFFERENCE OF STUDENT/ TEACHER QUALITY .<br />\n<br />\nI FELT PROUD OF BEING AN INDIAN IN THE MANIPAL CAMPUS.<br />\n<br />\nAFTER SEEING JNU ON TV \u2014 I FEEL SICK \u2013 FEEL LIKE PUKING !<br />\n<br />\nSACK ALL THE BRAINWASHING COMMIE / ISLAMIC SEPARATIST PROFESSORS OF JNU . . FIND OUT THEIR SOURCES OF FOREIGN FUNDS WHICH MADE THEM JUDASES ..<br />\n<br />\nREWARDS WHISTLE BLOWERS AMONG JNU STUDENTS AND TEACHERS . .<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</b></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: red;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; EXAMPLE: HINDUS ARE MOST VIOLENT RACE/ KASHMIR BELONGS TO PAKISTAN / ARYANS INVADED INDIA AND GAVE US VEDAS/ MANU WAS A BIGOT ETC<br />\n<br />\nAFTER THEY PASSED OUT OF JNU, THEY FLUSHED EVERYTHING DOWN THE MENTAL TOILET\u2014AND HAD A HEARTY LAUGH .<br />\n<br />\nFUCK YOU COMMIE PROFESSORS !<br />\n<br />\nOUR TAMILAIN SHIP CAPTAIN TURNED PROFESSOR WOULD ADD SEVERAL DEGREES TO HIS NAME-<br />\n<br />\nALL FAKE\u2014<br />\n<br />\nYOU PAY 5 BRITISH POUNDS AND THEY MAKE YOU FELLOW OF SOME BULLSHIT NAVIGATION/ METEOROLOGY LIMEY SOCIETY.<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEEEE !<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; But as soon as operation Popo was over, they turned coats and started killing the Razakars\u2014a gruesome mass murder\u2014a genocide.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/04/razakers-of-mim-operation-polo-to-annex.html<br />\n<br />\nTHE 1946 ARMED FORCES MUTINY WAS TRIGGERED BY RSS. I HAVE TOLD THIS BEFORE.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/02/the-indian-navy-mutiny-of-1946-only-war.html<br />\n<br />\nGANDI, NEHRU AND PATEL GOT TERRIBLY UPSET WITH THE ARMED FORCES FOR SNATCHING AWAY THE FREEDOM MOVEMENT LEDERSHIP WHICH THEY HAD CORNERED FOR THEMSELVES WITH JEW ROTHSCHILDs SUPPORT.<br />\n<br />\nTHE ARMED FORCES WERE BATTLE HARDENED AFTER WW1 AND WW2- THEY HAD DONE ALL THE REAL FIGHTING WHICH THE WHITE MAN WAS HIDING IN SAFE AREAS.<br />\n<br />\nBUT JEW ROTHSCHILD DID NOT CARE, AS THE ARMED POLICE WAS STILL WITH HIM\u2014SOLID BACKING .<br />\n<br />\nTHEN MALABAR SPECIAL POLICE OF NORTH MALABAR REVOLTED. 800 MEN ALL MORE THAN 6 FEET IN HEIGHT , ALL KALARI EXPERTS , ALL FROM RSS, MY FATHERS COLLEAGUES. This elite force was created to crush the moplah revolt and catch the gruesome Islamic criminals alive . . .<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2012/08/rss-rashtriya-swayam-sevak-sangh-brief.html<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/kalaripayattu-oldest-and-deadliest.html<br />\n<br />\nTHIS PAID PUT TO ROTHSCHILDS DREAMS OF HOLDING ON TO INDIA USING ARMED POLICE.<br />\n<br />\nTHE REST OF INDIAs POLICE WERE LEAD BY COMMIES.<br />\n<br />\nCOMMIES HAD SIDED WITH BRITAIN IN 1942, QUIT INDIA MOVEMENT. DURING THE 1946 NAVY MUTINY, THE COMMIES HAS SEND A LETTER TO THE QUEEN ASSURING LOYALTY .<br />\n<br />\nCPI leadership supported the two nation theory demanded by CRYPTO JEW muslims leaders . The commies supported CRYPTO JEW LED Sikhs demand for separate Khalistan homeland.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/07/unknown-history-of-sikhs-and-sikhism.html<br />\n<br />\nONLY BR AMBEDKARs MAHARS, EVR PERIYARS TAMIL DALIT FOLLOWERS AND COMMIES SUPPORTED JEW ROTHSCHILD IN THE 1946 NAVY MUTINY.<br />\n<br />\nDuring the India China war in 1962, the commies in jails shouted \"Chairman Mao, Our Chairman\" .<br />\n<br />\nCommie leader Puran Chand Joshi ( a chiptpavan JEW ) the first general secretary of Communist Party of India, for a period from 1935 \u2013 1947 was praised by Sir Reginald Maxwell in a letter \u201c what a splendid job you and your communist party were doing to sabotage and break up the Quit India Movement, in response to an appeal by comrade Harry Pollitt \u201d<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_9BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; Meanwhile some additional questions have arisen which please, answer when you answer my first questions.<br />\n1. What is the meaning of \u201cpeople\u201d in \u201cpeople\u2019s war\u201d? Does it mean war on behalf of India\u2019s millions, or the Negroes in East, South or West Africa, or the Negroes of America, or all of them? Are the Allies engaged in such a war?<br />\n2. Are the finances of the Communist Party, represented by you, subject to public audit? If they are, may I see them?<br />\n3. It is stated that the Communist Party has actively helped the authorities to arrest leaders and organizers of labour strikes during the last two years.<br />\n4. The Communist Party is said to have adopted the policy of infiltrating the Congress organization with a hostile intent.<br />\n5. Is not the policy of the Communist Party dictated from outside?<br />\nYours sincerely,<br />\nM. K. GANDHI\"<br />\nGandhi further wrote \u201d Many honest Congressmen come to me or write to me from the various provinces that communists have no principles save of keeping their party alive and beating their opponents with any stick that came to their hands.\u201d (Letter no 721, Page no 413)<br />\n<br />\nSA Dange had written that th Commies \u201c had decided to establish a network of underground combat cells all over India during the next two years, to be used in case of need\u201d<br />\n<br />\nWE CALL THIS \u201cSLEEPER CELLS \u201c. OUR ENTIRE RED CORRIDOR IS A FIELD OF SLEEPER CELLS HAVING BETTER GUNS THAN OUR JAWANS<br />\n<br />\nSO FUCK YOU , KANHAIYA KUMAR AND HIS COMMIE PROFESSOR MENTORS !<br />\n<br />\nWE DO NOT CARE OFR THE FAKE HISTORY WRITTEN BY COMMIES ROMILA THAPAR, IRFAN HABIB AND THEIR ILK.<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedGRwbD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_9b+seedGRwbD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_6b+seedHjHWD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_5B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/03/foreign-funded-trojan-horse-ngos-pil_8.html?showComment=1457467169286#c2746184378940902584\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">March 9, 2016 at 1:29 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_5MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi hj,<br />\n<br />\nIt is an intraplate earthquake<br />\n<br />\nIt occurs in the interior of a tectonic plate, whereas an interplate earthquake is one that occurs at a plate boundary.<br />\n<br />\nThe reservior of the Terna Dam,(an earthfill dam ) on Terna river puts pressure on fault lines.<br />\n<br />\nthis is why this blogsite has been telling about MULLAPARIYAR dam.<br />\n<br />\nthe BOTTOM OF THE CEREBRAL BARREL LAWYERS TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES think they are experts.<br />\n<br />\nthese MELORDS would have never heard the term SOLITION in their miserable lives--<br />\n<br />\nof course after the 2004 tsunami --they all know this term<br />\n<br />\nIF I CALL MELORDS STUPID-- THEY WILL PUNISH ME FOR \"CONTEMPT \"<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/mullaperiar-dam-biggest-disaster-in.html<br />\n<br />\nthis is why so many dams in upper reaches of ganges if SUICIDE .<br />\n<br />\nThe Himalayas were pushed up when two continents collided . This is why Tibet is elevated and Mount Everest is the tallest mountain peak , which is still rising.<br />\n<br />\nAt an unstable area where two tectonic plates collide , reservoirs increase the risk of earthquakes by adding immense pressure to the earth from the large volumes and weight of the stored water.<br />\n<br />\nRESERVOIR INDUCED EARTH QUAKES ARE TERMED INDUCED SEISMICITY.<br />\n<br />\nArtificial dam reserviors alters in-situ stress along an existing fault or fracture.<br />\n<br />\nIn these reservoirs, the weight of the water column can significantly change the stress on an underlying fault or fracture by increasing the total stress through direct loading, or decreasing the effective stress through the increased pore water pressure.<br />\n<br />\nThis significant change in stress can lead to sudden movement along the fault or fracture, resulting in an earthquake.<br />\n<br />\nThe 6.3 magnitude 1967 Koynanagar earthquake occurred in Maharashtra, India with its epicenter, fore- and aftershocks all located near or under the Koyna Dam reservoir. 180 people died and 1,500 were left injured. The effects of the earthquake were felt 230 km away in Mumbai with tremors and power outages.<br />\n<br />\nLATUR EARTHQUAKE NEAR BHEED MARATHWADA-<br />\n<br />\nLatur earthquake was one of the deadliest earthquakes Maharashtra has seen till date. The earthquake struck at about 3.56 am on September 30, 1993. In the intraplate earthquake about 52 villages were destroyed, over 30,000 were injured and approximately 10,000 were killed. The earthquake left a huge hollow at Killari, which was also the epicentre, remains in place till date.<br />\n<br />\nGOD SAVE THIS WATAN FROM OUR \"COLLEGIUM MELORDS\"<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n.</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_6b+seedHjHWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_6b+seedHjHWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_10M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. EXAMPLE: HINDUS ARE MOST VIOLENT RACE/ KASHMIR BELONGS TO PAKISTAN / ARYANS INVADED INDIA AND GAVE US VEDAS/ MANU WAS A BIGOT ETC<br />\n<br />\nAFTER THEY PASSED OUT OF JNU, THEY FLUSHED EVERYTHING DOWN THE MENTAL TOILET\u2014AND HAD A HEARTY LAUGH .<br />\n<br />\nFUCK YOU COMMIE PROFESSORS !<br />\n<br />\nOUR TAMILAIN SHIP CAPTAIN TURNED PROFESSOR WOULD ADD SEVERAL DEGREES TO HIS NAME-<br />\n<br />\nALL FAKE\u2014<br />\n<br />\nYOU PAY 5 BRITISH POUNDS AND THEY MAKE YOU FELLOW OF SOME BULLSHIT NAVIGATION/ METEOROLOGY LIMEY SOCIETY.<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEEEE !<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span style=\"color: blue; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/08/the-thin-red-line-movie-review.html?showComment=1501992080230#c5420990453362286041\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 6, 2017 at 9:31 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_140MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nIMPORTANT--<br />\n<br />\nIMPORTANT--<br />\n<br />\nIMPORTANT---<br />\n<br />\nDespite Typhoon Noru, 2017 is NOT yet an El Nino year. What is making Europe so warm ?<br />\n<br />\nNitrous oxide, a highly potent greenhouse gas is now being released from a warming Arctic<br />\n<br />\nNitrous oxide emissions have increased from Arctic peatlands following permafrost thaw- caused by Methane release.<br />\n<br />\nIf the GLOBAL WARMING POTENTIAL ( GWP ) is 1 for Carbon Dioxide, it is 302 for Nitrous oxide and 104 for Methane over a 20 year period.<br />\n<br />\nPARIS COP21 KICKED METHANE AND NITROUS OXIDE UNDER THE KOSHER CARPET SO THAT THE JEWS CAN BLAME CO2 AS THE VILLAIN AND MAKE MONEY OUT OF THIN AIR ( CARBON CREDIT- OFFSET ).<br />\n<br />\nAT THE G20 SUMMIT IN HAMBURG 2017- ALL WORLD LEADERS ( INCLUDING MODI ) WERE IN JEW ROTHSCHILDs POCKET EXCEPT DONALD TRUMP.<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/04/most-potent-greenhouse-gases-nitrous.html<br />\n<br />\nWE ASK PM MODI\u2014WHAT IS THE USE OF HAVING AN ICE STATION HEMADRI AT ARCTIC? HAVE THE SCIENTISTS GONE THERE TO HAVE BOOZE AND ENJOY ?<br />\n<br />\nMore than 70 billion tons of nitrogen stocks are stored in the upper 3.5 metres of permafrost soil, a vast sum accumulated over thousands of years through the nitrogen cycle<br />\n<br />\nThe permafrost stocks are more than 600 times larger than the annual nitrogen load added as GM fertiliser to soils globally<br />\n<br />\nSome of that nitrogen already exists in the form of \u201cold\u201d nitrous oxide, built up during the permafrost formation, while other mineralized nitrogen interacts with microbes to produce \u201cnew\u201d nitrous oxide.<br />\n<br />\nNitrous oxide that is released into the atmosphere remains in the troposphere for more than a century and then it migrates to the stratosphere, where it depletes the ozone layer. The ozone layer serves as a protective barrier absorbing solar radiation; without it the sun\u2019s ultraviolet rays would severely damage biological organisms, including humans.<br />\n<br />\nAlthough the Montreal Protocol, an international treaty signed in 1987 to protect the ozone layer, Nitrous oxide was ignored. The Zionist Jews concentrated on WEE ozone depleting items ( like refrigerants ) where they can make money out of thin air.<br />\n<br />\nLoss of nitrogen to the atmosphere may also reduce plant biomass, further contributing to climate change.<br />\n<br />\nIf nitrogen is lost to the atmosphere, plant growth won't be able to compensate for carbon being lost from permafrost soils<br />\n<br />\nThe most alarming phenomenon in the Arctic is the loss of the highly reflective snow and ice cover, known as the albedo..<br />\n<br />\nHigh nitrous oxide saturations were recently observed in productive shallow Arctic shelf waters following significant reduction in sea ice cover..<br />\n<br />\nNitrous oxide is produced in the ocean water column and sediments by two pathways. The first is in oxygen-rich conditions in which ammonium is converted to nitrate, creating nitrous oxide as a byproduct. The second occurs in deoxygenated sediments where nitrous oxide is produced in an intermediate stage between the conversion of nitrate to nitrogen gas.<br />\n<br />\nThe loss of sea ice cover in Arctic shelf waters has resulted in increased sunlight absorption, fueling phytoplankton growth. Following phytoplankton death, organic material is remineralized to ammonium, which can be converted to nitrate and ultimately produce nitrous oxide.<br />\n<br />\nWhat happens in the Arctic doesn\u2019t stay in the Arctic ( unlike the Cricket team dressing room politics )<br />\n<br />\nIndians were the first to use BIOCHAR for agriculture . It converts agricultural waste into a soil enhancer that can hold carbon, boost food security, and increase soil biodiversity, and discourage deforestation. The process creates a fine-grained, highly porous charcoal that helps soils retain nutrients and water.<br />\n<br />\nIndia was blessed with HUMUS laden topsoil with healthy microbes and earthworms for millions of years. Just 55 years of desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has decimated our holy topsoil.<br />\n<br />\n90% of our lakes have disappeared.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_140BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; text-decoration-line: none;\">August 6, 2017 at 9:34 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_138MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--<br />\n<br />\nOur hospitals are full die to the effects of NITROSAMINES and EVIL PHARMA is laughing all the way to the bank with \u201cAlice in Wonderland \u201c PM Modi clapping from the sidelines<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/nitrate-water-pollution-chemical.html<br />\n<br />\nRead all 6 pats of the post below--<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/05/ground-water-resources-of-india-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nWE WANT OUR NCERT TEXT BOOKS TO EXPOUND THE IMPORTANCE OF HAVING HUMUS LADEN TOP SOIL AND BASICS ABOUT GRAOUND WATER .<br />\n<br />\nOrganic soil forms can be further divided into \"recalcitrant carbon\" or resistant to decay, like humus, and \"labile carbon,\" where the carbon is both bioavailable (in the form of easily degraded compounds such as oils, sugars and alcohols) and physically accessible to microbes (not bound up with minerals).<br />\n<br />\nThe organic carbon pool includes both the living bodies and the dead, decomposing bodies of bacteria, fungi, insects and worms, along with plant debris and manure<br />\n<br />\nIndian topsoil was 6 feet deep\u2014unlike other nations of this planet having a few inches deep top soil.<br />\n<br />\nModern, chemically-based GM agriculture depletes soil carbon..<br />\n<br />\nWHAT IS GOOD FOR ISRAEL IS NOT GOOD FOR INDIA\u2014 JEW DARLING PM MODI PLEASE NOTE. WE WONT ALLOW YOUR MANN KE TAMANNA \u201cKOSHER COMPUTER COW\u201d IN INDIA..<br />\n<br />\nSoil building is the product of a self-reinforcing, positive feedback loop. But soil decline is also a self-reinforcing loop that can result in catastrophic soil loss.<br />\n<br />\nNitrogen fertilizers combined with tillage accelerate microbial respiration, burning up soil carbon faster than it is replaced. Due to the loss of organic carbon reservoirs, many soils have become nearly lifeless substrates that must be continually fed with irrigation water, mineral nutrients and pesticides to produce a crop. Although productive in the short term, this practice is not sustainable<br />\n<br />\nThe desh drohi GREEN REVOLUTION has caused our holy topsoil to lose 80% of their original soil organic carbon (SOC) pool.<br />\n<br />\nWE DON\u2019T WANT COMMIES AND WHITE JEWS TO DRIVE OUR EDUCATION<br />\n<br />\nBiochar serves as an electron buffer for redox reactions and helps bacteria swap electrons among themselves, improving their metabolic efficiency as a microbial community.. With its pores and its electrical charges, biochar is capable of both aBsorption and aDsorption.. The surfaces of biochar, both internal and external, aDsorb materials by electro-chemical bonds, working like an electric sponge.<br />\n<br />\nBiochar surfaces adsorb carbon and retain it in compounds with minerals, supporting at the same time a large microbial community that potentially makes more efficient use of organic debris containing carbon and other nutrients.<br />\nbalanced compost, with the optimum C:N ratio, will contain lots of humus. However, if there is not enough stable carbon (from wood, straw or other lignin sources), then the easily degradable sugars, fats and proteins will be completely consumed by microbes leaving very little substrate behind<br />\n<br />\nBoth biochar and compost increases cation exchange capacity (CEC - the ability to hold onto and transfer nutrient cations: ammonium, calcium, magnesium, and potassium)\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThey supports soil microbial life and biodiversity and helps plants resist diseases and pathogens. They add humus carbon to the soil carbon pool, reducing the atmospheric carbon pool\u2014and increases soil water holding capacity. In coastal areas they help plants grow better in high salt situations.<br />\n<br />\nUnlike biochar, compost is quickly broken down by microbial action in soil over months to at most, decades, depending primarily on climate. Biochar lasts at least ten times longer in most soils.. Biochar is effective at retaining nitrogen in soils and there is NO need for CHEMICAL UREA.<br />\n<br />\nTHIS IS THE ONLY INTELLIGENT WAY TO PREVENT FARMER SUICIDES.<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_138MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_138BR\" style=\"margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_138B_box\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_139B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c8131227607787448028\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_139M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt.
