GIRL TO REJECT PARENTAL VETO TO GET\nVACCINATED IN SCHOOL.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SORRY, IN INDIA WE\nHAVE SOMETHING CALLED A PARENTAL SAY .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">\u201cThe governors\u2019 bills that allegedly make HPV\nvaccines mandatory for children prove that they are willing to do anything for\nthe globalists\u2019 profitable depopulation agenda,\u201d wrote investigative journalist\nSherri Kane, featured in the movie PHARMA WHORES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Delhi will become India\u2019s first state to\nstart vaccinating adolescent girls studying in\u2009Class VI\u2009in government schools\nagainst cervical cancer this year, with the free vaccination programme being\nexpanded to include all 9-13 year olds beginning next year. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">HPV vaccines are sold under brandnames\nCervarix (costs Rs 3,299 per dose) and for Gardasil (Rs 2,800 per dose). <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Note: Cervarix (GlaxoSmithKline) and Gardasil\n(Merck) both ZIONIST JEW companies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Human papillomaviruses (HPVs) are a group of\nmore than 200 related viruses. More than 40 HPV types can be easily spread through\ndirect sexual contact, from the skin and mucous membranes of infected people to\nthe skin and mucous membranes of their partners.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">They can be spread by vaginal,\nanal, and oral sex . Other HPV types are responsible for non-genital warts,\nwhich are not sexually transmitted.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">These vaccines are prophylactic\n(protective)-- SIC - in nature, but give no protection to women with cervical\ncancer and offer little cross protection against the more than 150 serotypes of\nHPV that also cause cancer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Most high-risk HPV infections ( to highly\nsexually active girls who do serial unprotected ORAL/ ANAL/ VAGINAL sex ) occur\nwithout any symptoms, go away within ONE years, and do not cause cancer<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Anal cancer: About 95 percent of anal cancers\nare caused by HPV. Most of these are caused by HPV type 16.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Oropharyngeal cancers (cancers of the middle\npart of the throat, including the soft palate, the base of the tongue, and the\ntonsils): About 70 percent of oropharyngeal cancers are caused by HPV. In the\nUnited States, more than half of cancers diagnosed in the oropharynx are linked\nto HPV type 16 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Any school girl who is sexually active (ie\nengaged in skin-to-skin sexual conduct, including vaginal, anal, or oral sex)\ncan get HPV.&nbsp; We do NOT have this problem\nin India.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SCHOOL GIRLS WHO ARE NOT SEXUALLY ACTIVE AND\nDEBAUCHED WILL NEVER EVER DEVELOP GENITAL HPV INFECTIONS.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; text-decoration: none;\">March 3, 2016 at 6:27 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_8MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nAre Bill and Melinda Gates Guilty of Committing Fraud in India?<br />\n<br />\nThe Bill &amp; Melinda Gates Foundation connected to the HPV vaccine and its trials in India?<br />\n<br />\nThe connection is that is that in 2002, The Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation (BMGF) acquired shares in Merck and the charge is that the BMGF along with an organisation called GAVI (a vaccine alliance funded by BMGF) are pushing a vaccine agenda in India and other places in the world in collusion with health authorities who are recommending the use of vaccines without proper testing; actions amounting to vaccine fraud.It has long been an ugly truth that Indian lives are cheaper compared with their western counterparts. Poorer sections of Indian communities are routinely used as human guinea pigs, subject to testing by pharmaceutical companies7 \u2013 testing that could be illegal or expensive or impossible in western nations; testing that is most often done without informed consent and at times by employing coercion, concealment and other underhand tactics.<br />\n<br />\nFull article - http://indiaopines.com/bill-melinda-gates-foundation-guilty-india-vaccine-fraud-garvi/<br />\n<br />\n<br />\nThe actions of the pharma company promoting their vaccine ruthlessly in India have been termed as \u2018fraud\u2019 and a PIL against Merck including its part owner the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation is currently pending in Supreme Court of India.</div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_8BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; line-height: 22.4px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nSTOP PRESS:<br />\n<br />\nSOME ONE ASKED ME --<br />\n<br />\nWHAT ARE THE INGREDIENTS OF PV VACCINE WHICH MAKES IT DANGEROUS?<br />\n<br />\nTh HPV vaccine contains a whole load of stuff that was never meant to inject into the human body like: aluminum, polysorbate 80, insect cells, bacteria, viral protein, sodium dihydrogen phosphate dehydrate, 3-O-desacyl-4\u2019 Monophosphoryl lipid A, yeast protein, sodium borate, and L-histidine etc<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/03/killer-aluminium-leaches-in-your-food.html<br />\n<br />\nHPV is a sexually transmitted infection.<br />\n<br />\nOUR INDIAN SCHOOL GIRLS DONT HAVE WANTON SEX LIKE THE WESTERN GIRLS<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br />The HPV vaccine does not prevent cancer</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br />The whole idea of vaccinating Indian girls is for the IMMORAL WHITE JEW to monitor long-term ovarian function--as Indian girls marry early.</b></span><br />\n<br />\nThe lives of young Indian school girls lives are being ruined before they hit puberty<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>This vaccine has never been proven to prevent a single case of cancer and it will be decades before we find out</b></span><br />\n<br />\nWE INDIANS KNOW WHY BILL GATES GOES RUNNING TO PUNE SERUM INSTITUTE GHADI GHADI-- PICTURE BAAKI HAI !<br />\n<br />\nWE WANT KHUJLIWAAL TO BE PUNISHED !<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WE WANT THE VISA OF BILL GATES TO BE REVOKED !</span></b><br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<header class=\"entry-header\" style=\"color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%; word-wrap: break-word;\"><h1 class=\"entry-title\" itemprop=\"headline\" style=\"border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: 29px !important; font-style: inherit; font-weight: 300; line-height: 1.2em; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\nPUTIN EXPOSES VACCINES</h1>\n<div class=\"entry-meta\" style=\"border: 0px; color: black; font-size: 13.6px; margin: 0.5em 0px 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n<span class=\"posted-on\" style=\"border: 0px; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><a href=\"http://prepareforchange.net/2016/03/05/putin-exposes-vaccines/\" rel=\"bookmark\" style=\"border: 0px; color: #666666; margin: 0px; outline: none; padding: 0px; text-decoration: none; transition: all 0.1s ease-in-out;\" title=\"1:35 AM\">March 5, 2016</a></span>&nbsp;<span class=\"byline\" style=\"border: 0px; display: inline; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\"><span class=\"author vcard\" itemprop=\"author\" itemscope=\"itemscope\" itemtype=\"http://schema.org/Person\" style=\"border: 0px; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">by&nbsp;<a class=\"url fn n\" href=\"http://prepareforchange.net/author/dane/\" itemprop=\"url\" rel=\"author\" style=\"border: 0px; color: #666666; margin: 0px; outline: none; padding: 0px; text-decoration: none; transition: all 0.1s ease-in-out;\" title=\"View all posts by Dane Arr\"><span class=\"author-name\" itemprop=\"name\" style=\"border: 0px; margin: 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">Dane Arr</span></a></span></span></div>\n</header><br />\n<div class=\"entry-content\" itemprop=\"text\" style=\"border-image-outset: initial; border-image-repeat: initial; border-image-slice: initial; border-image-source: initial; border-image-width: initial; border: 0px; color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 150%; margin: 2em 0px 0px; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n<div style=\"border: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n<img alt=\"Russia-western-vaccine-coverup-900x350\" class=\"aligncenter size-full wp-image-14193\" src=\"http://pfc.prepareforchange.netdna-cdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Russia-western-vaccine-coverup-900x350.jpg\" height=\"350\" kasperskylab_antibanner=\"on\" sizes=\"(max-width: 900px) 100vw, 900px\" srcset=\"http://pfc.prepareforchange.netdna-cdn.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Russia-western-vaccine-coverup-900x350-300x117.jpg 300w, http://prepareforchange.net/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Russia-western-vaccine-coverup-900x350-768x299.jpg 768w, http://prepareforchange.net/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/Russia-western-vaccine-coverup-900x350.jpg 900w\" style=\"clear: both; display: block; height: auto; margin: 0px auto; max-width: 100%;\" width=\"900\" /></div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\nRussian president Vladimir Putin says that Western governments are enslaving humanity through vaccines.</div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n\u2018When your children are barely human, psychologically-altered bots, their nerve cells and synapses failing to connect, and their neurodevelopmental processes dulled to the point of restricting them to sub-human level repetitive grunts and gormless stares, what are you going to do then?\u2019</div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\nAn insider from the Ministry of Health in Russia has revealed that an explosive report is being prepared that will be presented to the Kremlin on Tuesday regarding the huge vaccination cover-up being perpetuated by the US government agencies and its regulatory bodies, which is having disastrous consequences around most of the world.</div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\nIt is understood President Putin personally requested the report. He instinctively mistrusts the vaccine agenda and wants the report to investigate the state of play regarding vaccines, Big Pharma, and</div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\nWestern governments, in order to formulate a solid, direct response that will stand his people in good stead for the future.</div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\nAccording to the Ministry of Health insider, the report validates President Putin\u2019s suspicions. There is a huge conflict of interests between the government agencies which regulate vaccines and the corporations that approve and implement the vaccines.</div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\nThis investigation, involving internationally respected scientists and leading medical professionals, won\u2019t be a laughably corrupt affair involving a payroll of \u2018scientists\u2019 who are willing to say or do anything for a dollar or two. Considering the fact that leading scientists and doctors who have dared voice concern about state-enforced vaccinations have been dying under mysterious circumstances in the US in recent years, kudos must be given to those brave enough to continue speaking out.</div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\nIt is claimed the report will declare the situation a \u2018self-perpetuating criminal racket.\u2019 Educational institutions and scientific bodies are also \u2018motivated by greed and generally corrupt.\u2019 A recent study by the University of Bristol that declared diet soda to be healthier than water (a study covertly funded by the Coca Cola Company) is presented as an example of the absurd situation in the West at the moment, and is held up to ridicule.</div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\nThe report says that President Putin believes the next stage of human evolution is currently in \u201cgrave risk\u201d and that Western and global powers are \u201cintentionally decelerating the process for their personal gain.\u201d</div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n\u201cWe as a species have the choice to continue to develop our bodies and brains in a healthy upward trajectory, or we can follow the Western example of recent decades and intentionally poison our population with genetically altered food, pharmaceuticals, vaccinations, and fast food that should be classified as a dangerous, addictive drug.\u201d</div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\n\u201cWe must fight this. A physically and intellectually disabled population is not in our interests,\u201d the report states.</div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\nDescribing the average government-controlled Westerner as an \u201cintensively vaccinated borderline autistic fat man slumped in front of a screen battling a high-fructose corn syrup comedown,\u201d the report states that such tactics used by governments to subjugate their citizens are not only \u201cdark/evil\u201d but \u201ccounter-productive in the medium to long term.\u201d</div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\nRussia under President Putin has been giving away land for free in the past few years to people willing to farm organically and sustainably. The goal is to become the world\u2019s \u201cleading exporter\u201d of non-GMO foods that are based on \u201cecologically clean\u201d production.</div>\n<div style=\"border: 0px; margin-bottom: 1.5em; outline: 0px; padding: 0px;\">\nThe Security Council report comes just months after the Kremlin announced a stop to the production of all GMO-containing foods, which was seen by the international community as a major step in the fight against multinationals like Monsanto. Russia continues to lead the way in the realm of natural, organic farming.</div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">http://prepareforchange.net/2016/03/05/putin-exposes-vaccines/</span><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_43M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I HAVE SAID SEVERAL\nTIMES THAT VACCINES IN THRID WORLD NATION ARE MODIFIED TO REDUCE FERTILITY IN\nBOTH MALES AND FEMALE \u2013AND TO REDUCE BRAIN POWER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aborted human fetal\nproteins, altered DNA material, and GM human albumin is used by EVIL pharma.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IN KERALA WE NEVER HAD\nAUTISM BEFORE WE STARTED COMPULSORY VACCINATIONS LIKE MMR<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MMR vaccine contains GM\nhuman protein, and has caused vaccine-induced neurological damage in Indian\nbabies\u2014all this is hushed up.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">INDIAN BABIES ARE USED\nAS GUINEA PIGS WITH CONNIVANCE OF DOCTORS WHO ARE SENT ON PEDOPHILE SEXUAL\nJAUNTS TO THAILAND AND EUROPE .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cell culture techniques\nto produce vaccine viruses in human cell strains is kept as a closely guarded\nsecret<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vaccine manufacturers\ndo not test their products for mutagenic potential. The long term adverse\neffects of using aborted fetal cells for vaccine production are virtually\nunknown, yet millions of these vaccines are administered every day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cell cultures involve\ngrowing cells in a culture vessel. A primary cell culture consists of cells\ntaken directly from living tissue and never subcultivated, and may contain\nmultiple types of cells such as fibroblasts, epithelial, and endothelial cells.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A cell strain is a cell\nculture that contains only one type of cell in which the cells are normal and\nhave a finite capacity to replicate. Cell strains can be made by taking\nsubcultures from an original, primary culture until only one type remains. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Primary cultures can be\nmanipulated in many different ways in order to isolate a single type of cell;\nspinning the culture in a centrifuge can separate large cells from small ones,\nfor example. An immortalized cell line is a cell culture of a single type of\ncell that can reproduce indefinitely. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Normally, cells are\nsubject to the Hayflick Limit, a rule named for cell biologist Leonard\nHayflick, PhD. Hayflick determined that a population of normal human cells will\nreproduce only a finite number of times before they cease to reproduce. However\nsome cells in culture have undergone a mutation, or they have been manipulated\nin the laboratory, so that they reproduce indefinitely.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rubella vaccines\ndeveloped using duck embryo cells and dog kidney cells. Polio vaccines\ndeveloped using primary monkey kidney cells were contaminated with simian\nviruses: this was one of the reasons researchers began using the normal human\ncell strain WI-38 in the first place.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are two\nparticular fetal cell lines that have been heavily used in vaccine development.\nThey are named according to the laboratory facilities where they were\ndeveloped. One cell line is known as WI-38, developed at the Wistar Institute\nin Philadelphia, PA. The other is MRC-5, developed for the Medical Research\nCouncil in England.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED TO 2<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MRC-5 cells are used to\nproduce several vaccines including MMR, Varicella and Polio. Infected MRC-5\ncells secrete the virus, and are cultured in large volumes..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MRC-5 cell line was\ndeveloped in September 1966 from lung tissue taken from a 14 week fetus aborted\nfor psychiatric reason from a 27 year old physically healthy woman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MRC-5 (Medical Research\nCouncil cell strain 5) is a diploid human cell culture line composed of fibroblasts\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MRC-5 cell strain (\nfetal lung cells) was developed, using Hayflick's technology, in 1970 at the\nMedical Research Center in the United Kingdom. It should be noted that\nHayflick's methods involved establishing a huge bank of WI-38 and MRC-5 cells\nthat, while not capable of infinitely replicating like immortal cell lines<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Several vaccines\ncurrently available in the United States were developed using animal cell\nstrains, primarily using cells from African green monkeys. These include\nvaccines against Japanese encephalitis, rotavirus, polio, and smallpox.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Indian babies have been\nsacrificed for use in the research and development of vaccines. DNA from these\naborted fetuses is present in vaccines<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MAXIMUM BRIBES FOR\nINDIAN MINISTERS , BABUS COME FROM EVIL PHARMA VIA SHELL COMPANIES.. THESE\nBRIBED CRIMINALS THREATENED BLOGGERS ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/03/say-no-to-hpv-vaccination-for-indian.html<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In\nrecent times the role of the Judiciary in India has recently come under severe\nattack, particularly from the Legislative branch, which feels that the courts\nhave been exceeding their authority in interpreting the law, and that they have\nbecome an extra constitutional lawmaking body. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Simple example\n? :&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Gujarat High Court had ordered that all new vehicles\nregistered in the state should run on CNG. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/interstitial-lung-disease-nano-carbon.html\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/interstitial-lung-disease-nano-carbon.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">EXAMPLE&nbsp; OF OVERREACH :&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;THE\nITALIAN WAITRESS CREATED NAC SO THAT SHE CAN BE \u201cSUPER PRIMEMINISTER \u201c<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/extreme-judicial-overreach-in-india.html\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/extreme-judicial-overreach-in-india.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>TYRANNY OF THE UNELECTED \"COLLEGIUM \" JUDGES -BY ARUN JAITLEY</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://www.firstpost.com/politics/indian-democracy-cannot-be-a-tyranny-of-the-unelected-arun-jaitleys-alternative-view-on-the-njac-verdict-2473218.html\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">http://www.firstpost.com/politics/indian-democracy-cannot-be-a-tyranny-of-the-unelected-arun-jaitleys-alternative-view-on-the-njac-verdict-2473218.html</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">BELOW IS A SHINING EXAMPLE OF \"COLLEGIUM\" JUDGES PLAYING GOD.&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">FINANCE MINISTER CHARGED WITH SEDITION BY MELOR</b><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">D</b><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"> !</b></span></span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/Sedition-charge-on-finance-minister-Arun-Jaitley-for-slamming-SCs-NJAC-ruling/articleshow/49488057.cms\"><span style=\"color: red;\">http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/Sedition-charge-on-finance-minister-Arun-Jaitley-for-slamming-SCs-NJAC-ruling/articleshow/49488057.cms</span></a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4413454713487168242\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 17.6px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_26M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/03/jnu-den-of-anti-nationals-and-communist_54.html?showComment=1456942509922#c4413454713487168242\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">March 2, 2016 at 11:45 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_26MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: medium;\"><span style=\"color: red;\"><b>IMPORTANT &nbsp;.. IMPORTANT . IMPORTANT . .</b></span></span><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">THIS COMMENT IS THE MOST CRITICAL AND IMPORTANT ONE EVER SINCE I STARTED THIS BLOGSITE.&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">PUT THIS COMMENT IN THE WEBSITES OF MODI, PMO, RAJNATH SINGH, PARRIKKAR, RSS, SWAMY, GOWDA, PRASAD , ALL DESH BHAKT BJP MINISTERS, ALL DESH BHAKT IAS, ARNAB GOSWAMI, ZEE NEWS, TWITTER, FACEBOOK ETC&nbsp;</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: magenta;\">DO IT NOW !</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">THE WATAN WILL PERISH, IF THIS ISSUE IS NOT ADDRESSED ASAP.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n#####################################<br />\nTHE NEW WORLD ORDER HAS USED A BACKDOOR LOOP HOLE TO MAKE THE \u201cCOLLEGIUM\u201d JUDICARY PLAY GOD.<br />\n<br />\nOUR CONSTITUTION DOES NOT ALLOW A \u201cCOLLEGIUM \u201c JUDICIARY , BUT ALLOWS ONLY NJAC . . .<br />\n<br />\nTHE \u201cCOLLEGIUM \u201c JUDICIARY IS CONTROLLED FROM ABROAD BY BILDERBERG CLUB . .<br />\n<br />\nBY WAY OF PIL, BY SOME TROJAN HORSE FOREIGN FUNDED NGO, OR A DESH DROHI , OR A TRAITOR TO THE WATAN etc EMPOWERS THE INDIAN JUDICIARY TO TAKE ON AN \u201cACTIVIST \u201c ROLE . .<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA OBJECT TO MISUSE OF PIL TO EMPOWER THE \u201cCOLLEGIUM \u201c JUDGES IN A SLIMY MANNER AGAINST THE INTERESTS OF BHARATMATA.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nThe concept of Public Interest Litigation (PIL) is in consonance with the principles enshrined in Article 39A of the Constitution of India to protect and deliver prompt social justice with the help of law.<br />\n<br />\nBUT WHAT REALLY HAPPENS IS THAT BENAMI MEDIA OWNED NGOs WITH JUDICIARY IN CAHOOTS SELL BHARATMATA IN THE ZIONIST JEW WHORE HOUSE.<br />\n<br />\nThe seeds of the concept of public interest litigation were initially sown in India by Krishna Iyer J.,in 1976 in Mumbai Kamgar Sabha vs. Abdul Thai (AIR 1976 SC 1455) and was initiated in AkhilBharatiya Shoshit Karmachari Sangh (Railway) v. Union of India (AIR 1981 SC 298), wherein an unregistered association of workers was permitted to institute a writ petition under Art.32 of the Constitution for the redressal of common grievances ( controlled by BIG BROTHER )<br />\n<br />\nThe Judicial Activism in India can he witnessed with reference to the review power of the Supreme Court under Article 32 and I (belt Courts under Article 226 of the Constitution particularly in Public Interest Litigation.<br />\n<br />\nThe traditional rule of \"Locus Standi\" that a person, whose right is<br />\ninfringed alone can file a petition, has been considerably relaxed by the Supreme Court in its recent decisions.<br />\n<br />\nNow, the court permits public interest litigation at the instance of the so-called<br />\n\u201cPUBLIC-SPIRITED CITIZENS\u201d ( read as FOREIGN FUNDED NGOs )for the enforcement of Constitutional and Legal rights.<br />\n<br />\nNow, any public spirited citizen ( DESH DROHI ) can move/approach the court for the public cause (in the interests of the public or public welfare) by filing a petition:<br />\n1. In the Supreme Court under Article 32 of the Constitution of India;<br />\n2. In the High Court under Article 226 of the Indian Constitution<br />\n3. In the Court of Magistrate under Section 133 of the Code of Criminal procedure<br />\n<br />\nJudge PN Bhagwati., of the Supreme Court in S.P. Gupta vs. Union of India. (AIR 1982 SC 149) popularly known as \u201cJUDGES TRANSFER CASE\u201d, firmly established the validity of the public interest litigation.<br />\n<br />\nSince then, a good number of public interest litigation petitions were filed\u2014all of them going against the interests of the WATAN..<br />\n<br />\nPrafullachandra Natwarlal Bhagwati was the 17th Chief Justice of India,( 1985 to 1986 ).<br />\n<br />\nHe introduced the concepts of Public Interest Litigation and Absolute liability in India, and for this reason is held along with Justice V. R. Krishna Iyer, to be a pioneer of judicial activism in the country.<br />\n<br />\nWe know why the Italian waitress gave Justice PN Bhagawati , the Padma Vibhushan, India's second highest civilian award, in 2007.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/SC-to-Prashant-Bhushan-How-can-you-become-the-centre-for-public-interest-litigation/articleshow/50553688.cms</span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2-</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_26BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_24T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_24TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_26b+seedCWRID\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_24B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 8px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4606794302216304381\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_24M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_24MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1-<br />\n<br />\nThe COLLEGIUM judges of the Supreme Court , with connivance of BILDERBERG CLUB has now invented its own laws and methods of implementation, to gain control of bureaucracy , IB, RAW, NIA and have again and again threatened officers with contempt of court if its instructions are not complied with.<br />\n<br />\nThe COLLEGIUM JUDGES &nbsp;have arrogated vast and uncontrolled powers to themselves which undermine both Democracy and Rule of Law, including the powers exercised under the Doctrine of Separation of powers<br />\n<br />\nOur constitution is a very well-built document. It assigns different roles to all the three wings of governance- the legislature, executive and the judiciary.<br />\n<br />\nThere is no ambiguity about each wing\u2019s powers, privileges and duties. Parliament has to enact law, Executive has to enforce them and the judiciary has to interpret them. There is supposed to be no overlapping or overstepping.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">Lok Sabha Speaker, Som Nath Chatterjee had accused the Judiciary for interfering in the legislative matters and stated publicly that \u2018every one has to remain within the Laxman Rekha of the Constitution\u2019.</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">The Lok Sabha speaker when taunting the Judiciary to stay within the Laxman Rekha was referring to the judicial deliberations of 11 MP\u2019s in the Cash-for-Queries scam.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nUnder Article 121 of the Constitution, the conduct of a judge cannot be debated in the Parliament.<br />\n<br />\nThere is a separate procedure for impeachment; this is with the intention to secure the independence of the judiciary.<br />\n<br />\nSimilarly, under Article 122, the proceedings of the parliament cannot be questioned by the judiciary- even if a point of order is found contrary to the statue.<br />\n<br />\nThis is indirectly envisaging the supremacy of the legislature in making laws, based on reasonable policies that cannot be questioned.<br />\n<br />\nToday a COLLEGIUM Judge is accountable to no one, not even to another judge, the question of legislature and executive does not arise. What is the value of the vote of WE THE PEOPLE ?<br />\n<br />\nThere needs to be a re-mentioning of the fact that a PIL under Article 32 of the Indian Constitution can only be filed if a question concerning the enforcement of a Fundamental Right is involved.<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b><b><span style=\"color: red;\">WE KNOW WHY PRASHANT BHUSHAN FILES SO MANY PILs.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2015/10/extreme-judicial-overreach-in-india.html</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\">WE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA WHO ARE ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION WILL NOT ALLOW THE \u201cCOLLEGIUM \u201c JUDICIARY TO TRANSGRESS INTO THE DOMAIN OF THE LEGISLATURE BY USE OF A DESH DROHI LOOPHOLE NAMED PIL</span></b><br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 3-</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_25B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><br /></li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_25B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c4804135094641889351\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_25MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2-<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">WE KNOW WHY \u201cCOLLEGIUM \u201c JUDGES OF SC WANT WHORE HOUSE CHAMIYA BEER BARS IN MUMBAI TO BE OPENED AND THAT TOO WITH A DEADLINE.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://www.ndtv.com/mumbai-news/maharashtra-dance-bars-to-reopen-no-cameras-on-dancers-supreme-court-1283205</span><br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">In a King Canute nay GOD gesture, the COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY had commanded the Indian govt to INTERLINK ALL INDIAN RIVERS with a deadline and kill bharatmata.</span></b><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://articles.economictimes.indiatimes.com/2012-02-27/news/31104318_1_interlinking-social-activists-rivers</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/05/interlinking-rivers-of-india-capt-ajit.html</span><br />\n<br />\nBEFORE 1947, JEW ROTHSCHILD HAS ALMOST THE ENTIRE COLLEGIUM JUDGES IN HIS PAYROLL . .<br />\n<br />\nIn 2006, in the Police case, the Supreme Court has created new extra-constitutional institutions who have virtually taken over the administration of the police especially in service and operational matters contrary to the existing laws, rules, regulations and orders.<br />\n<br />\nToday, in some areas, bureaucrats in committees approved by the Supreme Court can bypass their own ministers because they report to the Supreme Court. So, we now have an Executive cum legislating Judiciary.<br />\n<br />\nGone are those days when the Supreme Court simply ordered the executive to ensure that the laws are implemented.<br />\n<br />\nNow, the Supreme Court has created its own executive and legislative wing.<br />\n<br />\nIt has invented its own laws, rules, and methods of implementation, and has used contempt of court as a threat for disobedience of its orders.<br />\n<br />\nThe question remains, whether the courts have come too far and undermined its own established principle of Basic structure, including separation of Power and buried the rule of law.<br />\n<br />\nIndia is a democracy and it has to be and should be governed by elected representatives and not merely judges, amicus curiae or committees and commissions that are accountable to the Supreme Court.<br />\n<br />\nLet there be a check, a Judge\u2019s (Inquiry) Bill, 2008 to be interpreted by the judiciary again.<br />\n<br />\nAfter all a Constitutional responsibility flows from a democratically elected legislature and a Judicial Dictatorship is not better than any other kind.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">IN A DEMOCRACY, PEOPLE HOLD THE POWER-</span></b><br />\n<br />\nNOT JUDICIARY.<br />\n<br />\n\"WE THE PEOPLE \" CAN DEMOLISH THE PILLAR OF JUDICIARY.<br />\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">JUDICIARY CANNOT DEMOLISH \"WE THE PEOPLE\" POWER.</span></b><br />\n<br />\nIN A LOT OF NATIONS EVERY SINGLE JUDGE IS IN THE PAYROLL OF ZIONIST JEWS.<br />\n<br />\nWE INDIANS ARE WATCHING . .. WE ARE NOT STUPID . .. PICTURE BAAKI HAI MELORDS !<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; My book is nothing but a simple historic record of facts. I shall place before the reader the theories of the Hindus exactly as they are, and I shall mention in connection with them similar theories of the Greeks in order to show the relationship existing between them.(1910, Vol. 1, p. 7;1958, p. 5)Hindus considered Muslims violent and impure, and did not want to share anything with him.<br />\nOver time, Al-Biruni won the welcome of Hindu scholars. Al-Biruni collected books and studied with these Hindu scholars to become fluent in Sanskrit, discover and translate into Arabic the mathematics, science, medicine, astronomy and other fields of arts as practiced in 11th century India. He was inspired by the arguments offered by Indian scholars who believed earth must be ellipsoid shape, with yet to be discovered continent at earth's south pole, and earth's rotation around the sun is the only way to fully explain the difference in daylight hours by latitude, seasons and earth's relative positions with moon and stars.[36] Al-Biruni was also critical of Indian scribes who he believed carelessly corrupted Indian documents while making copies of older documents.[37] Al-Biruni's translations as well as his own original contributions reached Europe in 12th and 13th century, where they were actively sought.<br />\n<br />\nWhile others were killing each other over religious differences, Al-Biruni had a remarkable ability to engage Hindus in peaceful dialogue. Mohammad Yasin puts this dramatically when he says, \u201cThe Indica is like a magic island of quiet, impartial research in the midst of a world of clashing swords, burning towns, and burned temples.\u201d (Indica is another name for Al-Biruni\u2019s history of India). (Yasin, 1975, p. 212). :UNQUOTE<br />\n<br />\nhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Al-Biruni<br />\n<br />\nANCIENT ARABS AND GREEKS DO NOT HAVE A SINGLE INVENTION OR DISCOVERY repeat NOT A SINGLE INVENTION OR DISCOVERY , WHICH IS NOT STOLEN FROM INDIA .. . font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WATER FLOW DOWN, NOT UPWARDS .<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>ALL KNOW THAT THIS BLOGSITE WAS THE ONLY ONE\nWHICH WENT AGAINST RIVER INTERLINKING<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/05/interlinking-rivers-of-india-capt-ajit.html\" style=\"background-color: yellow;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/05/interlinking-rivers-of-india-capt-ajit.html</a><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>I CAN REST MY CASE AND TERMINATE THIS BLOG, &nbsp;RIGHT NOW \u2014<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>SORRY, &nbsp; I CAN WRITE 2000 PAGES ON WHY THE \u201cCOLLEGIUM\u201d\nJUDGE DICTATORSHIP IS MOST DANGEROUS FOR THE SURVIVAL OF THIS GREAT NATION.<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WHO ARE THESE COLLEGIUM JUDGES ?<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">UNSUCCESSFUL LAWYERS TURNED JUDGES - BOTTOM OF THE SCHOOL CEREBRAL BARREL ?</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">In chapter XI of his book Charles-Louis de\nSecondat, Baron de La Br\u00e8de et de Montesquieu, writes:<o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i>( This man is known for his articulation of the\ntheory of separation of powers, which is implemented in the Indian constitution)</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">\u201cWhen the legislative and executive powers\nare united in the same person, or in the same body of&nbsp; magistrates, there can be no liberty; because\napprehensions may arise, lest the same monarch or senate should enact\ntyrannical laws, to execute them in a tyrannical manner.\"<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">IN INDIA THIS IS MOST IMPORTANT ,&nbsp; ESPECIALLY IF THE \u201cCOLLEGIUM\u201d JUDGES ARE\nCONTROLLED BY BILDERBERG CLUB&nbsp; -&nbsp; LIKE IN PAKISTAN</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/shrewd-club-within-naive-bilderberg.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/09/shrewd-club-within-naive-bilderberg.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The typical division of\nbranches is into a legislature, an executive, and a judiciary. It can be\ncontrasted with the fusion of powers in a parliamentary system where the\nexecutive and legislature (and sometimes parts of the judiciary) are unified.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Separation of powers, therefore, refers to the\ndivision of government responsibilities into distinct branches to limit any one\nbranch from exercising the core functions of another. The intent is to prevent\nthe concentration of power and provide for checks and balances.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA\nVOTE AND ELECT THE EXECUTIVE AND LEGISLATURE.&nbsp;\n&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALMOST THE INDIAN MEDIA IS&nbsp; BENAMI AND CONTROLLED BY BIG BROTHER, WE ALL\nKNOW THAT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JUDICIARY IS UNELECTED.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WE COULD HAVE TRUSTED\nTHE NJAC SYSTEM.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the words of Chief\nJustice Neely of the West Virginia State Supreme Court:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cI have very few\nillusions about my own limitations as a judge. I am not an accountant,\nelectrical engineer, financier, banker, stockbroker or system management\nanalyst. It is the height of folly to expect Judges to intelligently review a\n5000 page record addressing the intricacies of a public utility operation. It\nis not the function of a Judge to act as a super board, or with the zeal of a\npedantic school master substituting its judgment for that of the administrator\u201d\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HE WAS A LAWYER BEFORE ,\n&nbsp;RIGHT ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Under the Indian\nConstitution, there is broad separation of powers between the three organs of\ndemocracy&nbsp; i.e. the pillar of\nlegislature, roof of elected executive, and pillar of judiciary.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each of these\nhave their broad spheres of operation, and it is ordinarily not proper for one\norgan of the state to encroach into the domain of another.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; But hey, now they are playing GOD !&nbsp;\nWe want 50% of NCW to me males. As per our constitution men and women\nhave same rights.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">The National Human\nRights Commission (NHRC)</b> of India is an autonomous public body constituted in\n1993 . But hey, they want to save dying city of Detroit , for\nwhich we Indians have to scrap our vehicles after 10 years. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The&nbsp;\nlegislature, executive and judiciary have to function within their own\nspheres demarcated under the Constitution. &nbsp;&nbsp;No organ can usurp the functions assigned to\nanother.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: large;\"><b>The&nbsp;\nIndian Constitution does not permit the COLLEGIUM judiciary&nbsp; to DIRECT&nbsp;\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">or even ADVISE</span>&nbsp; the elected\nexecutive in matters of policy or to sermonise qua any matter.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>As per the Indian Constitution lies this\nprerogative lies within the sphere of the ELECTED legislature or executive,\nprovided these authorities do not transgress their constitutional limits or\nstatutory powers.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>People of India , read this BLUE para a\nmillion times !&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 250%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>ENOUGH IS ENOUGH &nbsp;!</b></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; IMPORTANT- IMPORTANT !!<br />\n<br />\nSUBJECT : Man gets month in jail for defaming judiciary on social networking sites .<br />\n<br />\n####################<br />\n<br />\nhttp://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/Man-gets-month-in-jail-for-defaming-judiciary-on-social-networking-sites/articleshow/45340146.cms<br />\n<br />\nOUR CONSTITUTION ALLOWS EVERY CHILD OF BHARATMATA TO EXPRESS HIS POINT OF VIEW .<br />\n<br />\nIT IS DUE TO THIS FUNDAMENTAL RIGHT, THE PEOPLE OF INDIA WERE ABLE TO REJECT THE JUSTICE BANNERJEE RULING THAT A HINDU WOMAN SET THE RAILWAY COMPARTMENT S6 OF SABARMATI EXPRESS ON IRE AT GODHRA .<br />\n<br />\nTHE LAWS PERTAINING TO CONTEMPT OF COURT MUST BE REPEALED .<br />\n<br />\nTHESE LAWS WERE INTRODUCED BY THE OWNER OF BRITISH EAST INDIA COMPANY GERMAN JEW ROTHSCHILD TO SUBVERT THE SYSTEM USING HIS PET JUDGES , WHOM HE KNIGHTED .<br />\n<br />\nnowadays the judiciary wants to executive/ legislative pillars to speed up - when in reality the pillar of judiciary is slowest - cases are pending for 3 decades .<br />\n<br />\nare the judges god ?<br />\n<br />\ndo they not see how much PM narendra modi is taking daily ?<br />\n<br />\nYET IF YOU DONT CALL A JUDGE MeLORD - HE WILL TRY TO PUT YOU IN JAIL FOR CONTEMPT OF COURT .<br />\n<br />\nRecently we had a HC judge who slapped contempt charge against entire editorial staff for false report .<br />\n<br />\nTHIS TYPE OF SAVE MY SON THING BY A JUDGE FATHER , DOES NOT AUGUR WELL FOR BHARATMATA OR THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION !<br />\n<br />\nhttp://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/delhi/HC-judge-slaps-contempt-charge-against-entire-editorial-staff-for-false-report/articleshow/44943755.cms<br />\n<br />\nCONTEMPT OF COURT POWERS OF MELORD MUST NOW BE ABOLISHED FOR GOOD , USING THIS INCIDENT AS A SPRING BOARD .<br />\n<br />\nTELLING THE TRUTH, TO SAVE BHARATMATA IS NOW DEFAMATION AND HATE SPEECH -- MIND YOU WE HAVE JUST COME OUT OF 800 YEARS OF SLAVERY .<br />\n<br />\nFOREIGN FUNDED DESH DROHIS ARE RUNNING WILD IN INDIA .<br />\n<br />\nDESH BHAKTS CANNOT DARE TO EXPOSE DANGERS THE WATAN IS FACING .<br />\n<br />\nTHE INDIAN JUDICIARY IS GUILT OF SEVERE OVER REACH IN RECENT TIMES .<br />\n<br />\nTHEY ORDERED INTERLINKING OF RIVERS WITH A DEADLINE -- WHEN THEY ARE JUST ONE PILLAR AMONG FOUR OF INDIAN DEMOCRACY .<br />\n<br />\nTHEY SET THE BAIL LIMIT OF TEN THOUSAND CRORES FOR THE SAHARA SUBRATA ROY CASE .<br />\n<br />\nOUR CONSTITUTION AND OUR LAWS DO NOT ALLOW THIS .<br />\n<br />\nWE NEED TO PULL DOWN THE PILLAR OF JUDICIARY AND ERECT IT AGAIN, USING JURY SYSTEM .<br />\n<br />\nKARUNANIDHI EVEN HAD HIS PET DALIT JUDGE ASHOK KUMAR , WHO CRIED WHEN KARUNANIDHI WAS ARRESTED , ASKING, IS YOUR HEART MADE OF MUSCLE OR MUD !!<br />\n<br />\nIn USA contempt of court , long ago fell foul of the 1st Amendment and is dismissed as \u2018 English foolishness\u2019 - it was contempt against a JEW ROTHSCHILD APPOINTED JUDGE actually .<br />\n<br />\nIn UK there is NO contempt of court since the 1930s--and was formally abolished a year ago .,<br />\n<br />\nThe power to punish for contempt was necessary to \u201csecure public respect and confidence in the judicial process\u201d--but in India WE THE PEOPLE who are supreme , do NOT have the respect anymore.<br />\n<br />\nWe must bring back the JURY SYSTEM which was abolished after justice was hijacked by RK Karanjia to save a fellow Parsi naval commander Nanavati, who killed his wife's lover Ahuja--which also catapulted the lawyer of Ahuja Ram Jethmalani to the national stage . .<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_187M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/11/altamas-kabir-worst-chief-justice-of.html?showComment=1410619544236#c2747892284606668345\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">September 13, 2014 at 8:15 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_187MC\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nSUBJECT : Judicial independence non-negotiable, efforts to take it away won't succeed: CJI RM Lodha .<br />\n########################################<br />\n<br />\nJUDICIARY HAS FALLEN FROM HEAVEN .<br />\n<br />\nTHEY ARE OVER THE PEOPLE OF THE LAND -- YOU SEE, THEY HAVE POWER OVER LIFE AND DEATH . THAT IS WHY JUDICIARY IS SUPREME .<br />\n<br />\nDEMOCRACY IS ACTUALLY , OF THE JUDICIARY, BY THE JUDICIARY AND FOR THE JUDICIARY .<br />\n<br />\nNEVER MIND THE JUDGES WERE, FOOT SLOGGING, LYING THROUGH THE TEETH LAWYERS BEFORE, WHO DID NOT MAKE TOO MUCH OF MOOLAH -- LIKE RAM JETHMALANI .<br />\n<br />\nTHE OTHER THREE PILLARS OF DEMOCRACY , LEGISLATURE, EXECUTIVE AND MEDIA HAVE POPPED OUT OF STINKING AND EVIL HELL .<br />\n<br />\nHOLY COW JUDICIARY , CAN KICK THE OTHER 3 PILLARS ANY TIME THEY WANT .<br />\n<br />\nPILLAR OF JUDICIARY CAN TELL OTHER 3 PILLARS TO SPEED UP, WHEN JUDICIARY IS THE SLOWEST-- SLOWER THAN AN EFFIN\u2019 SNAIL .<br />\n<br />\nJUDICIARY CAN INDULGE IN IMMORAL OVER REACH LIKE TELLING A LAWFUL GOVT TO SPEED UP RIVER INTERLINKING WITH A DEADLINE .<br />\n<br />\nIF YOU DARE TO SPEAK AGAINST JUDICIARY YOU ARE GUILTY OF CONTEMPT -- BUT YOU ARE FREE TO ABUSE THE PM , PRESIDENT , LOK SABHA SPEAKER ETC . BUT HOW CAN YOU EVEN POINT OUT A MISTAKE OF MELORD ?<br />\n<br />\nSEE, THE SHIT OF JUDICIARY DOES NOT SMELL .<br />\n<br />\nTHE TURD OF JUDICIARY COMES WRAPPED IN PERFUMED CELLOPHANE !!!<br />\n<br />\nPOINT TO PONDER: It is personal attack relating to the administration of justice which constitutes criminal contempt of court .<br />\n<br />\nIn 1962 a Committee headed by H.N. Sanyal, the then Solicitor General of India, was appointed by the Government of India to review and suggest modifications in the law of contempt of court. The Committee in its report said the summary jurisdiction to punish for contempt of court trenches upon two most important fundamental rights, namely, personal liberty and freedom of speech and expression, rights which are of vital importance in any democratic system and the law should be viewed mainly from that standpoint.<br />\nThe Sanyal Committee was of the opinion that the law of contempt of court must harmonise with the constitutional guarantee of freedom of expression and personal liberty.<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\">HN SANYAL WAS MURDERED !</span></b><br />\n<br />\n&nbsp;.<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>Judges must shed human\nego if they wish to safe guard the constitution. &nbsp;&nbsp;Policy matters must be left to the ELECTED\nexecutive.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If there is air\npollution in Delhi the judiciary is well within its rights to alert the elected\nexecutive.&nbsp; But&nbsp; WE THE PEOPLE will NOT allow the UNELECTED\njudiciary to give specific TECHNICAL ORDERS &nbsp;-- they don\u2019t have the power to do this.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If COLLEGIUM JUDGES continue in this foul manner , &nbsp;we the people who are above the constitution , will demand that the judges are punished for judicial overreach and breaking\nthe rule of law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
