, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Judges must remember that\nelected MPs have the feel of the local pulse.&nbsp;\nThe executive like IAS is trained to be administrators.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WyXouPDgDbQ/Vth_siJDCgI/AAAAAAABFhs/VchbqSjMXD8/s1600/imagges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-WyXouPDgDbQ/Vth_siJDCgI/AAAAAAABFhs/VchbqSjMXD8/s1600/imagges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A 60 year old judge who has been a lawyer all\nhis life with few years on the Judge\u2019s chair-&nbsp;\nwhat is his exposure to the world and his mental make up- &nbsp;&nbsp;other than the LIES he watches on TV ?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-U6N54VMeXkQ/Vth_h9iB4WI/AAAAAAABFho/2NzQLU6dIuo/s1600/imattges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-U6N54VMeXkQ/Vth_h9iB4WI/AAAAAAABFho/2NzQLU6dIuo/s1600/imattges.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In The Nature of the\nJudicial Process, Justice Benjamin N. Cardozo spAke: \u201cThe judge is not a\nknight errant, roaming at will in pursuit of his own ideal of beauty and\ngoodness. \u201d&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-xVmgzJqrgSA/Vth_FgiNvZI/AAAAAAABFhk/tNDVqZqMrcw/s1600/41i0haSF15L._SX322_BO1%252C204%252C20TT3%252C200_.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-xVmgzJqrgSA/Vth_FgiNvZI/AAAAAAABFhk/tNDVqZqMrcw/s400/41i0haSF15L._SX322_BO1%252C204%252C20TT3%252C200_.jpg\" width=\"258\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">History teaches that\nthe independence of the judiciary is jeopardised when courts become embroiled\nin the passions of the day instigated by IPLs and the need to PLAY TO THE\nGALLERY.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have read some\njudgements of famous judges\u2014it was more about the need to deliver LANDMARK&nbsp; judgements with some mindless quotes thrown\nin for good measure , even from Sigmund Frued and the \u201cmilk of compassion\u201d. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just by doing so the judge expects us to club him among the erudite ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ex- CJI Markandey Katju\nhas said \u201c&nbsp; Indian judiciary is perhaps\nthe most empowered and activist judiciary in the world. It can strike down\nlegislation. It can strike down governmental policies and indeed it is not\nunknown for it to mandate new policies or prescribe policies through judge made\nlaw.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BUT HEY, KATJU MAN \u2013 IF\nYOU KNOW YOUR LAW AND THE INDIAN CONSTITUTION , THIS IS WRONG !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PIL HAS BEEN CREATED BY\nTHE \u201cCOLLEGIUM \u201c JUDGES FOR THEMSELVES WITH ULTERIOR MOTIVE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In exercise of PIL the COLLEGIUM\njudiciary will &nbsp;entertain petitions from\nany desh drohi activist,&nbsp;&nbsp;TROJAN HORSE FOIREIGN FUNDED NGO or vested individual\nlike Prashant Bhushan ( a laywer who wants to give Kashmir to Pakistan ) --</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">----- espousing any public cause and in such cases\ncourts do not insist on locus standi or procedural compliances and do not\nconsider it to be an adversarial litigation (which is otherwise the norm in\nIndia).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hence PIL has become a\ncatch all jurisdiction where the COLLEGIUM judiciary blatantly transgressed into\nNO GO areas , where they are NOT equipped to get into. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BY DOING THIS COURT CASES\nHAVE BEEN DELAYED\u2014 TAKES MORE THAN 30 YEARS TO GIVE JUSTICE TO A COMMON MAN\u2014 <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">--WHAT WITH&nbsp; ALL JUDGES BEING HAJAAAAR &nbsp;BUSY WITH PIL \u2014&nbsp;\nSOME AT THE EXPENSE OF THE WATAN / BHARATMATA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PIL have made the\nJudiciary operate at the PERSONAL WHIMS AND FANCIES of a Judge , bases on his ego\nor taste.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There has been no consistency\n\u2013 all this is fraught with extreme danger is the judge is SOLD OUT to foreign\ndesh drohi forces.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are no clear\nguidelines as to when the court would or would not interfere and the extent of\nintervention.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many times the executive\nthrew any distasteful task ( sensitive matters of CULTURE/ FAITH ) &nbsp;into the lap of the Judiciary so that the\nJUDGES STEW IN THEIR OWN JUICES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Recently the judiciary\nwho had been pretending to sleep and were expecting to be woken up by other\u2014woke\nthemselves up.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They spAke:&nbsp; \u201c The filing of indiscriminate PIL petitions\n\u201ccreates unnecessary strain on the judicial system and consequently leads to\ninordinate delay in disposal of genuine and bona fide cases,\u201d ( Bench\nconsisting of Justices Dalveer Bhandari and Mukundakam Sharma )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tracing the origin and\ndevelopment of PIL in various countries, Justice Bhandari, writing the\njudgment, said: \u201cThe courts\u2019 contribution in helping the poorer sections by\ngiving a new definition to life and liberty and in protecting ecology,\nenvironment and forests is extremely significant.\u201d&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">However, the Bench said,\n\u201cunfortunately, of late, such an important jurisdiction, which has been\ncarefully carved out, created and nurtured with great care and caution by the\ncourts, is being blatantly abused by filing some petitions with oblique\nmotives.\u201d</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">YES, MELORDS &nbsp;--&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WE THE PEOPLE OF INDIA HAVE BEEN WATCHING WITH GREAT DISMAY--</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">--- HOW DESH DROHI ZIONIST JEWS HAVE USED THEIR OWN TROJAN HORSE NGOs TO FILE PIL -&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">--AND USE THEIR PET JUDGES IN GETTING FAVOURABLE JUDGEMENTS &nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Court in State of\nUttranchal Vs Balwant Singh Chaufal stated Civil Appeal No 1132 -1134 of 2002\nin its Judgment dated 18.01.2010 ordered the following:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">198. In order to\npreserve the purity and sanctity of the&nbsp;\nPIL, it has become imperative to issue the following&nbsp; directions:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(1) The courts must\nencourage genuine and bona fide PIL and effectively discourage and curb the PIL\nfiled for extraneous considerations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(2) Instead of every\nindividual judge devising his own procedure for dealing with the public\ninterest litigation, it would be appropriate for each High Court to properly\nformulate rules for encouraging the genuine PIL and discouraging the PIL filed\nwith oblique motives.&nbsp; Consequently, we\nrequest that the High Courts who have not yet framed the rules, should frame\nthe rules within three months. The Registrar General of each High Court is\ndirected to ensure that a copy of the Rules prepared by the High Court is sent\nto the Secretary General of this court immediately thereafter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(3) The courts should\nprima facie verify the credentials of the petitioner before entertaining a\nP.I.L.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(4) The court should be\nprima facie satisfied regarding the correctness of the contents of the petition\nbefore entertaining a PIL.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(5) The court should be\nfully satisfied that substantial public interest is involved before\nentertaining the petition.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(6) The court should\nensure that the petition which involves larger public interest, gravity and\nurgency must be given priority over other petitions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(7) The courts before\nentertaining the PIL should ensure that the PIL is aimed at redressal of\ngenuine public harm or public injury. The court should also ensure that there\nis no personal gain, private motive or oblique motive behind filing the public\ninterest litigation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(8) The court should\nalso ensure that the petitions filed by busybodies for extraneous and ulterior\nmotives must be discouraged by imposing exemplary costs or by adopting similar\nnovel methods to curb frivolous petitions and the petitions filed for\nextraneous considerations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">J.(Dalveer Bhandari)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">JUDICIAL ACTIVISM WAS\nSTARTED BY US JUDGES IN ROTHSCHILDs PAYROLL.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Arthur Schlesinger Jr. introduced the term \"judicial\nactivism\" in a January 1947 Fortune magazine article titled \"The\nSupreme Court: 1947.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Judicial activism\nrefers to a \"philosophy of judicial decision-making whereby&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">judges allow their personal\nviews about public policy, among other factors, to guide their decisions\u201d</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2026 and the trouble with defining Judicial Activism?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Inconsistency<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Imprecision<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Lack of specificity<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 There are thousands\nof law journal articles on judicial activism \u2013 &nbsp;thousands of articles per year<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2022 Courts, &nbsp;Sociologists,\nHistorians, Political scientists debate it on an ongoing basis--- &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the power of the\ncourt to declare a legislative Act void on the grounds of unconstitutionality.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The term Public interest means the larger\ninterests of the public, general welfare and interest of the masses.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The word Litigation means a legal action\nincluding all proceedings therein, initiated in a court of law with the purpose\nof enforcing a right or seeking a remedy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;The Public interest litigation means any\nlitigation conducted for the benefit of public or for removal of some public\ngrievance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The concept of PIL in\nIndia was started by Justice Krishna Iyer and Justice P.N. Bhagwati.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1982, Justice P.N.\nBhagwati, stated that \u201cPIL is a strategic arm of the legal aid movement which is\nintended to bring justice within the reach of the poor masses, who constitute\nthe low visibility area of humanity, a totally different kind of litigation\nfrom the ordinary traditional litigation.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ALL THIS IS OK, IF DESH\nDROHI FOREIGNERS DO NOT TAKE ADVANTAGE OF OUR SYSTEM TO BLEED THE WATAN<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ZJa2sr3mclk/VtibXlivVbI/AAAAAAABFig/br6ld-m3dXo/s1600/bar-dance-365_137434yyy0345.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"454\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-ZJa2sr3mclk/VtibXlivVbI/AAAAAAABFig/br6ld-m3dXo/s640/bar-dance-365_137434yyy0345.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It all started with\nfundamental rights\u2014now it has been reduced to even whoring for Mumbai gangsters\nvia CHAMIYA BARS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; No organ should go beyond the role as assigned\nto it by the constitution. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The judges shall\nenforce a law but should not create a law and seek to enforce it--&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; In the Jharkhand legislative assembly case(1998), supreme court\nordered the speaker to conduct a motion of confidence and ordered the speaker\nto conduct the proceedings according to a prescribed agenda.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Its proceedings were\nordered to be recorded for reporting to the court. Orders were made inspite of Article\n212 of the consitution, court not to enquire into any proceedings of the\nlegislature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The errors of the lower\ncourts can be corrected by the higher courts, but there is none above the\nSupreme Court to correct its errors and vested judgements with ULTERIOR MOTIVES.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; While judicial\nrestraint looks at changing the laws by means of &nbsp;constitutional amendments.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span It was established by leading\nIndian news broadcasters in October 2008.[1] The association was set up to deal\nwith ethical, operational, regulatory, technical and legal issues affecting\nnews and current-affairs channels. line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Fjm-4jXQtCY/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/Fjm-4jXQtCY?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But in the case of\nSadhvi Pragya and others accused in the Malegaon blast case, Supreme Court\nJustices JM Panchal and HL Gokhale denied bail and asserted that the right to\nget default bail \u201cis not an absolute and indefeasible right\u201d (10 SSC 445,\n2011).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They said, \u201cThe said right would be lost if chargesheet is filed and\nwould not survive the filing of the chargesheet\u201d. In other words, once the\nchargesheet is filed, if the accused is to be released on bail, it can only be\non merits (September 23, 2011).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">PIL is a good thing\nwhen it is used to enforce the FUNDAMENTAL rights of the disadvantaged and the\noppressed in India. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But it has now been again\nand again used&nbsp; as a VETO power to\ninterfere with the power of the ELECTED government to take decisions on a range\nof policy matters including the security of the watan<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Activism, like beauty,\nis often in the eye of the beholder. 9 from my perspective can be 6 from yours.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From 1979, the\njudiciary led by the Supreme Court in India became relevant to the nation in a\nmanner not contemplated by the makers of the Constitution and became an active\nparticipant in the dispenser of social justice.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>We would NOT have a problem\nwith this , but for the fact that FALSE WITNESSES ARE PRODUCED OUT OF THIN AIR\nby foreign funds \u2013&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>-- like how Teesta Setalvad has done again and again using\nFOREIGN FUNDED NGOs to bring down Modi.&nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>The COLLEGIUM JUDGES call this OBJECTIVE EVIDENCE</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me quote Wikipedia:-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; In November 2010, Setalvad was accused of\npressuring Zaheera Sheikh, the key witness in the Best Bakery case, to make\ncertain statements, leading to the unprecedented transferral of the case\noutside Gujarat.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In August 2005, the Supreme Court of India committee absolved\nher of the charges of inducement levelled against her by Zaheera and awarded a\none-year jail sentence to Zaheera for perjury.[41]</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;In 2013 Tehelka in an\nundercover investigation discovered that Zaheera had been paid to alter her\ntestimony. Tehelka recorded BJP member Madhu Srivastava, described by Tehelka\nas a \"close associate of Narendra Modi\" and Batthoo Srivastava\ndescribing how they had paid Rs 1.8 million to Zaheera.[42]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In April 2009, the\nTimes of India ran a story claiming that the Special Investigation Team (SIT)\nset up by the Supreme Court of India to investigate and expedite the Gujarat\nriot cases had submitted before the Court that <b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Teesta Setalvad had cooked up\ncases of violence to spice up the incidents.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The SIT which is headed by former\nCBI director, R K Raghavan has said t<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">hat false witnesses were tutored to give\nevidence about imaginary incidents by Teesta Setalvad and other NGOs.[44] The\nSIT charged her of \"cooking up macabre tales of killings\"</b>.[45]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The court was told that\n22 witnesses, who had submitted identical affidavits before various courts\nrelating to riot incidents, were questioned by SIT and<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> it was found that the\nwitnesses had not actually witnessed the incidents and they were tutored and\nthe affidavits were handed over to them by Setalvad.</b>[45]&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The report which was\nbrought to the notice of the bench consisting of Justices Arijit Pasayat, P\nSathasivam and Aftab Alam, noted that<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"> the much publicised case of a pregnant\nMuslim woman Kausar Bano being gangraped by a mob and foetus being removed with\nsharp weapons, was also fabricated, and false.</b>[44][46]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">UNQUOTE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; &nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 18.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obviously under\npressure from external forces , The Supreme Court has made an order even in a\nmilitary operation which involved the SECURITY OF THE WATAN.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Court issued orders\non the conduct of military operations in Hazratbal, Kashmir where the military had\nas a matter of strategy restricted the food supplies to DESH DROHI hostages. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Court ordered that\nthe provision of food of 1,200 calorific value should be supplied to hostages. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Commenting on this, an\nArmy General wrote: \u201cFor the first time in history, a Court of Law was asked to\npronounce judgment on the conduct of an ongoing military operation. Its verdict\nmaterially affected the course of operation.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MELORDS -- SHOULD OUR ARMY SPIN THE CHARKHA , TOO AND SING \"RAGHUPATI RAAGHAVA RAJARAM\" &nbsp;TOO FOR GOOD MEASURE ?</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-p9T_CvPbxGI/VtluU2Pw6yI/AAAAAAABFlA/eLzGgYfDXVw/s1600/croFp_480x480_135065.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is an example of\nhow COLLEGIUM judiciary micro-managed the proceedings of Legislatures. In the\nJharkhand Legislative Assembly case, the Supreme Court ordered the Assembly to\nconduct a Motion of Confidence and ordered the Speaker to conduct proceedings\naccording to a prescribed agenda and not to entertain any other business. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Its proceedings were\nordered to be recorded for reporting to the Court. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These orders were made\nin spite of Article 212 of the Constitution which states that Courts are not to\ninquire into any proceedings of the legislature.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The COLLEGIUM judiciary\nset aside the expert opinion of the Telecom Regulatory Authority of India\n(TRAI) to sell 2G spectrum without auction to create greater teledensity in\nIndia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today we the people all\nare wondering why the MELORDS allow Vijaya Mallya to run scot free while\nSubrata Roy ( a desh bhakt &nbsp;and India's second largest employer &nbsp;) is in jail for two years, with a bail set at\n10,000 crores.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Well we know !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHY DO WE HAVE SO MANY\nFOREIGN FUNDED NGOs?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WELL THEY HIJACK THE\nJUDICIARY AND PIL , WITH OR WITHOUT THE \u201cCOLLEGIUM JUDGES \u201c KNOWING OF THEIR\nULTERIOR MOTIVES<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These NGOs make full\nvested use of the Supreme Court and the 21 High Courts to BLEED Bharatmata with\nKOSHER PIL..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In as much as today\nordinary citizens have been kicked off the true democratic road&nbsp; -- the primary responsibility of citizens\nthemselves in a representative self government of making ELECTED legislators\nand the executive responsible for their actions. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE VALUE OF A CITIZENS\nVOTE IS NOW NULL AND VOID !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The LAME and RIDICULOUS\n&nbsp;answer often given by the judiciary to\nthis type of ADVENTURISM &nbsp;is that it is\ncompelled to take upon this task as the other branches of government have\nfailed in their obligations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Article\n105 (2) and 194(2) protect the legislators from interference of the Courts with\nregards to his/her freedom of speech and freedom to vote.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE :&nbsp; Holding that there was no limit to judicial\nreview, <b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Supreme Court Chief Justice K G Balakrishnan has ruled out the question\nof having any compulsory annual declaration of wealth and assets by judges of\nthe apex court and high courts . No self-respecting judge would accept the idea\nof such compulsory declaration </b>or have any committee of lay persons to probe\nthe conduct of the judiciary, Justice Balakrishnan maintained in an interview\nto a private TV channel UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To another question\nw<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">hether there should be compulsory annual declaration of their wealth and\nassets by judges, the CJI remarked, \"No self-respecting persons will\naccept it</b>.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/Any-legislation-can-be-challenged-Chief-Justice/articleshow/1559417.cms\">http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/Any-legislation-can-be-challenged-Chief-Justice/articleshow/1559417.cms</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now let me quote\nWikipedia-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">QUOTE :&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>Balakrishnan's\nson-in-law and Indian Youth Congress leader P. V. Srinijan, who did not have\nany land four years ago, is now the owner of property worth crores of rupees.</b></span>\nAccording to a report by news channel Asianet News, Srinijan had declared while\ncontesting as a Congress candidate in the 2006 Assembly elections that he had\nno landed property. He had contested unsuccessfully from the SC reserved\nconstituency of Njarackal in Ernakulam. In light of the charges, Srinijan\nresigned from the Youth Congress.[21] Former Chief Justice J. S. Verma, former\napex court Judge V. R. Krishna Iyer, noted jurist Fali S. Nariman, former\nmember of NHRC Sudarshan Agrawal and the prominent activist lawyer Prashant\nBhushan have called for Justice Balakrishnan to step down from the chairmanship\nof the NHRC pending an inquiry into the matter.[22]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A petition-seeking\nvigilance probe into the allegations of \"amassment of wealth\ndisproportionate to their sources of income\" by Balakrishnan's family\nmembers, was filed before the Income Tax Vigilance and Anti-Corruption\nBureau.[23] <b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">The income tax department has confirmed that at least three of his\nrelatives had held a large amount of black money</b>.[24]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In February 2012, the\nSupreme Court of India in a case filed by the NGO Common Cause, inquired of the\ngovernment as to the progress in the probe against Justice Balakrishnan.[25]UNQUOTE\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/K._G._Balakrishnan\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/K._G._Balakrishnan</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://www.firstpost.com/politics/kgbs-cv-says-he-wasnt-even-qualified-to-be-hc-judge-25920.html\">http://www.firstpost.com/politics/kgbs-cv-says-he-wasnt-even-qualified-to-be-hc-judge-25920.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 16.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://indianexpress.com/article/cities/lucknow/govt-servants-must-send-kids-to-govt-schools-allahabad-hc/\">http://indianexpress.com/article/cities/lucknow/govt-servants-must-send-kids-to-govt-schools-allahabad-hc/</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Divisional Manager,\nAravali Golf Course vs. Chander Haas (2006) the Indian Supreme Court observed:<i><span style=\"color: blue;\">\n\u201cJudges must know their limits and not try to run the government. They must\nhave modesty and humility and not behave like Emperors. There is broad\nseparation of powers under the Constitution, and each of the organs of the\nstate must have respect for the others and must not encroach into each other\u2019s\ndomain.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></i></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<section class=\"title_section clearfix\" style=\"border-image-outset: initial; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><span class=\"googlead\" style=\"border: 0px; display: block; font-family: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 10px 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\"><span style=\"color: #333333; font-family: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit;\">NEW DELHI: In an unprecedented confession, the <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Supreme Court has admitted that the judiciary has erred in the recent past in usurping the powers of the executive. </span>Cautioning against judicial activism, it said that if the trend continued, politicians would step in and clip the judiciary's wings.</span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"article_content clearfix\" style=\"border-image-outset: initial; border-image-repeat: initial; border-image-slice: initial; border-image-source: initial; border-image-width: initial; border: 0px; color: #333333; font-size: 18px; font-stretch: normal; line-height: 27px; margin: 0px 0px 15px; padding: 0px; position: relative; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n<arttextxml></arttextxml><br />\n<div class=\"section1\" style=\"border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n<div class=\"Normal\" style=\"border-image-outset: initial; border-image-repeat: initial; border-image-slice: initial; border-image-source: initial; border-image-width: initial; border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n<br style=\"content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block; font-weight: inherit;\" />\n<br style=\"content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block; font-weight: inherit;\" />\n<span style=\"font-weight: inherit;\">\"If the judiciary does not exercise restraint and overstretches its limits, there is bound be a reaction from politicians and others. The politicians will then step in and curtail the power, or even the independence of the judiciary,\" said an SC bench comprising Justices A K Mathur and Markandey Katju.</span><br />\n<div class=\"last8brdiv\" style=\"border-image-outset: initial; border-image-repeat: initial; border-image-slice: initial; border-image-source: initial; border-image-width: initial; border: 0px; display: inline; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; width: auto;\">\n<div class=\"sponsor_block clearfix\" style=\"border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n<ul class=\"colombia\" data-ad-size=\"[0,370]\" data-autoplay=\"false\" data-callback=\"sponsorAdSuccess\" data-cb=\"processCtnAds\" data-desc-len=\"90\" data-expansion-size=\"[0,380]\" data-loop=\"0\" data-native-tmpl=\"ctn_midarticle\" data-native-vid-tmpl=\"ctn_belly_vid\" data-position=\"26125851\" data-skew=\"0\" data-slot=\"129146\" id=\"129146-26125851\" style=\"border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; list-style: none; margin: 0px; max-height: 430px !important; overflow: hidden; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\"></ul>\n</div>\n</div>\n<br style=\"content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block; font-weight: inherit;\" />\n<span style=\"font-weight: inherit;\">In a 22-page judgment, in which the SC overturned a trial court and the high court's ruling on regularising certain employees of a private golf course, the two judges devoted 15 pages to reiterate judicial norms which, in the main, underline that judges as umpires are meant to uphold laws, not create them.</span><br />\n<div class=\"last7brdiv\" style=\"border-image-outset: initial; border-image-repeat: initial; border-image-slice: initial; border-image-source: initial; border-image-width: initial; border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n</div>\n<br style=\"content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block; font-weight: inherit;\" />\n<div class=\"last6brdiv\" style=\"border-image-outset: initial; border-image-repeat: initial; border-image-slice: initial; border-image-source: initial; border-image-width: initial; border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n</div>\n<br style=\"content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block; font-weight: inherit;\" />\n<span style=\"font-weight: inherit;\">The bench added that in order to maintain the judiciary's independence, judges had to exercise restraint and honour the separation of powers among the three wings of governance, as mandated by the Constitution.</span><span style=\"font-family: inherit;\"><span style=\"border-color: initial; border-image-outset: initial; border-image-repeat: initial; border-image-slice: initial; border-image-source: initial; border-image-width: initial; border-style: initial; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"last5brdiv\" style=\"border: 0px; display: inline; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; width: auto;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: inherit;\"><span style=\"border-color: initial; border-image-outset: initial; border-image-repeat: initial; border-image-slice: initial; border-image-source: initial; border-image-width: initial; border-style: initial; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: inherit;\"><span style=\"border-color: initial; border-image-outset: initial; border-image-repeat: initial; border-image-slice: initial; border-image-source: initial; border-image-width: initial; border-style: initial; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit;\"></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"last4brdiv\" style=\"border: 0px; display: inline; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; width: auto;\">\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: inherit;\"><span style=\"border-color: initial; border-image-outset: initial; border-image-repeat: initial; border-image-slice: initial; border-image-source: initial; border-image-width: initial; border-style: initial; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit;\">\n</span></span>\n<span style=\"font-weight: inherit;\">\"The constitutional tradeoff for independence is that judges must restrain themselves from areas reserved for the other separate branches (executive and legislature),\" said the bench.</span><br />\n<div class=\"last3brdiv\" style=\"border-image-outset: initial; border-image-repeat: initial; border-image-slice: initial; border-image-source: initial; border-image-width: initial; border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n</div>\n<br style=\"content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block; font-weight: inherit;\" />\n<div class=\"last2brdiv\" style=\"border-image-outset: initial; border-image-repeat: initial; border-image-slice: initial; border-image-source: initial; border-image-width: initial; border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n</div>\n<br style=\"content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block; font-weight: inherit;\" />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">The SC listed instances where the judiciary had strayed into the executive's domain. These cases included: nursery admissions in Delhi; legality of constructions, identifying buildings to be demolished in Delhi; overcharging by Delhi autorickshaws; growing road accidents and enhancing fines; nature of buses for public transport; air-pollution; free beds in hospitals on public land; world-class ambulance services; world-class burns ward.</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"last1brdiv\" style=\"border-image-outset: initial; border-image-repeat: initial; border-image-slice: initial; border-image-source: initial; border-image-width: initial; border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n</div>\n<br style=\"content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block; font-weight: inherit;\" />\n<br style=\"content: &quot;.&quot;; display: block; font-weight: inherit;\" />\n<span style=\"font-weight: inherit;\">The judgment came on December 6, immediately after MPs vociferously demanded accountability and probity among judges during a debate in Parliament's winter session on the passage of a law putting a year's moratorium on the court-mandated sealing and demolition drive against illegal structures in Delhi.</span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"photogallery34\" style=\"border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline;\">\n</div>\n<div data-type=\"inlineShare\" id=\"shareInline\" style=\"background: rgb(0, 0, 0); border-radius: 5px; border: 0px; font-family: inherit; font-size: inherit; font-stretch: inherit; font-style: inherit; font-variant: inherit; font-weight: inherit; left: 849px; line-height: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 5px 2px 0px; position: absolute; right: -18px !important; top: 681px; vertical-align: baseline; width: 20px; z-index: 50;\">\n<span class=\"twitter article-sprite ishare\" data-type=\"twitter\" data-url=\"http://toi.in/lGOkZZ via @timesofindia\" style=\"background-position: -262px -119px;
