font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>WHY IS OUR \u201cCOLLEGIUM\u201d JUDICIARY SO KEEN ON GIVING\nTHE SAME RIGHTS TO A SEDITIOUS TRAITOR TO THE WATAN ,&nbsp; AS TO A DESH BHAKT LAW ABIDING &nbsp;CITIZEN ?&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">WE ARE WATCHING !</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: 'times new roman', times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c6454415396489397411\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'times new roman', times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_47M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/03/jnu-den-of-anti-nationals-and-communist_54.html?showComment=1457109219881#c6454415396489397411\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">March 4, 2016 at 10:03 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_47MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<br />\nSTOP PRESS:<br />\n<br />\nTHERE WAS A CONSPIRACY TO ASSASSINATE PM MODI USING A LET MODULE ( IRSHAT JEHAN ).<br />\nTWO TAMILIANS AND ONE FOREIGN WHITE WOMAN ARE INVOLVED<br />\n<br />\nCANCEL THEIR PASSPORTS BEFORE THEY ESCAPE !<br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In State of West Bengal\nand Ors. v. Sampat Lal, Because of unnatural death of two young boys ( Barrackpore&nbsp; area near Calcutta ) Calcutta High Court\nappointed a special officer but the Supreme Court held that the High Court\nshould not have appointed a special Officer as the matter fell within the\njurisdiction of the police, and that the conduct of such investigation is a\npolice power. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n</span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In connection Supreme\nCourt observed: \u2015<i>We have therefore, thought it a proper exercise of discretion\nnot to enter into the facts and express any opinion one way or the other so as\nnot to prejudice the trial but might take place. It is sufficient to indicate\nthat there is a residuary jurisdiction left in the Court to give directions to\nthe investigating agency when it is satisfied that the requirements of law are\nnot being complied with an investigation is not being conducted properly or\nwith due haste and promptitude. The Court has to be alive to the fact that the\nscheme of the law is that the investigation has been entrusted to the policeand\nit is ordinary not subject to the normal supervisory power of the Court.</i><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>If the\ncourt starts doing a job not supposed to be his, &nbsp;then other than the problem of lack of technical\nexpertise, it leaves the aggrieved party with no forum to ventilate his\ngrievances. &nbsp;&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>This aspect has always been\nignored by the COLLEGIUM judiciary.&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">This is plain commonsense even to a child.</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-huHq7bbEoy4/VtnX_DqyvmI/AAAAAAABFmQ/6blY4dO06Mg/s1600/imafghges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"265\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-huHq7bbEoy4/VtnX_DqyvmI/AAAAAAABFmQ/6blY4dO06Mg/s400/imafghges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"></span></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: medium;\">VESTED KOSHER INTEREST FROM ABROAD COULD NOT STOP SINGING THE PRAISES OF INDIAN \"COLLEGIUM\" JUDGES WHENEVER THEY ENGAGED IN JUDICIAL ADVENTURISM. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span>\n</span><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><br /><span style=\"background-color: yellow; line-height: 48px;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b>When the the Supreme Court took away the constitutionally conferred power of the President of India to appoint judges after consultation with the Chief Justice ( as per the constitution ) , and appropriated this power in the Chief Justice of India and a collegium of four judges- BILDERBERG CLUB went GA GA and ballistic with their praises of the BOLD AND BEAUTIFUL Judges of India.</b></span></span></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unless the parameters\nof PIL are strictly formulated by the Supreme Court and strictly observed,\nPIL&nbsp; is ind anger of becoming diffuse,\nunprincipled, encroaching into the functions of other branches of government\nand ineffective by its indiscriminate use.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We proud Indians do NOT care for the white man's praise anymore. &nbsp;We are past that immature stage. The immoral white invader called us SAVAGES and then started learning our language Sanskrit.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/12/we-are-hindus-we-are-indians-we-are.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/12/we-are-hindus-we-are-indians-we-are.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; float: left; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c5613895898255848243\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_6M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_6b+seedHjHWD\" kind=\"d\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"comment-thread inline-thread\" id=\"bc_0_5T\" kind=\"t\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; margin: 8px 0px; padding: 0.5em 1em;\" t=\"0\" u=\"0\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_6b+seedHjHWD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_5TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_5TN\"></span></span></span><br />\n<div class=\"thread-dropContainer thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_5TD\">\n<span id=\"bc_0_6b+seedHjHWD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_5TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_5TN\"><span class=\"thread-drop\"></span></span></span></span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_6b+seedHjHWD\" kind=\"d\"><span class=\"thread-toggle thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_5TT\" kind=\"g\" style=\"cursor: pointer; display: inline-block;\"><span class=\"thread-count\" id=\"bc_0_5TN\">\n</span></span><br />\n</span><br />\n<ol class=\"thread-chrome thread-expanded\" id=\"bc_0_5TC\" style=\"list-style-type: none; padding: 0px;\"><span id=\"bc_0_6b+seedHjHWD\" kind=\"d\">\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_5B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom-width: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 16px 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c2746184378940902584\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_5M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/03/foreign-funded-trojan-horse-ngos-pil_8.html?showComment=1457467169286#c2746184378940902584\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">March 9, 2016 at 1:29 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_5MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhi hj,<br />\n<br />\nIt is an intraplate earthquake<br />\n<br />\nIt occurs in the interior of a tectonic plate, whereas an interplate earthquake is one that occurs at a plate boundary.<br />\n<br />\nThe reservior of the Terna Dam,(an earthfill dam ) on Terna river puts pressure on fault lines.<br />\n<br />\nthis is why this blogsite has been telling about MULLAPARIYAR dam.<br />\n<br />\nthe BOTTOM OF THE CEREBRAL BARREL LAWYERS TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES think they are experts.<br />\n<br />\nthese MELORDS would have never heard the term SOLITION in their miserable lives--<br />\n<br />\nof course after the 2004 tsunami --they all know this term<br />\n<br />\nIF I CALL MELORDS STUPID-- THEY WILL PUNISH ME FOR \"CONTEMPT \"<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/11/mullaperiar-dam-biggest-disaster-in.html<br />\n<br />\nthis is why so many dams in upper reaches of ganges if SUICIDE .<br />\n<br />\nThe Himalayas were pushed up when two continents collided . This is why Tibet is elevated and Mount Everest is the tallest mountain peak , which is still rising.<br />\n<br />\nAt an unstable area where two tectonic plates collide , reservoirs increase the risk of earthquakes by adding immense pressure to the earth from the large volumes and weight of the stored water.<br />\n<br />\nRESERVOIR INDUCED EARTH QUAKES ARE TERMED INDUCED SEISMICITY.<br />\n<br />\nArtificial dam reserviors alters in-situ stress along an existing fault or fracture.<br />\n<br />\nIn these reservoirs, the weight of the water column can significantly change the stress on an underlying fault or fracture by increasing the total stress through direct loading, or decreasing the effective stress through the increased pore water pressure.<br />\n<br />\nThis significant change in stress can lead to sudden movement along the fault or fracture, resulting in an earthquake.<br />\n<br />\nThe 6.3 magnitude 1967 Koynanagar earthquake occurred in Maharashtra, India with its epicenter, fore- and aftershocks all located near or under the Koyna Dam reservoir. 180 people died and 1,500 were left injured. The effects of the earthquake were felt 230 km away in Mumbai with tremors and power outages.<br />\n<br />\nLATUR EARTHQUAKE NEAR BHEED MARATHWADA-<br />\n<br />\nLatur earthquake was one of the deadliest earthquakes Maharashtra has seen till date. The earthquake struck at about 3.56 am on September 30, 1993. In the intraplate earthquake about 52 villages were destroyed, over 30,000 were injured and approximately 10,000 were killed. The earthquake left a huge hollow at Killari, which was also the epicentre, remains in place till date.<br />\n<br />\nGOD SAVE THIS WATAN FROM OUR \"COLLEGIUM MELORDS\"<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2014/06/ganga-manthan-cleaning-of-river-ganges.html<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n.</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_6b+seedHjHWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_6b+seedHjHWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: left;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_10M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">Capt.
